name: Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa
address: 17 Nhà Chung Hàng Trống, Hoàn Kiếm , Hà Nội, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Hà Nội và cách Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph chỉ vài bước chân, Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa cung cấp dịch vụ tiền sảnh, các phòng không gây dị ứng, sân hiên, Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ nằm gần một số điểm tham quan nổi tiếng, cách Ô Quan Chưởng khoảng 15 phút đi bộ, Ga Hà Nội khoảng 1.5 km, Hoàng thành Huế khoảng 1.9 km. Chỗ nghỉ cách trung tâm thành phố 400 m và Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long 8 phút đi bộ.

Khách sạn cung cấp cho khách các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Khách có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Mỹ tại chỗ nghỉ.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh, tiếng Việt và tiếng Hoa, đội ngũ nhân viên tại lễ tân luôn sẵn lòng đưa ra hướng dẫn hữu ích về khu vực xung quanh.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Tràng Tiền Plaza, Hồ Hoàn Kiếm và Nhà hát Lớn Hà Nội. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa 25 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ này cũng cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: bien situe ! personnel très gentil ! hôtel calme .
review.comment_negative: rien

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Great location to many sights in Hanoi. Room was comfortable and clean.  The staff was helpful, especially Scott. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

review.rating: Beautiful clean hotel in a gorgeous location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond . From the moment we walked through the entrance into the opulent lobby, we felt welcomed and looked after. The staff were fabulous, extremely kind, helpful and professional. Our room was a nice size and very tastefully decorated. Bed was huge and very comfortable. There was a good selection at breakfast and again, staff were very friendly and attentive. This hotel is in a great location in the heart of the old quarter and a great place to explore Hanoi from. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I highly recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond to others. The hotel is very clean and nicely decorated. Once you exit the hotel, you are half a block from the busy streets of Hanoi. The location is super convenient to food, shopping, and tourist sites. The breakfast buffet in the morning has a good selection and great coffee. The hotel staff were all polite, friendly, and always helpful. I connected with Martin before arriving in Hanoi to arrange for hotel pick-up and a Ha Long Bay tour. After arriving at the hotel, I met him and he let me know I could WhatsApp him for any questions. Whenever I had questions, Martin helped me out (even once on his day off since he was the only local person I could WhatsApp). I was traveling alone in Vietnam, and he made me feel like I had a trusted friend in Vietnam. By the end of my hotel stay, I was sad to leave this wonderful hotel and the hotel team members.

review.rating: Lovely hotel, great staff, will return
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel and staff were great! They were incredibly kind and accommodating. When I had troubles with withdrawing money from ATMs for a few days, they helped me exchange my remaining dollars until the issue was resolved. If I ever have the opportunity to return, I will definitely book here again!

review.rating: Very impressive hotel, with staff delivering a seemless experince.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is well located and a short walk to the Old Quaters shops and restaurants. The rooms are clean and nicely styled although the walls are a little thin. Breakfast is delicious with hot meals and fresh juices. The hotel is well served by a team of dedicated and professional staff who made our 5 days stay a very pleasant experience.

review.rating: This Hotel is highly recommended. you must stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
If you are looking to stay in the old quarter of Hanoi please do your self a favour and stay here.
The breakfast served in the morning is also excellent with a mix of bread, bacon and noodles....
The room we stayed in was really comfortable with a bed big enough to fit three! (or two people assuming the starfish pose). Overall the service at The Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was outstanding and the staff really were first class. Thank you to all the employees for making our trip to Vietnam wonderful. Highly recommend!

review.rating: Fabulous customer service from a wonderful team.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in excellent location. Rooms are large and very comfortable with completely enclosed shower so no wet floors! The staff were exceptional with special mention ,who made sure everyone had what they needed and were happy. Would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: Fabulous hotel in the Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were a group of 4 adults staying at this beautiful hotel. The staff were exceptional and all made us feel very welcomed. The hotel decor is amazing and I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel. Special mention for Ms Phuong and Chi at reception, who went over and above ensuring we enjoyed our stay. All of the staff were very passionate and took pride in their roles. Thank you for making our stay so memorable.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: nice location!
review.comment_negative: small hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Loved our stay here! It was in a very good location, situated on the quieter side of the Old quarter and still accessible to all the stores. The reception staff was really nice, friendly, and helpful. We enjoyed our stay here, the room was comfortable to stay in as well.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Très bien situé, à côté du lac, des restaurants, de la magnifique église et du vieux Hanoï. Le personnel est adorable. Nous avons passé un très bon moment.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location

review.rating: gut und günstig. Lohnt den Vergleich
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sehr persönlicher, familiärer und engagierter Service. sehr komfortable Betten und vollständige Ausstattung. Leckeres Frühstück und frisch zubereitet.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was a very special stay. As it is a small charming boutique hotel, you feel very well taken care of. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly. Overall a great experience. and location good. Strongly recommend this hotel for anyone wanting a relaxing stay in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Members of staff were so attentive and genuinely kind. My flight back was at midnight and they let me use shower before the flight, after checking out. It was very comfortable staying there and I felt very safe all the time.

review.rating: The best hotel location and service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff was lovely, customer service was very good. They arranged a cab for me , asking at a better price than that app I was going to use, make sure that I got to the airport on time, etc. The lodgings were fine and the price is excellent. I’m well satisfied.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_negative: Entrée triste petit déjeuner insuffisant

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We selected Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for the second time here and we are so happy with the services, support and food here. From the sales manager Mr Martin to the staff during our event in Jan 2024, including Sabi, Jame ..., all are so nice, cooperative and helpful. The foods were good too.  it would be the best.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel in a great location.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well positioned between the Old Quarter and the French Quarter making most tourist destinations walkable, once you learn how to cross the street in Hanoi!!! Excellent value of money. We would suggest a high floor, as in any hotel in Hanoi due to traffic noise.

review.rating: Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa best 4 star hotel in Old quarter area.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was very courteous and helpful. James the manager has been exceptionally good. Location was very good, close to everything. Breakfast was delicious.  If I happened to visit Hanoi again I know where am i going to stay...Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for 3 nights in total, split across two visits. It was excellent. The staff went out of their way to help us with whatever our needs were - taxis, suggestions of places to visit,The location is excellent - in The Old Quarter but on a quiet road between two others that cars do not go down. It's just 1minute to Hoan Kiem Lake (where they close the roads to traffic in the evenings at the weekend and the locals take-over the area for entertainment and activities). It's also just a few blocks away from great places for food and drink. The Breakfast was fantastic too - fruit, hot food, freshly cooked eggs etc. We'll certainly be recommending Lheritage Diamond Hotel to all our friends and family.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: Bước vào và bước ra trả phòng ngay dù đã thanh toán. Phòng nhỏ và có mùi lạ. Sàn phòng tắm chưa được dọn sạch nhưng đã để khách vào.

review.rating: The Perfect Hotel Choice in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
This place is very clean and staff is very hospitable and friendly and always smiling Sabi and james looked after us.
They made the best omelette on the terrace bar along with other local cuisine like fresh soupy noodles.
In all very positive experiences

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel.The staff were wonderful and very helpful, they really helped make the stay special. The location is in the old quarter near plenty of shops and restaurants but a few streets away from the really busy market and bar streets so still relatively quite. Watch out for roaming street vendors selling bread or fruits or shoeshines. Breakfast is also great with a buffet with lots of delicious food. Exceptional service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room very spacious two good sized bedrooms and bathrooms  and living area apartment was absolutely spotless clean and cleaned thoroughly everyday. The receptionist is very informative, polite and helpful. Hotel is at strategic location. walking distance to Hoan kiem lake, Thang Long puppet show, St Joseph Cathedral, Train Street. Overall, Excellent service given by Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well appointed rooms in the hear of Ha Noi. Excellent service and attention to every detail. The staff is attentive and friendly. The breakfast was amazing. We would definitely come back. Our room was small but very comfortable. Thank you !!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice room and excellent location in Old Quarter, the staff was extremely friendly (especially Ms. Sabi) and helpful. They helped us choose where to visit during our trip, including various local restaurants and tourist hotpots. The breakfast was also delicious.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Central to everything, you step out and you’re right in the old quarter. Was able to book a fun tour with the hotel that was below market rate.
review.comment_negative: When we tried to check in they asked us to cancel our booking.com booking and rebook directly with the hotel. As it was past the refund date we did not feel comfortable doing this so declined, it took quite some time persuading the staff to check us in with the booking.com booking. Did not want to accept card payment and finally got them to but with an additional 3% surcharge which was not mentioned anywhere. Additional cleaning fees charged at end of booking.

review.rating: Pleasant stay in Hanoi with Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff here were the most sincere and accommodating of all the places we stayed while in Vietnam. They took care of everything we needed with a smile and helpfulness. We would not even consider staying anywhere else in Ha Noi.

review.rating: 4 notti in totale ad Hanoi (usata come base per gite nel nord ed est del paese) città fantastica dal sapore autentico.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Posizione top personale accogliente stanza molto carina con piccolo balcone.
review.comment_negative: Abbiamo provato due camere diverse. La prima al 9 piano vicino ad ascensore risultata molto rumorosa dalle 6.00 am per il vociare degli ospiti che si recavano a colazione. La seconda camera al 7 piano risultata rumorosa ogni volta che al piano superiore scorreva acqua. Parlo comunque di cose sopportabilissime.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is very convenient for foods and a very cozy and friendly.
The hotel come with a very nice breakfast and very value of money to stay.
Me and my wife will choose to stay there again and thanks to All the staff there .

review.rating: very smart room design and good breakfast on a busy street in the old quarter of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very smart room design and good breakfast
review.comment_negative: pretty busy on the street in front of the hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We enjoy our stay in that hotel. The staff give us some and good recommendations for restaurants. We also love the attentions for our honey moon. The room was really nice, big and clean. The breakfast is really nice, fresh and you have also lot of choice !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent location . Service rendered was personal and professional, thanks to Martin and team. Breakfast spread was delicious . We were supposed to go on the Halong Bay cruise and due to the unforeseen weather, the staff monitored very closely and updated us on the status of the cruise. Thanks to them, we had a wonderful experience at Halong Bay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Hotel 2 estrelas que o booking considera 4 estrelas.
Nota não condiz com a realidade.
Localização excelente, mas as instalações são antigas, banheiro sujo.
Fotos não condizem com a realidade
review.comment_negative: Tudo

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên tận tình, thân thiện

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Loved this hotel, the rooms were fantastic, staff so lovely and helpful. When we come back to Hanoi we will definitely stay here again!

review.rating: Great hotel right neat old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Five star experience from this lovely Boutique Hotel. Fabulous location. Amazing staff and management who could not do enough for us throughout our stay. Highly recommended. We would not hesitate to return.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Very helpful staff and cleanliness. Breakfast was good. 
Helped decorate room for a birthday.
review.comment_negative: Charged for water and some staff pushy with tours

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The executive room upgraded with balcony was exactly as depicted on the website and was quite lovely. The welcome and the quality of the staff was exceptional - so helpful and friendly, all with excellent English and detailed knowledge of the old quarter and of the country. Breakfasts were full buffet with cooked options and available from 06.00 to 10.00 - unlike many places. You can leave your bags at no cost, you can come back and use their ground floor shower with fresh towels free, you can use the breakfast room which is very well appointed with free water and Wifi . We've travelled a lot such welcome service and value is exceptional.

review.rating: Great location, very nice room and hospitable service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very flexible with us. We used hanoi as a star point to go on for other trips and kept going back to this hotel to spend a night between trips. The staff were always welcoming.The location is the best.

review.rating: good value hotel in old quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is fantastic; right in the heart of everything and if a taxi was ever required, the staff were always more than happy to assist. On arrival, we were provided with a local map and the staff took the time to highlight key attractions and assist us to orient ourselves. The rooms were incredible with lovely comfortably beds, plush pillows, crisp clean white sheets and all brand new bathroom amenities. The entire hotel was incredibly clean and beautifully presented.  A delicious buffet breakfast and a restaurant which blew us away because of the quality of the food. Cannot recommend this hotel highly enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter.The staff were wonderful and dedicated and very helpful.they picked us up from the airport and we really appreciated about their kind hospitality.Our room was great clean and very bright and quiet . The breakfast was cery highly recommeded too with many fresh fruits and chlices cook to order. The hotel location is the best very closed to Hoan Kiem lake and many restaurants which is very convenient. We will return here soon for our next visit and will recommend for all of my friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed this Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel during this business trip for working on deadlines. The hotel itself and staff never let me down and thanks to that, I have been able to complete my tasks. - The hotel is located right inside the Old Quarters, within walking distance to Hoan Kiem Lake and the famous food stores, bars, pubs inside the Old Quarters. Staff were far beyond expectation. They paid attention to single details about my needs and kept on offering supports, asked if I had good sleep, if there was anything they could do better - Very clean - Full of amenities - Room is much more spacious compared to similar hotels in that area - I was a solo female traveller and it's definitely safe staying in the hotel - Breakfast was nice, a very good combination of buffet - Western and Vietnamese choices.

review.rating: Well located, quiet hotel with top notch customer service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms are surprisingly large and beautifully appointed. It is quite pricey compared with other hotels in Hanoi, but for a special occasion such as my husband's birthday, it was worth it. Three friendly staff brought a cake to our room whilst singing "Happy Birthday". It was a really nice personal touch. We ate breakfast in the  morning. There is a good buffet, with plenty of options, including pancakes and omelettes.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Last time when I was in vacation, I had a chance to experience the amazing and professional service here. A gorgeous room with a picturesque view literally explode my heart. If I have a chance next time, this place obviously first choice

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Drinks are unique and delicious. Service exceeded all expectations. The staff is fantastic! Great hospitality, gave amazing recommendations on drinks, and super friendly. Perfect location! Beautiful views of the Cathedral - Hoan Kiem Lake and the city. Highly recommend for anybody!

review.rating: Very clean hotel and friendly staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From our first arrival we knew we had booked a real gem of a boutique hotel. Can’t emphasize enough how impeccable and amazing this hotel service is. It’s comparable to any 4-star we have stayed at or even better. Staff went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable experience, making my visit truly memorable. Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing hospitality, excellent service, great location & delicious breakfast buffet. Mr Martin is the world’s best! He made sure that all our needs are met the moment we stepped into their hotel up to getting our ride to the airport. Phuong to Mr Martin and the rest of the hotel staff for making this vacation one of the best.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is right in the centre of everything. Only few steps away from the lake. Room is spacious and clean.The staff is also very friendly. Enjoy my stay with this hotel in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Breakfast is on 10th floor. Exceptional views and delicious buffet breakfast. Welcoming and friendly staffs services.
review.comment_negative: The room First Two night we stayed was small and TV not working.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked the  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel and stayed there for a couple of nights. The hotel itself looked really new. The rooms were really clean and spacious. All our rooms came with a huge bathroom and toilet, with a bathtub in each. The rooftop bar hasn’t opened yet (officially opening on 1st July) but the rooftop infinity pool were the kids’ favourite. The service my family and I have received from them were just amazing. The staff in this hotel were very friendly, attentive and professional. My family and I would like to give a special thanks to Manager and staff for making our stay a memorable one. We will definitely come back again to this amazing hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was super friendly and helped out with all the organisation we needed. The rooms were clean, the showers had good water pressure and and the was really comfortable. The value we received for the money we paid was excellent! I would recommend the Hotel to anyone.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really. The only thing was, that the hotel was a little bit far to walk to the Bia Hoi Corner (about 15 Minutes) and that the room was a little bit small.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
La ubicación sin duda es excelente. El personal encantador, te dicen los mejores sitios para comer. Incluso te ayudan a reservar el taxi sin coste alguno.
Recomendable 100% la habitación Deluxe. Nuestra primera noche aceptamos el upgrade y nos encantó. La segunda noche después del viaje a la bahía Ha Long, nos quedamos con la habitación superior que teníamos reservada, y era muy pequeña, entrábamos apenas. 
El desayuno delicioso, buffet super completo y muy bueno. En la 10° planta del hotel, con vistas increíbles.
review.comment_negative: El caos de Hanoi, motos en las aceras, suciedad en toda la ciudad. Pero está claro que no tenía nada que ver con el hotel

review.rating: le personnel reste pour tous les établissements du Viet nam d'une grande patience et très aimable
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Petit dèjeuner très bien

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotels in the Old Quarter Central , was very clean, had the best staff, delicious food and perfect location.This hotel made it very easy to book attractions, find a tour, get a taxi, find good food, etc. Every person in the hotel was friendly and went above and beyond to be sure we had what we needed. Location of hotel is perfect for shopping and walking to the water puppet show.We would highly recommend this hotel to all our friends and family!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk staff is very friendly. They were helpful and always have happy and smiling face. Recommend to stay in this hotel again. By the way, the breakfast was wonderful, Vietnamese style as well as western - porch eggs, hot dogs, bacons. All cooked very delicious and yummy. Vietnamese coffee, cereals also served. Well done . Had a wonder stayed in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This has to be one of the best hotels in Old Quarter. This hotel gives great value for the money! Very budget friendly but the staff was amazing! Mr Martin is full of energy and ready to meet your every accommodations. We were here visiting for our Anniversary and Mr Martin made sure we felt special! He he personally came out to talk to the taxi driver after the previous to drivers came and left because we had so much luggage! The whole staff is amazing! Mr Martin also got us on a tour after it had started we are so grateful for everything!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: bellman rất dễ thương, nhiệt tình

review.rating: A superb hotel in Hanoi Central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Consistent welcome check in and hospitality. Staffs are kind and room is clean. Location is well situated to all amenities such as eateries and shopping.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel in a good location, close to everything, shops and restaurants nearby. the staff was very helpful, nice, you could count on their help at any time. Spacious and clean rooms. I spent 2 nights in this hotel and I will definitely come back and recommend it to my friends.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
la ubicación es perfecta a una cuadra de la catedral de saint joseph.
La limpieza.
El personal es súper atento.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic hotel in the middle of the old town in Hanoi. The rooms were large, clean and surprisingly quiet for the old town (nothing is really quiet here). The staff is very friendly and helpful and can give you recommendations on both delicious and authentic places to eat, and interesting places to see in the old town of Hanoi. Strongly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Hanoi.

review.rating: Pleasant staff with a good location near many amenities.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: This hotel's location is convenient, as it is within walking distance of cafes, shops and a supermarket.
review.comment_negative: The room's TV rack is a waste of space. The flat-screen TV should have been mounted on a wall, thereby releasing more space in the room. The room seems a bit congested.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Right at the walking town center, staff was very nice and friendly, excellent.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location. Friendly and helpful staff, special mention Mr. Martin, Ms Puyoung and Scott.
review.comment_negative: The rooms that we stayed in are small but comfortable. Maybe they can make the cabinets &  furniture layouts functional and make the most out of a small space.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The staff was really kind(💙) and they considered our needs for honeymoon. They gave us a gift -upgraded room! The room looks nice, goot bathroom and great value for money 😍😍

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location was great.
review.comment_negative: Looking a bit drab. Could do with a deep clean in common areas. Rooms are great and very clean.

review.rating: Would definitely return to this hotel next time.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is best location in Old Quarter central. Wifi worked great. Also enjoyed thw buffet breakfast,  The staff was one of the best thing about the hotel. Always so friendly, trying to make sure we had everything we needed. Honesty for the staff alone, I would like to book this hotel again

review.rating: Perfect hotel in a perfect location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I visited Hanoi and stayed at 2 different hotels as we need to travel far. This hotel is beyond my expectations and is the best among all hotels I have stayed. The welcoming drinks and snacks is an eye opening to me. During check in, they provided us maps and explained to us how, when and precautions which is a ‘WOW’ in our hearts. The bed is comfortable and the pillows is superb. The rooms ambience and lightning is also ‘wow’ to me. I like bright rooms instead of yellow lights.  I am so happy when I step into the rooms. All the basic necessities provided and the tv channel has the most varieties of all the hotels I have stayed. Wifi is fast and breakfast is good. Their services is beyond my expectations. Appreciate it. If I ever visited Hanoi, your hotel will be our choice and I do recommend to all who wants a comfy bed, clean,

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Most attractive point of the Hotel is location. In there heart of old quarter of Hanoi with many choice for checkin spot and perfect street authentic foods.
review.comment_negative: a little bit noisy since they did some maintenance on upper floor.

review.rating: Không có thời gian tham quan vì đây không phải kỷ nghỉ
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Đầy đủ các món cơ bản.
Tốt
review.comment_negative: Phòng bên cạnh đóng cửa quá mạnh.

review.rating: Gorgeous stay in the perfect spot
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room was nice and spacious, allowed me to check in early which was super nice at no extra cost. Sorted out bus transfer to cat ba for the same price as online websites charge with pick up from the hotel and drop of at the new one making it super easy and no stress.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Stayed 4 nights, 2 before Ha Long Bay and two after. My initial impression was surprise at the high rating given the small lobby and busy site on a corner in the Old Quarter. The first rooms were in the older part of the hotel and very clean and comfortable .Very nice buffet breakfast with excellent coffee. What really gets the extra star for the Allure are the staff - Martin and Sabi at the front desk were extraordinarily helpful (taught us all about Grab) and attentive. Ready to help with a smile and

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location is great. Very central. The rooms are comfortable. The food is amazing. The roof top restaurant has the best views of the city. The staff are friendly and spoke very good English. Will definitely stay here again. Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I couldn't speak more highly of this place. Not only is affordable but also is totally worth it, you'll get an smile face made out of sauce on your breakfast. The car to the airport is just amazing, the take you fast, and comfortable.  I would definitely visit this place again. Thank you all for a wonderful stay.

review.rating: The hotel staff is fantastic helpful with great hospitality and service.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is very good hotel and very special in hanoi old Quarter. We love the hotel staff and their services is the best of among many hotels we have been to in the world.breakfast is very delicious and our room was very clean and new .we had very pleasant time for our stay here and will tell our friends to come here too.the airport pick up is very easy as organised by the hotel ms Sabi arranged everything for us from the pick up and all the tours and we enjoyed our trips very much.

review.rating: Wonderful Hotel in the middle of Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Incredible hotel location in Old Town central. Best place I ever stayed. The decor, the service, the food, the room. The coffee was one of the best in Hanoi whilst the breakfast was so delicious.The staff went above and beyond in every way. Such a special stay. Would definitely stay again and again!

review.rating: Perfect location, wonderful staff - highly recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed here for a few days during the long weekend. The establishment was very nice, great location, and the manager  Mr Dich was so helpful and informative! He helped book me on several tours, and gave me some wonderful food recommendations. I highly recommend this place

review.rating: One of the best hotel experiences we have ever had
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I absolutely loved my stay here. Right from the start, Phuong made me feel very well taken care of and made sure I had everything I needed. The hotel is very clean and the room is lovely and comfortable. Facilities were great and everything ran very smoothly! Really recommend this place, I stayed here twice during my time in Hanoi. Thank you for a great stay!

review.rating: A great place in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms were very comfortable and the staff were very helpful, central location to all the sites of old Hanoi. You will be looked after with no fuss. The hotel manager was very helpful with any queries and tips on where to shop and booking tours.

review.rating: Great hotel in the old quarter centre and very attentive staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was great, from reception to checkout. I enjoyed my stay so much I came back for 2 more nights . Breakfast was very good.  You will be very happy, and the price was very good as well.

review.rating: Excellent service from very helpful staff, great value, location & cleanliness as well
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: There is a kindly manager Mr Martin check customers condition everyday, and informed trip site. Room condition is good for the price

review.rating: toujours aussi agréable de passer quelques jours à Hanoi
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: l'emplacement est idéalement situé dans le quartier ou je descend régulièrement lorsque je passe à Hanoi . L'hôtel est très agréable et le personnel très serviable ,sans oublier le personnel de ménage qui réalise un travail exemplaire .

review.rating: Not recommended, definitely will not come back .
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Good location
review.comment_negative: Family room is very small, nothing like the photos on the website at all.no sound proof, can hear all noise from outside. No view. Very weird smell in the room and can not open windows. Also charge extra 3% with card payment.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The hotel was only a stone throw's away from the Notre Dame Cathedral! It was very central and had a lot of great shops / restaurants nearby (do your research to not fall into a tourist trap!) The room itself was big enough, the checkin and checkout process was easy and the breakfast was served on the top floor with beautiful views - even of the Cathedral!
review.comment_negative: Our bathroom had a very bad sewerage smell, so we requested to switch rooms (which they were very kind about!) but then the second room's bathroom started to smell the same way so I think it may be something to do with the plumbing - but it didn't impact our stay too much :)

review.rating: Great hotel in the center of city.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing service, I especially appreciated Sabi going out of her way to make my staff very comfortable. She is the best and I will return. She assisted with taxi, restaurants and overall suggestions on where to visit in hanoi. The remaining staff were also good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: An amazing boutique hotel right in the heart of the old quarter and less than 2 minutes walk to the Hoan Kiem lake. The hospitality and friendly staff from Front Office , they made our stay so memorable. Room is very clean and comfortable bed. Buffet breakfast is variety and tasty.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was awesome! The rooms were clean and neat. The receptionist was nice and always willing to tell us where the interesting things are and call taxis when you need. The restaurant on the top floor has an awesome view, the food was good and staff was really attentive, willing to accommodate us the best she could.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Le petit déjeuner, la taille de la chambre et la gentillesse du personnel
review.comment_negative: Le prix de la chambre plus élevé que celui de chambres d'hotels plus confortables à proximité.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed in this accommodation for 4 nights and we really enjoyed there.
We had a family room which was spacious and cosy. Everything was clean, the bathroom big enough. There is no bathtub or shower tub in the bathroom, but this is frequent and usual in Vietnam. At first it was strange to us because Hanoi was our first stop. Breakfast was dilicious, you choose it from the menu. There is a variety of Vietnamese and European kind of breakfast. Coffee is free all the time.but the best thing about the Friends Inn and Travel is their staff. They were so nice, hospitable, helpful. We really felt great, welcomed and safe.I would definitely recommend this accommodation because you have everything here; it is in the centre, there are nice and clean rooms, great staff and agency as well so you can organize some of your trips.

review.rating: Fantastic hotel in the Old Quarter with brilliant staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every one here is so warm, considerate and caring. They helped us book food tour and French restaurant. And the staff cares about our feelings after every trip. I do enjoy the hospitality! Highly recommend Lheritage Diamond. We can keep the luggage at the lobby, go sightseeing and back to take a shower before he headed to the airport. Sabi is one of my favorite staff, just like an old friend.

review.rating: Very comfy bed, good ac and great shower.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: very centrally located near restaurants, coffee shops and bars and easy walk to the lake.
review.comment_negative: we paid extra for an executive room but it was not the same as in the photos online, no sofa and a much smaller room.  we did question this with reception so maybe not all executive rooms are the same?

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great place to stay, you always have everything you need. It's the staff that's makes this place special, they're all amazing, always greeted with a smile. Would recommend to anyone to stay here when they visit Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for a couple of nights and twice returned after trips to Halong Bay and Sapa, organised by hotel staff. The location is perfect for easy walking around the bustling atmospheric old quarter. The staff were friendly and really helpful, answering all our stupid questions with patience and kindness. We would thoroughly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Hanoi, or wishing to undertake the many available trips and tours.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great location in old town Hanoi. Comfortable and clean rooms. Certainly one of the kindest and most helpful staff you could find in the city. Overall, a nice and well located place in Hanoi. Also an excellent value for money. I highly recommend this hotel for a long or short term visit of the city

review.rating: Excellent location, staff was very attentive.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location is great, staff always helpful.
review.comment_negative: The room we picked seemed bigger in pictures, once we arrived the space was very limited as we had big luggage.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: sạch

review.rating: Over all stay at was good, staffs are very loyal and manager James was too co operative
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good and fantastic
review.comment_negative: Nothing everything was gods

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Chất lượng phòng ở mức khá, phù hợp với giá. Ban công cũng tạm, đủ dùng.

review.rating: Friendly local hotel who can’t do enough to make your stay in Hanoi memorable
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a beautiful stay with a wide variety of options for breakfast too! We stayed here for three nights and explored the city by foot everywhere due to its proximity to the heart of the city. The staff were super kind and hospitality at its best!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wow, this place is a gem. Located conveniently in the Old Quarter the hotel is boutique style with the most friendly and attentive staff. . The rooms are lovely, clean and tidy. The hotel has a fantastic buffet breakfast with great food and service. Hotel manager Mr Martin is friendly service and providing us with many good tips and information on Hanoi and Vietnam. We will definitely return here.

review.rating: 睡眠環境が良くないため、次回からは使わない
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_negative: ベッドがあまりに柔らかすぎて寝返りが大変。疲れが取れない。ロビーが狭すぎて混みあう。

review.rating: Great hotel in a perfect location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is centre of  Hanoi headquarter where is very convenient to discover Hanoi city. I have been stayed in city view room thus it was a bit noisy at night but it was still acceptable if you want to have a view otherwise the backside will be a better choice. The room is clean, nice with full equipment. WiFi is free and fast. Most of the staff is nice especially Mr Martin who checked me in is very friendly and helpful. Happy to be back here again

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Great location and friendly staff
review.comment_negative: Rooms are smaller than they appear in photos.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friend staff. Good breakfast. Location was also great, 50-100 meters from the cathedral and close to the Hoan Kiem Lake.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was the first stop on our tour of Vietnam, and our first time in Hanoi, we simply could not fault the service, room was clean and tidy, the staff are wonderful, greetings every time you arrive and leave, always smiling and helpful. Breakfast was great, plenty of options from western to local. Loved our stay and would absolutely come back if we ever return to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location, in the heart of Old Quarter . Modern facility and room setup .Very helpful and welcoming staff that speak flawless English. We would definitely stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel and recommend it to anyone who wants a luxurious experience in the middle of the bustling city.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything and anything you could possibly need was provided with a friendly smile. The facility offers great food and the rooms are very comfortable. the location is very convenient, close to many shops and restaurants. My personal favorite the staff, they introduced us to delicious vietnamese food. We are still guests at the property but I did not want to wait to rave about this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel are so incredibly kind and helpful. The room is generously sized and able to be made ‘romantic’ with petals and such at your request. The breakfast has a range of options and a lovely. The location is only a 2 minute walk from Hoan Kiem Lake and the night market (Friday-Sunday Nights). It’s also very easy to book well-priced day trips/2 days 1 night tours through the hotel. There’s a range of tour options for Halong Bay, we took the Deluxe option and were very happy with it. We also went on the Trang An day tour which turned out to be our favourite day in Vietnam. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Adjoining family room
review.comment_negative: The restaurant too cramped when it's busy.

review.rating: Excellent location in centre of old quarter hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a wonderful place to stay when you visit Vietnam. Clean, comfortable and reasonably priced. What makes it a total standout is the service and assistance from the staff.  Took all the hassle of organising trips away for us and everything they organised was really good quality and with good people. Fully recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel facilities were clean and comfortable, location was awesome and we even got a free upgrade to a bigger room! The staff were all very nice, polite and helpful. I would definitely come back next time I'm in Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: I chose Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond Hotel & Spa after reading reviews in Booking.com. Like everyone, I found Miss Sabi extremely helpful. As soon as we arrived, she drafted our itinerary to the very last day of our stay. Other staff were also very welcoming. Breakfast was yummy. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend L'Heritage to other travellers, and I definitely would stay here again when I visit Hanoi next time.
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The location was ideal, near eateries and many local shops.
Not too crowded and pack.
review.comment_negative:
The shower and bath tub is co-located. One would need to climb up (pretty high) to take a shower. 
Sound proofing in the room could be better as you can hear the closing of doors by your neighbours. 
Room is small as compare to the rest of the accommodation the old quarters.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an excellent stay at this hotel. The staff was extremely friendly and readily available for assistance with anything we needed. Especially rides to and from the airport which was so helpful. The room was very clean,The staff noted it was my birthday from our booking and surprised us in our room with decorations on the bed and also brought me a piece of cake! Very thoughtful and kind! The breakfast was also good and convenient. Location was great and easy to walk around the old quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff service was good. Rooms were big and clean. Excellent location and Very easily assessable to shops and eateries. Breakfast at hotel was very good.

review.rating: Nice and friendly staff I have ever had.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We enjoyed our 4 day stay at this lovely hotel in Hanoi's Old Quarter. It was easy to walk to many of the destinations we wanted to visit. The restaurant breakfast buffet was fresh and flavorful, and other meals in the restaurant were also high quality. Front desk staff offered advice as requested and were quick to make local transportation arrangements when asked. Our room was lovely, with a comfortable bed. The staff was welcoming, attentive, professional and helpful any time we required assistance.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: ubicacion. todo en general
review.comment_negative: todo me gusto

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location is excellent as is the breakfast, the rooms are spacious and modern so it is excellent value.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Can't fault the service here at The Lheritage Diamond  Hotel in Hanoi, we really enjoyed our stay here. Some of the staff made our stay very warm and welcoming, especially Sabi who always greeted us with a smile every morning and catered to every need. We would highly recommend staying here, hopefully we get the opportunity to come back.

review.rating: Un ottimo boutique Hotel nel cuore della città vecchia, personale molto cortese e camera molto bella
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Una bellissima struttura, camera enorme, letto comodo, personale molto gentile.
review.comment_negative: Servizio di lavanderia leggermente più caro rispetto alla media degli hotel ad Ha Noi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel with excellent location located right at the center of the Old Quarter, extremely clean & comfortable. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff, she also makes our trip more interesting with her advises & tips about the city, supermarket, shops, restaurants bars are within walking distance. I would definitely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality. I’m so happy with my stay and that actually was sad to just to leave. Thank you again for going just that little step extra for the guests !!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was by far our best in our trip around Vietnam! The staff go above and beyond to make sure your stay is comfortable and will do anything to help you! Our staff member escorted us to the spa down the street that she recommended to us, after arranging our appointments and everything and scoring us with a discount! The location of this hotel is perfect with everything you want to do and see within walking distance. The rooms were clean and breakfast was delicious! Highly recommend this hotel for a trip to Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well located in Old Quarters area , close to many shops and the lake , which is city central. Property is very well maintained, Service is top notch , staff very friendly and caring towards guest needs (considering we had a early morning checkout with a small kid, they offered us complimentary take-out breakfast ) . Rooms were clean and spacious with all 5-star amenities. buffet breakfast was sumptuous . Travel desk provides good tour options with good English tour guide service.. overall comfortable Value for money stay option.

review.rating: Lheritage Diamond is best location in Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good value for money, this service and hospitality continued for the entirety of our stay giving this place a five star for service. The room was spacious and the balcony overlooking the street was just the icing to a great little one night stay. Breakfast was delicious, we had the Pho (provided by the local next door) with the kids enjoying the pancakes for a change. This is close to everything and is very comfortable and convenient for the traveler.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We made the perfect choice in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. It was truly a home away from home. They made us feel so comfortable, safe and special. We love the hotel staffs and Manager Mr Martin  who made us feel so welcome and made sure we had a wonderful stay in Hanoi. The food was so memorably yummy, The Black Coffee was so heavenly and the hotel ambiance was so lovely. It truly made our 10th wedding anniversary trip so memorable. This is really a star hotel for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Martin and his staff made us feel like we were family. They looked after every little detail and helped us find the perfect tours, they welcomed us with bright smiles and made sure everything in the hotel and room was perfect. The breakfast is superb and starts the day off just right. Close to the sights, easy to maneuver around and definitely the right choice for location.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely place to stay in Hanoi. The location is great and the rooms are comfortable and peaceful. Phuong on reception was an amazing help. She was always there for anything we needed. Thanks Phuong! We’ll be back if we’re ever in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: 位置優越，大部分景點與網紅食店都可以輕鬆步行前往。房間乾淨整潔，枕頭床褥舒適。
review.comment_negative: 早餐選擇比較少。

review.rating: Nice to stay in this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great Location- close to markets, lake & puppet theatre. The main asset is the lovely friendly staff who were so helpful - they helped with restaurant recommendations & directions. Beds were so comfy & the rooms are spacious. There is also a lovely buffet breakfast with great views.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: If you want a hotel in centre of Old Quarter Hanoi , this hotel is the best place you stay.  The rooms are tastefully decorated, with modern amenities and the staff are accommodating, friendly and professional. The art will captivate you and take you on a cultural journey through Vietnam. I had such an amazing and unforgettable experience staying here!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Vị trí tốt gần nhà thờ lớn Hà Nội,
review.comment_negative: Có thể nhân viên quá bận nên ko thể giúp tôi nhiều thứ như mang vali vào trong sảnh

review.rating: Great hotel in the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing location in the Old Quarter and extremely near to the Hoan Kiem Lake. There are local coffee shop, local eateries and a famous pizzeria all within a few steps from the hotel. The room itself is decent and breakfast is just okay. They close their entrance at midnight though, so be prepared with a SIM card so you can call them up to open the door if you were to arrive back later than that.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing service from all the staffs of the hotel. Location of the hotel is superb, near to tourist sights and all the wonderful restaurants.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: being in the centre of the Old Quarter,  within walking distance to most things. Staff very helpful too.
review.comment_negative: Limited breakfast options

review.rating: The best hotel in Hanoi with stylish interior and delicious breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I like hotels room , elegant and clean. The staffs , very friendly and accommodating. I will stay there again if ever i have a time to visit Hanoi again. Thank you Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Property location. Large bathroom with separate shower, bathtub and the balcony of the executive suite
review.comment_negative: The WiFi network was unreliable for the 3 day stay. It prevented the use of laptop in things needing internet. For this reason I recommend the hotel for leisure stays.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great place to explore the city. Centrally located and easy to get to. Lots of shops, food, massage places very close by. Rooms are nice for the price. We had a great stay!

review.rating: The best service and best location!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing experience. The staff were absolutely incredible and rooms very clean and comfortable. As soon as we got here the staff were extremely kind and helped us a lot with booking tours. Overall a great hotel that I would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location was very good, and breakfasts very nice

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: ngay trung tâm, gần hồ Hoàn Kiếm, nhà thờ
review.comment_negative: không có ăn sáng

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great Location, view and close to all the main attractions. The rooms were big, very clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was good and lots to choose from.  We would definitely stay there again. We have great memories at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The hotel is wonderful, lots of attractions in walking distance and the lake is absolutely beautiful. A big thank you to all the staff, you are all wonderful.

review.rating: Amazing staff! So helpful and accommodating !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything like room, facilities, breakfast are great for Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel! But the thing I extremely impressed and highly recommend is the people hospitality from this hotel. That really makes this hotel different. Thank you Martin, Jame and Sabi for your great care.

review.rating: Nice hotel in Old Quarter Area
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a brief stopover in Hanoi and thought it was in a good location- rooms clean and bed very comfy. Breakfast had good choice and quality high. We were returning to Hanoi a few days later but hotel fully booked or we would have gone back. Thank you very much!!!!

review.rating: Great hotel location and Enjoyable stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is at Old Quarter which is convenient to commute another places. Staffs are friendly and considerate.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our first stop in Vietnam was in Hanoi and we booked at this property. From the moment we entered, we were greeted as if we were an old friend. Our room was beautiful and the bed was heaven! Amazing attentive staff there are a credit to the hotel , Mr Dich Amazing attentive staff there are a credit to the hotel .

review.rating: Great time in Hanoi Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A beautiful hotel with friendly staff. Very clean, decent breakfast and helpful staff. There are loads of hotels in Hanoi, so it is hard to choose, but I am glad I stayed there. Great location and reasonably priced. Will definitely stay there again when I come back to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing property and very helpful staff. Great recommendations for meals especially given one of us is a vegetarian. Perfect location and place to stay - we would definitely be back.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed here for 3 nights and it was really good! The room was clean, the bed was comfy and it was really quiet. Great service from Martin, who was very helpful and accommodating, thank you very much! They are quite helpful with booking tours and we're happy to look after my baggage when I was out during the day. I would definitely recommend staying here.

review.rating: helpful staff. value for money very comfortable

review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel  is a stone's throw away from Hoan Kiem lake and we had a very pleasant and comfortable 2N stay. Staff was kind enough to pack us breakfast even when we departed the hotel at 4AM to catch our flight! Thank you very much!

review.rating: It is located at the very convenient place of old quarter Hanoi

The breakfast was great and the airport transportation service was good and the price is reasonable ( cheaper than the taxi we got from the airport) As it is a new hotel, everything was just so tidy and clean. The location is the best. You can easily walk to the lake or the night market within 1-2 mins. It was a wonderful experience to stay with this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.room_type: Suite Executive

review.rating: ONE OF THE FEW BEST HOTEL IN OLD QUARTER HANOI
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had the  room with Church view. Nice, light and airy room! Big bathroom with both shower and tub. The staff is extremely nice and service minded. Very good breakfast! Would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staying at this beautiful hotel in the heart of Old Quarters. Beautifully decorated from the lobby to the the room. The staffs deliver phenomenal customer service and extremely helpful from giving us directions and suggestions on where to go/eat! I would definitely recommend everyone staying here because of the phenomenal customer service! Thank you Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for making our stay here very memorable!We will definitely comeback!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: hôtel bien placé tout près de la cathédrale personnel charmant
review.comment_negative: choisir chambre supérieure plutôt que la chambre standard qui est sans fenêtre

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel is such a great spot!  it is quiet and had a nice spa . The room is comfortable and the bed is the best. Breakfast is excellent for and the service is excellent. Will definitely come back!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotels staff is very helpful and professional. Very nice comfortable rooms. The breakfast buffet is very good, with a lot of western and Vietnamese selections to chose from. I prefer the location to the Old Quarter, it's a quick walk if you want to visit, but it's out of the hustle and bustle. Nice selection of restaurants close to the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Extremely friendly cooperative forthcoming and hospitable staff. I would especially like to mention Martin at the front desk who made us feel so special and important. I shall recommend all my friends who visit Vietnam to stay here once. Thank you so much!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse du personnel et la localisation de l’établissement

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Awesome hotel and comfortable in so many ways. One outstanding feature is the professionalism of the staff. My Sabi at the front desk helped with every detail of my booking - from working out issues with the booking agent to making sure I had the very best room. And all the discounts too! Great location for my needs. Recommended.

review.rating: Absolutely fantastic hotel with the most helpful staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing 2 nights stay at the Lheritage Diamond hotel. The hotel is lovely and clean and In a great location. The staff are honestly some of the best we have encountered on our travels , Martin and His team were brilliant. Everyone helped us with anything we needed, from printing things off, taking us to the bank, laundry, recommendations and booking us a couple of trips. We were sad to leave and would definitely recommend to anyone needing a hotel in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had such a fabulous time at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel that i extended my stay.. twice! The staff make you feel at home and welcome. They were excellent at arranging tours to make the most of my time and budget. Martin even took me to repair my broken bag and Apple sorted out all my personal needs so i could confidently see Vietnam on my own. You will be a lucky traveller to stay right on food street with this charming hotel. Highly recommended.

review.rating: Great end to our trip in Vietnam!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed one night at the hotel. Wish we could stay longer. It is a fantastically nice hotel. The entrance was small and quite discrete, but was absolutely fantastic inside. The lobby and the rooms are very nicely decorated.The breakfast was very good, a good mix of lots of good food from Asia, in addition to English breakfast. The service was top class. The staff seemed genuinely interested in doing their best for their guests, and did so with a smile. We can strongly recommend the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice place, centrally located. Cozy room, also friendly and accomodating staff. Can book tours inside the hotel. Cheap last minute booking available. 24/7 receptionist and security guard is usually posted outside too.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent hotel to stay at in Hanoi. The staff are the friendliest and most helpful that I have experienced. They remember your name and make your experience memorable. Nothing is too difficult including booking cultural events and walking you to the front of the line.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn cũng được, không quá nổi bật nhưng ở tạm thì ổn. Gia đình tôi ở vài hôm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. Staff is really helpful and nice. Breakfast has good. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Location is in the center. Good location for shopping, restaurants, coffee. Additional services and trips can be organized by hotel.

review.rating: this place is a steal for the cost. like most of Bietnam, customer service is top notch and quality is superb.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: amazing staff that was quite accommodating and very helpful. also, great location in the center of all the action. I loved the French balconies.  breakfast was amazing. I had to get mine to-go because of early tours but each time, I couldn’t be Kobe the flavors I was relishing in. even eaten cold at some point. and it is served on a rooftop
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good hotel. We booked this as the end of our journey through booking.com to have some luxury to close it off and relax. It completely lived up to our expectations! The hotel stands out for its amazing restaurant  breakfast and good service. Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff at this hotel made our first night in Vietnam wonderful! It really meant a lot to be welcomed so nicely and breakfast the next day was superb! Also the guys at the lobby were the best! Can't say enough good things about our stay there. Wish we could've stayed there the rest of our time in Hanoi.

review.rating: Fantastic hotel in Hanoi old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really annoyed our stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. It is in a great central spot. The bed was comfy and it was SUPER quiet despite the noisey city. The front desk including Sabi were very accommodating when we needed help with our safe and asked for an extra blanket. They also provided advise for yummy food and booked us transportation to Halong. Food was good at the buffet too. 10/10 would return

review.rating: Comfortable bed and good air con

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent boutique hotel in a great location. Right in the middle of the Old Quarter, it's about a minute walk to St. Joseph's Cathedral and a 2 minute walk to the night market and the lake. The room was great. They do have rooms that face the back of the hotel if you want to avoid the noise. Breakfast had a wide selection of both western and Vietnamese options. One definite highlight was the staff - they were all so gracious, helpful and accommodating. A special thank you to Martin . I needed to print something from my laptop for work and they worked hard to figure out how to print from my laptop to their printer. We loved Hanoi and if we ever get to return, we will stay at the Hanoi Lheritage hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, very friendly staff who are extremely helpful , great room (although no balcony) and a fantastic restaurant with an amazing view over the city centre, the reception staffs are super friendly and willing to share the information from the point of view as the local to me. Highly recommended!

review.rating: Excellent Service, Friendly Staff, Fantastic Location, and Great Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We enjoyed our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. The staff was knowledgeable and friendly and wanted to make sure we had a great experience in Hanoi. Went above and beyond for us. Room was clean and a good size with a cute little balcony. Would definitely come back.

review.rating: HOTEL is worthy to spend your holiday !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had the most amazing experience at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. From the luxurious rooms, perfect location for sightseeing and beautiful food, our stay was made even better with a fabulous team of elegant staff who are there to make you feel cared for at all times. Martin is a lovely who genuinely helped us so much, finding our way around Old Hanoi and looking after us. I feel like he went above and beyond and really appreciated her recommendations, and making sure that we were OK every day of our stay. The hotel itself is pure luxury. Beds are super plush and comfy. A fine luxury hotel that was a stand out on our holiday.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I love the hotel. From location, cleanliness, linens quality, services  to shampoo containers, etc. Also very good value for money. I will come back.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is located in the heart of old quarter. Famous tourist spots like the Hoan kiem lake, water puppet theatre, train street, night market, silk Street, beer street are at walking distance from this hotel. The rooms are great and we'll maintained. The staff is very friendly and helpful. For vegetarians, breakfast options are not many. They usually serve fried rice, veg Vietnamese noodles and bread. Overall we had a good stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
My partner and I stayed at Hanoi LHeritage Diamond Hotel in Aug and were astonished at the incredible level of care and service from the whole team here.We were greeted warmly by the team and our comfortable room was perfect.
Both myself and my partner have never received such excellent care and attention from a team like this, we couldn't believe it.We have stayed at five star hotels and all pale in comparison to the love and comfort we felt at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. I couldn't recommend this hidden gem enough!

review.rating: Reception desk staff was very kind
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I was very impressed during my stay here for 2 nights. One of the receptionists Ms Phuong made every effort to accede to my specific food/tour, and took initiative to check in with how we were doing from time to time. Service from other hotel staff were excellent as well. Our room was spacious and clean, with very prompt room service - we were attended to in minutes with each call. Overall, it is almost a 4 star hotel with a 3 star hotel price. Strongly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: So far my best hotel experience in Hanoi Old Quarter. Prime location - literally steps away from Hoan Kiem lake. I loved the interior design a lot, elegant in every inch I’d say. I was checked in few hours before check-in time. All the staff I encountered (receptionist, manager.) were amazingly amiable and attentive. Thank you!

review.rating: Buffet breakfast and Right in the middle of Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff were lovely and very helpful we were able to stay for 2 extra days which was arranged very conveniently by the staff. Its located right in the middle of most happening place in the Old Quarter. They also help you with booking Halong Bay and Ninh Binh tours which I found a bit pricey. All in All  cleanliness , staff , location , value for money...

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
We booked the suite (801?) and got a higher floor. It was spacious with a terrace and a good view of the Hanoi skyline. 

The breakfast had a good spread, but it was tough for vegetarians. Bread and fruits and jams will do the trick
review.comment_negative:
The bathroom was clogged, and we mentioned it to the reception, but it never got sorted in the two nights we were there.

The room smelt of cigarette smoke and we had to air it to smell fresh. Reception area was messy for a 4 star hotel, and 
 the staff could have been more friendly and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic hotel with wonderful staff.  Hotel has an amazing buffet breakfast with views of city. Location is brilliant is in walking distance to everything. Best place we've stayed in Hanoi.

review.rating: Awesome Experience. Highly Reccomend this hotel for anyone traveling to Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel was wonderful!  The staff were very friendly especially Ms. Saba. They helped us book a tour of Ha Long Bay which turned out to be a amazing experience. The breakfast was a wonderful buffet style with something for everyone including my children who are 3 &5. The location was in the center of everything and walking distance to many attractions! Definitely book this hotel if your going to Hanoi. Wonderful rooms and great people!
review.comment_negative: Our Experience was amazing. Nothing I would change

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room is a good size, clean and comfortable bed. Bathroom very good size. Staff were excellent and helpful. Location is very good.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is the best boutique hotel in Hanoi. The way how they take care there guests is simply amazing. They are really looking at every detail. And they arranging everything for their guests. I will definitely choose, Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for my next stay in Hanoi. Thanks to all the staff !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a great few days stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. In particular we would like to draw attention to one of receptionist Ms Phuong. The room was quiet and the bed was super comfortable. Highly recommended .

review.rating: Great for couples on a budget, but too small for families.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The location was really good. Close.proximity to the night market and other historical places. The staff were very accommodating and helpful. Kudos to the hotel manager (didn't get his name).
review.comment_negative: The rooms were too small for a family of 4. The tv bench was constructed in such a way that a lot of precious space was wastes. Thank god the bathrooms were in a decent size.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A very charming, spacious and beautifully decorated hotel tugged into a quiet corner of Old Quarter of Hanoi. All the modern conveniences are in place. The staff was so polite and accommodating. I really enjoyed the the stay and no doubt will return here next visit to Hanoi.

review.rating: excellent location and attention from hotel's staff

review.rating: One of the best hotels I've stayed at.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Warm, helpful, genuine staff. Great location. Loved our room which was comfortable and spacious. Buffet breakfast view is fantastic. Martin and the team were very helpful and made our stay wonderful.

review.rating: Hotel in the heart of old Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is the first time I stayed in the Lheritage Diamond hotel,we were extremely impressed with their service and cleanliness. The rooms were very pretty and comfortable,The hotel is conveniently located for shopping, restaurants, and sightseeing. They have the weekend market, which is a short walk to the lake.This hotel is the best in Hanoi, and we can’t wait to stay here again in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
