review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It' wonderful place! Hotel is very nice and really beautiful. The decoration is nice, and people in here is very cheerful with us, they always smile when we come back to hotel. Tour booked with hotel is very safe, Mr Martin is excellent hotel Manager.  highly recommend.  We will be back next time .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff really helpful couldn’t do enough for you. Breakfast was adequate. Room spotless and comfortable. Location brilliant.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is so good. Everything in this hotel is perfect. There is a restaurant on the top floor, and the atmosphere is nice. All the staff, including hotel manager  are friendly and answer questions well. If I come to Hanoi again, I will visit. Suggest.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
A nice hotel right in the centre of the Old Quarter. Excellent and friendly service. We stayed here for 5 dáy on and off. Safe.
Walking distance to shops. 24 hour reception service. Thank you. We'll be back

review.rating: Good for the money we paid
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond in a great location that is near, tourist sights, restaurants, The staff are very helpful, and many of them speak English. My wife and I also got massages...we enjoyed them so much...we got them a second time. This is a new hotel with large rooms. The bathrooms are particularly large. I'm 6'3 and 250lbs and its the first room in Asia that I have had more than enough space! Martin front desk agent, can give you great recommendations for bars and restaurants. Dale, the bartender, makes a great egg coffee!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The location is at the heart of old square
review.comment_negative: Room design very bad, bed room is very small, however the restroom is super big, usable area inside the bedroom is very limited

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Sobretodo la amabilidad del manager Martin. Nos ayudó con todo, incluso nos dejamos unas gafas de sol y gestionó todo para que llegaran a nuestro siguiente destino.

review.rating: Super friendly staff and wonderful location.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is my second visit to this hotel,last year as a couple and this year as a solo traveller.The hotel is in the Lake Hoan Kiem district so close to all the sights but set in a quiet street so a good night's sleep is guaranteed The room a  suite with balcony was ample size,clean and cool with the air conditioning.The staff led by Sabi are attentive to your needs.The lake,shops and restaurants are only a short walk away and is an ideal base for discovering Hanoi.I can't wait to go back

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: We really liked the big and computable bad. The room was very nice clean and modern. Bathroom was big.they were very kind and let us make check in at 3am ..
review.comment_negative: The design was international and we whished to have a bit more viatnam ambient.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very clean and centrally located hotel. Close to touristic area. Front desk staff are very welcoming and they are very helpful and make sure you stay at stay comfortable. They also arranged our tour to Halong Bay....

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for one night before heading on a Ha Long Bay cruise and then for another 2 nights when we got back. This hotel is clean and fairly spacious. The service was excellent. The staff were very helpful and attentive and were able to meet all our needs and looked after us during our stay. This hotel is great value and I would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location is great to explore the city! Rooms were comfy and clean, they offered a nice breakfast and the staff was extremely attentive, especially Hana and Martin. They really made it a perfect stay. I'd come again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Old Quarter is definitely where you want to stay when visiting Hanoi for the first time as a tourist. That being said, understand that most of Old Quarter is, well - old. But Hanoi lheritage Diamond did a great job at giving us what we needed: a safe and convenient stay where we can drop our things and explore the city and come back in the evenings for a shower and rest. The value is amazing - it served our purposes and then some (with the daily breakfast so we can fuel up before taking on the hustle and bustle of the city). Most impressive was the staff, who are always polite, friendly, attentive, and helpful.  Definitely more quiet here than the bigger

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location. Staff was incredible. Comfortable room. I was on the front of the building which proved slightly noisy with weekend lake events going on but slept wonderfully in the comfortable bed even so. The tub/shower requires high stepping into which could be challenging for those with mobility issues. Also my colleagues had rooms without windows- it didn’t bother them per se but personally I welcomed the lovely balcony!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location,great room and a fantastic restaurant l with an amazing view over the city centre, the reception staffs are super friendly and willing to share the information from the point of view as the local to me. Highly recommended!

review.rating: Een nachtblind Hanoi op een goede lokatie
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: De lokatie was top en het personeel erg aardig
review.comment_negative: De kamer was erg donker en klein waardoor de uitstraling niet zo leuk was.

review.rating: The staffs are very friendly,helpful and polite.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The location is good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The staff were exceptionally kind and helpful, especially Martin who helped us throughout our stay and booked our travel to Cat Ba.The buffet breakfast  has amazing views from top floor - it was a great refreshing way to start the day.
Very clean and spacious bedrooms. Would definitely recommend.

reviewer.name: Mallo
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My husband and I stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel twice during our visit to Vietnam - best choice we've made! The staff really went above and beyond in ensuring our utmost comfort, from organizing safe and easy airport transfers, providing local recommendations, and serving us a breakfast spread that was out of this world - they also had the best Vietnamese coffee we've had on our trip! We also had a very late flight on our last day in Vietnam, and the staff let us safely store our luggage all day, even letting us use a private room to shower before our long journey. We truly appreciate the hospitality.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Good location close to the lake and comfortable stay

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is in the centre of the Old Quarter short walk to Hoan Kiem Lake. Extremely spacious rooms with very comfortable beds. The staff here are quite simply the best we have met in all our travels. Cannot do enough for you. So welcoming and super efficient. I recommend this hotel highly.

review.rating: Great hotel location in Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel exactly what you would expect a large commercial hotel to be. Was clean facilities all good in the rooms were great.  Let’s stay here again if we wanted to be right in the middle of town.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Das Zimmer war im Vergleich etwas zu klein. Gerade mit zwei großen Koffern. Die Dusche war im Vergleich nicht so schön, da in einer kleinen Badewanne. 
Nichts schlimmes nur zu anderen Unterkünften gesehen.

die angebotenen Tourpreise waren viel zu teuer. Außerhalb buchen!
review.comment_negative: Das Personal war überdurchschnittlich gut informiert und freundlich. Sie haben uns nächtliches Arbeiten ermöglicht und auch sonst beim ankommen in Hanoi geholfen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Ótima localização 
Funcionários atenciosos
review.comment_negative:
Quarto muito pequeno
A limpeza pode melhorar

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Clean good location friendly staff
review.comment_negative: Family room is smaller than in the photo. No room to open luggage.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well worth the money! It was conveniently located! It was clean and the breakfast was excellent. The staff was very helpful and courtesy!

review.rating: Definitely loved this hotel, well worth staying
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing 2 night stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel. The hotel is lovely and clean and In a great location. The staff are honestly some of the best we have encountered on our travels. Everyone helped us with anything we needed, from printing things off, taking us to the bank, laundry, recommendations and booking us a couple of trips. We were sad to leave and would definitely recommend to anyone needing a hotel in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is a relatively new Hotel and is located in  Hanoi Old Quarter where you can find Factory Outlet stores and made in vietnam stores nearby. The Hotel's breakfast and the food served at their restaurant is very delicious. The room was always clean and tidy. The Hotel staff are very attentive and helpful . They even assist us in carrying our luggage in and out of the Hotel. Thanks to Phuong from the Front desk who always find time to give us the Best Options. Will definitely be back and will recommend this Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Posizione molto favorevole, praticamente sul lago con la pagoda e il ponte rosso.
Colazione molto fornita, in grado di soddisfare qualsiasi palato.
Personale disponibile a fornire ogni tipo di servizio. Disponibilità di massaggio all'interno della struttura.
Letti molto comodi.
review.comment_negative: La dimensione della stanza non è grande, ma è comunque fornita di ogni confort.

review.rating: experience at the most worth-visiting place in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location within easy distance of the activity center and far enough away to avoid excessive noise - Customer Service absolutely outstanding

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellently placed hotel. Good service and rooms. Breakfast was good variety. We requested a late check out which the hotel tried their best to accommodate, additionally allowing us to store our luggage and use the premises. Would highly recommend

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed as two couples and the staff went out of their way to make us feel comfortable and secure in the city. We were totally swept off our feet by their hospitality and welcome. This hotel was cheap, yet exceptionally clean and comfortable. Highly recommended for first time visitors. Will carry fond memories for a long time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service here is exceptional. The staff was kind and helpful.Our room was clean and peaceful, vital for toddler-family travelers. The hotel itself is very well located within walking distance of the cathedral and Hoan Kiem Lake. My family highly recommends this hotel and will continue coming back. Thank you again to the staff for the wonderful stay!

review.rating: Excellent staff, Great location, better than average room but get your breakfast elsewhere
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Staff were incredibly helpful and stored my bag while I went north to Sapa.  They were really great and I have only kind things to say about the staff.
Room was good but as most pictures trying to market their business, it did look as good in real life. For the price in comparison to other hotels, I did expect a little more.  Location is excellent, 5min walk to the night markets or lake.
review.comment_negative:
BEWARE: There is no storage room for baggage.   Prior to booking I emailed the hotel to check if there was a safe storage facility I could leave my bag.  This was important to making a booking. But there is no storage room, the bag is stored in the reception/lobby.  Although the reception is attended 24hrs this, this doesnt make the guest nervous.  The hotel would really benefit from having a dedicated storage room for guests to leave their bags.
Breakfast wasn't great, I would book without and get your breakfast locally.
Bed was flush against the entire window, no view at all.
The rooms arent soundproofed at all. you could hear the slamming doors and the elevator etc.  but I was'nt street side so you need to decide what is more suitable for your needs.  Although after my travels in Hanoi, i have come to realise noise reduction is not a priority for any of the hotels.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location
review.comment_negative: Small room and I was on the 9th floor do very noisy in the morning when bf starts

review.rating: Friendly concierge service, lovely rooms, and delicious breakfast buffet in walking distance of nigh
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutely beautiful hotel. Spotlessly clean, wonderful staff, fabulous location and great food. The staff are so helpful and go above and beyond to make your stay the very best that they can. I cannot fault this hotel and would highly recommend for a stay in Hanoi

review.rating: A boutique hotel that is strategically located. We had a Very comfortable stay here.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was so nice and friendly. The room was very clean and fully furniture. Highly recommend this place. I will re book next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. We booked a luxury suite and it was both beautiful and large! The breakfast had lots of variety, was tasty and was not the identical menu every day, which we appreciated. The best part was the staff, everyone who we dealt with was amazing! They are kind, sweet and truly care about their customers. If we ever make it back to Hanoi in the future we will definitely book the Lheritage Diamond again!

review.rating: Fantastic Hotel with superb customer service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I enjoy my stay at LHeritage Diamond Hotel. The space is modern and the location is great. The staff are friendly and helpful.  Highly recommended!

review.rating: Good hotel for the price paid, the staff were very helpful.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: N/a
review.comment_negative: Quite a small room

review.rating: Recommended for those who want to stay longer in Hanoi, esp those who would like to go to nearby cities and provinces fo
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was very close to a lot of stores, art galleries, restaurants and coffee shops that one can never run out of things to do. The staff were very friendly and accommodating and they were easy to talk to. Breakfast was abundant and very satisfying. 

The location was great and most of our tour providers include the hotel as a pick up point, as it's in the heart of the Old Quarters.
review.comment_negative: Rooms can be a bit small and the partitions can use some improvement.

review.rating: Small room for more than one nigh.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Close to cathedral and short walk to popular sights. Plenty of availability.
review.comment_negative: Room was small and shower screen takes getting used too!  Don’t forget to pull the blind when using toilet!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a charming hotel with a great vibe and is in the heart of the bustling Old Quarters. It was great value for money, the room had everything we needed. The staff at the front desk were amazingly helpful and attentive. The breakfast was really nice and they made pancakes on request. They were happy for us to leave our belongings there once we returned from our cruise, and in between our flights, even though we weren’t staying an extra night. I believe the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotels make for a more personal experience. It was a great stay!

review.rating: Great location, friendly staff, tired facilities.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Breakfast on the 10th floor with a nice view. The elevator goes to the 9th floor and requires a short walk upstairs to the 10th. The staff were uniformly polite, friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The facility is very tired and needs a facelift. Upon arrival the first day, I stepped into the lobby and knew I was going to be disappointed. The walls are covered in scuff marks from years of colliding with suitcases, etc. while my room was clean, it had a minute amount of natural light or fresh air as it faced a building over the alleyway next door. The AC was loud but functional. The shower did not drain but very slowly.

review.rating: Great service, location & value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed in this hotel for 2 times, the staffs were friendly and helpful. Excellent location as well since it’s located at the center of the old quarter, just 2 mins walk to the lake. The buffet breakfast excellent provided .Thank you!!!!

review.rating: Efficace et confortable pour une nuit de passage
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
A 2 pas de la Cathédrale et du centre 
Chambre très bien donnant sur la rue , avec double vitrage
review.comment_negative: Peut déjeuner un peu trop classique

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent hotel to stay at in Hanoi. The staff are the friendliest and most helpful that I have experienced. They remember your name and make your experience memorable. Nothing is too difficult including booking cultural events and walking you to the front of the line.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had great staying in Hanoi royal palace. Our bed is very comfortable and clean. Inside the room, hotel provides tea and coffee bags for complimentary. Mr Martin hotel manager, is very helpful and informative. Hoan Kiem lake is very close to our hotel, easy walking!Thanks and we will come back here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: location and comfort
review.comment_negative: the room was a little small for deluxe triple room

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Property is stunning, but the people!! It's beyond politeness, hospitality, or any other corporate buzz word. It was kindness. Martin and Phuong went out of their way to make my birthday so special at this hotel, went beyond what I could have asked for.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked this hotel for a very reasonable price only expecting standard cleanness and service but I actually got way more than that. By far the best hotel we have stayed in Vietnam. The staff, especially Sabi, went above and beyond for us on our stay - recommending activities to do and places to eat. The room was exceptional, location 10/10 and buffet breakfast had a nice variety of food.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I booked a room here last minute and was very impressed with the value. Clean, spacious and modern rooms, helpful and professional staff, and tasty breakfast made for one of the best stays in Hanoi I've ever had. Not to mention it's prime location. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip and I can't recommend it enough.

review.rating: Awesome stay at Hanoi Exclusive Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great choice for a short stay in Hanoi. This is a convenient and centrally located accommodation. The staff are very helpful and trying their best to facilitate your stay in the city. As an Booking.com member. I requested the airport transfer service with the price was very competitive.The drivers where on time for arrival and departure.  The room I got with view , and I appreciated the quiet of the inside room. There are plenty of food options in the area. The hotel is located within walking distance of many attractions and tasty food options. I recommend "Banh my ", about a 3 mins walk from the hotel.

review.rating: Great location and overall decent hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Amazing location in the old quarter, steps from St Paul's cathedral and the lake.
Friendly staff members from check-in to housekeeping, always smiling and happy to help.
Appreciated the extras like a doormen, porter, welcome drinks, umbrella's and lollies.
Breakfast was a decent variety and longlife soy milk was available on some days.
review.comment_negative:
Problematic pipes (?) made room 502 quite smelly. Most mornings I awoke to an intense smell of sewage which generally dissipated when I returned at the end of the day. They were fully booked during our stay so there was no option to upgrade rooms.
Poor drainage in bathroom, water pooled during shower.
The room is small and didn't have enough surface space for 2 medium size suitcases to be flat on the ground.
I thought I was getting a room with a desk but no, it was a drinks trolly. There was no bench seat at the end if the bed as depicted in the pics.
Soundproofing was not perfect but it did somewhat dampen the external traffic noise (didnt do much for all the internal noises from the hall).
Breakfast was on the 9th floor which isn't serviced by lift. You need to walk up a set of winding stairs which may be a challenge for the elderly or mobility impaired.

review.rating: Vị trí thuận tiện, giá rẻ
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: sạch sẽ, giá rẻ, vị trí thuận lợi
review.comment_negative: không có ăn sáng, phòng cách âm k tốt

review.rating: Excellent staffs services, helpful and polite. Always Ready-to-help attitude is very much appreciate
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The place is  new and comfortable also accessible to most tourist attractions. There are many good food and things to see around that area.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sabi has been such a sweet and fun loving lady. We cracked so many jokes with her about our fluffy cat stuffed animal. She had a blast and also made our stay memorable. We definitely would come back just for her service and recommendations! Highly recommend and if you can, strike up a conversation with her! Great English and just can’t say it enough but really recommend staying here due to the great customer service! Center of everything as well.

review.rating: A gem of a hotel in Hanoi’s Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel, just upon checkin, Mr Martin went all the way in introducing us to local restaurants, places of interest. The hotel was in great condition. We had a family suite and we’re surprised to see such a big 2 bedrooms ! Most recommended

review.rating: Great hotel location in Old Quarter central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great hotel in the old quarter of Hanoi, friendly staff, great facilities, an excellent breakfast and a wonderful view .

review.rating: Excellent stay loved the area friendly helpful staff great place to stat
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Brilliant location for Old quarter without being noisy
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Wonderful hotel in Hanoi Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My best hotel in Hanoi. I have no words to describe the fine and kind attention provided. Very comfortable, excellent price, good relation price and quality, clean, the best food in all Hanoi and the brillant attention provided by Martin hotel manager.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel very well located very close to the city heart. Excellent service. Large room very clean. Good room service and breakfast. Staff helpful and proactive Good price,Thank you !

review.rating: Great room , great location , good breakfas
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room is spacious, clean. Water pressure is EXCELLENT. with proper heater too. Hairdryer, fresh towels, adequate toiletries. There's a lift for rooms at higher floors. The breakfast is amazing for their price. With a friendly and helpful waitress. The location is prime. The nearest convenient store . The best cafes are within 20m away.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was amazing! I would come back here just for the breakfast. The spa was also really good and the staff were all very helpful and sweet. The location is excellent.
review.comment_negative: The AC control was not working well

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Old hotel but very clean and well maintained. Staff are exceptionally way above standard and professional. Decent breakfast was included in the stay. It’s between old shops so easy to miss. Overall stay 10/10

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Customer service at this hotel is excellent. The rooms are extremely comfortable and well equipped. The location in the heart of the Old Quarter of Hanoi is perfect. Martin at the front desk and in the  restaurant staff could not have been more helpful and knowledgeable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff is courteous and attentive to our needs and quickly resolved issues to my satisfaction. Hotel is very well maintain and clean. Martin to the staff for keeping us dry from the heavy rain the moment we arrived exiting the car to entering the hotel. Very much appreciated!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Emplacement et taille des chambres
review.comment_negative: Climatisation qui se règle mal, hôtel sans charme, prix excessif, petit déjeuner pas à la hauteur

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff especially Phuong was wonderful and excellent! They made the place very comfortable. They would check in on you and the breakfast was excellent as well.Excellent location and enjoyed the stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I would highly recommend the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for your next stay in Hanoi, Vietnam. The hotel was wonderful to stay in, and the staff was excellent. They were friendly, courteous, and extremely helpful with whatever we needed. I would definitely give this hotel five stars, and I will be staying there again when we go back to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good experience in Vietnam. The staff is very friendly and attentive. The room was very clean high attention to details. They gave a guide on using the shower and information about the hotel amenities to all of the guest.

review.rating: Good value for money and very friendly and helpful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff service was good. Rooms were big and clean. Very easily assessable to shops and eateries. Breakfast at hotel was very good. We had a lovely dinner at hotel too

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed at this hotel after a strong recommendation via Booking website. It did not disappoint. Sabi staff showed great care, attention and professionalism to their work and it made our stay very enjoyable and memorable. Without doubt, we will arrange to book at Hanoi Lheritage again to enjoy their warm hospitality.

review.rating: location and staff lovely.  Pusey a
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: location and friendly staff
review.comment_negative: noise from air con unit and others around the hotel. they gave me another room.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Great Location, closer to major attractions in the Old Quarter, but still quiet and not too noisy.
The staff were helpful and friendly.
The breakfast buffet has a simple but good range of options.
review.comment_negative:
The room is much smaller than what is shown in the pictures.
The lift can be busy as only one serves the whole hotel.

review.rating: Great stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staffs were very friendly, helpful, and welcoming, and they provided a list of recommendations for food and sightseeing in Hanoi. They also can help to organise local tours and cruise tours at great discounts better than many travel agency.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Los y las recepcionistas fueron amables con nosotros y, además, nos prepararon un corazón hecho de toallas en la cama con pétalos de rosa  porque era el último día de nuestra luna de miel. Es lo único bueno que hubo durante nuestra estancia.
review.comment_negative: Nuestra estancia en esa habitación fue pésima. Pagamos casi 85 euros por una suite que realmente no lo era. Olía a humo de tabaco y el tamaño de la habitación era más pequeño que una suite de verdad. El espejo del baño tenía el borde sucio y parecía descuidado. Por la noche me metí en la bañera hidromasaje del cuarto de baño y, ¡sorpresa!, no funcionaba... La alcachofa de la ducha de la bañera tampoco funcionaba y ni siquiera drenaba el agua. Transmití mi queja en recepción y enseguida subieron conmigo a comprobarlo. El recepcionista consiguió drenar el agua pero tampoco pudo hacer funcionar la bañera. Nos dijeron que se lo dirían al manager al día siguiente (era el día que nos marchábamos). Durante el desayuno el manager se acercó para preguntarme que si podía entrar a comprobarla después de nuestro desayuno, y le dije que sí. Cuando volvimos a la habitación, el manager había entrado en ella sin nuestro permiso antes de que termináramos de desayunar. Allí también estaban dos técnicos intentando identificar la avería y haciendo mucho ruido porque elevaron la bañera. No pudimos usar el WC porque estaban ellos y tuvimos miedo de que nos hubieran robado dinero. Cuando se marchaban, nos dijeron que efectivamente la bañera estaba averiada. Un rato después, llegó el manager y nos dijo que para compensarnos, nos dejaba hacer "late check-out" hasta la hora de marcharnos esa tarde. Para nosotros no fue una compensación suficiente porque nos arruinaron nuestra última noche y día de luna de miel. Esperábamos también la devolución del dinero correspondiente, es decir, que nos cobraran solamente una habitación doble normal. Habíamos pagado más dinero precisamente para disfrutar de la bañera hidromasaje. Para colmo, cuando hicimos el check-out, nos pidieron que esperáramos 5 minutos porque tenían que comprobar nuestra habitación. Me pareció un detalle muy feo porque parecía que desconfiaban de nosotros. En ningún hotel nos sucedió esto.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice little hotel with very nice and efficient staff. The superior room was quite small but I didn't mind as I was staying solo. I like how the room is flooded with natural light. The bathroom is small but nice. Good water pressure and toiletries. Breakfast buffet is really good. Will stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, close to a lot of restaurants and sites to visit.
review.comment_negative: Rooms in the pictures always have a view but our window was facing the wall. In the check out staff tried to ask me to pay additional 3% over the reservation I pay by card. I obviously refuse as no such statement was in my booking so ended up paying the original price

review.rating: Very friendly staff and always there to help you . Its  budget friendly and amazing spot near by to main tourist attract
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: front desk admin was really helpful and kind.
review.comment_negative: it’s does not look like the picture at all. breakfast was not good after 1 breakfast we didn’t even bother to eat again it makes you sick. There were some late night check in guest very loud and inconsiderate since the rooms are very close to each other.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A wonderful place to stay in a vibrant, convenient part of Hanoi. The staff were incredibly helpful and full of information to make our stay such a great experience. The bed was super comfortable and the breakfast each morning was delicious.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện
review.comment_negative: Phòng quá chật

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: 쌀국수 맛있었고 과일들이 많아서 좋았네요 뷰도 성당뷰라 아침에 보면서 먹기 좋아요

review.rating: Perfect place to start a Vietnam holiday!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel was clean and well maintained. Suite room was spacious. Excellent spa.  Location close to Cathedral , Hoan Kiem Lake and the old quarter. However the real win was the staff. Friendly and helpful with suggestions for things to do and places to see/eat. Kudos to the entire staff and team at Hanoi Lheitage Hotel!

review.rating: Amazing Stay and Super Friendly Staff

They take care of you as a guest at this hotel as she even gave us her number to text her on our status for our safety even though it was her day off( it was our first time in vietnam). I am also extremely grateful to Mr Martin who helped me in a time of need. I had an small accident in vietnam and he personally drove to the pharmacy to get me some medication. That alone speaks volumes about this hotel and the quality of the staff and service. Everyone was extremely friendly and we were simply blown away.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

My room is charming, very well equipped and comfortable and the hotel breakfast is 10/10. But most of all  stands out for quality of service - everyone working here is absolutely fantastic. So helpful and accommodating, and very easy to communicate with. They even stored our bags for us for 3 days after we checked out, which we were very grateful for. Would definitely return.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is located fun and beautiful part of the old quarter close to good restaurants and tourist destinations like hoan kiem lake. The rooms were comfortable and clean, we spent most of our 2 days here with zero complaints. On top of that the staff were incredibly helpful when it came to organising our trip, taking care of bookings so everything flowed smoothly. Can massively recommend!

Jame at guest service (lobby ) is one of the most politest, most helpful and amazing employees I have ever met. The best smile and attitude of my whole customer experience in Vietnam.

review.rating: Great stay overall, very friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The hospitality is excellent and the front staff is extremely friendly and attentive. We were greeted very warmly upon arrival and the reception staff were so kind and made it a point to map out and give tips on where to eat and attractions depending on our schedule. It is overall a smaller building so the main hall feels a little bit cramped but did not affect our experience too much. 

We stayed 2 separate nights, 1 night before heading to our ha long bay overnight cruise, 1 night on our return before heading to our next destination. We were able to store our luggage with the front desk so we didn’t have to lug all of it with us. They do seem to keep all the luggages out in the lobby around the front reception desk so if you are storing your luggage would recommend to lock things up. We had no issues with our luggage getting lost or tampered with. 

Our first room was small but clean and comfortable enough. The furnishings and decor did seem to be a little worn down however and our shower did not drain too well. We got a different room our second night that was on the “family side” that was much more spacious and shower drain worked well. 

Breakfast was included and really loved the chicken pho they served. Selection was on the smaller side but everything was delicious. It was also located on the top floor sun room that was very lovely. Our second night we had an early morning flight and we had to leave before breakfast started so the reception staff offered to pack something for us to go. We didn’t end up taking up the offer but thought it was nice that they had this option.
review.comment_negative: Facility was decent overall but some decor items and furnishings in need of an update or refurbishing. Also would prefer to have luggage storage in a more secure location rather than in the lobby but we did not run into any issues.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond surpassed all expectations in terms of location, comfort, cleanliness and convenience! The super friendly and attentive staff made the stay even more enjoyable, especially Sabi, who also kept in contact and even provided recommendations when we left for Da Nang! Will definitely be back next time we're in Hanoi! Keep up the good work

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

This didn't bother me much, and I appreciated the quiet of the inside room. There are plenty of food options in the area. The hotel is located within walking distance of many attractions and tasty food options Thank you!

The Stuff was amazing, you could not expect more.. we also love the fact that the hotel has two way air conditioning, if you must know Hanoi could be cold in the winter. And the big shower with its big shower head was indeed helpful for showering a little child, the bed was very comfy, my child has an extra bed in the room but most of the time she was sleeping in our bed, it was big enough for three of us... Thank you for everything! We would definitely come back!!!

review.rating: The best hotel Service and Location!

review.comment_positive: We stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for one night and it was a great stay. Its a beautiful hotel off the street in the Old Quarter. The hotel restaurant was great for  breakfast was truly amazing, with eggs, dim sum, pho, fruit, pastries, sushi, and a ton of other food. But what was most amazing was how QUIET it was. Would highly recommend for a central location with a peaceful stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

The hotel was clean and modern and the beds were comfortable. The real highlight here is the staff though! Everyone was amazing, but especially Martin! He is such a lovely and caring person and he truly went out of his several times and went above and beyond to make our trip special. Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

I will gladly return to stay next time I'm in Hanoi!

review.rating: Lheritage Diamond hotel in Old Quarter central

The bed sheets were new and changed every day I stayed, I must say the cleanliness was the one of the best hotel I ever stayed. Save your time by choosing this hotel for your stay in the Old Quarter

The room size is also perfect. We also used their limousine airport service. Great location, service and facility. We sure will stay here when we visit Ha Noi again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
