Breakfast is good too, convenient especially when day tours start early in the day! The price is super value for money, can't deny that. Staff will try their best to help and advise. Would definitely go back again.

review.rating: Absolutely perfect stay with wonderful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed for 2 nights at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond and were very happy with the experience. We arrived very early in the morning and there was someone on hand to check us in. The rooms are clean and the staff are friendly. We even got breakfast included which is a bonus. The hotel is ideally situated - being close to the Old Quarter - where we spent most of our time while in Hanoi. Thank you for your hospitality.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is very well located in a busy street, ideal if you like close contact with local people.
The room was clean, good sized and well isolated from the outside noise, mattress was huge.
Breakfast was good and the staff was always smiling and attentive. A very decent place to stay for a touristic visit to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Posizione centralissima, a due passi dalla cattedrale di San Giuseppe e dal lago Hoan Kiem. Personale super cortese, sempre molto disponile e gentile, ci hanno permesso di tenere i bagagli il giorno della partenza, per poter ancora girare per la città, e fare una doccia pre-partenza. Abbiamo soggiornato 3 volte, in 3 camere differenti. Colazione soddisfacente, prevalentemente asiatica (poche opzioni dolci). Abbiamo usufruito della spa, per un massaggio rilassante (prezzo ottimo e discreta qualità).
review.comment_negative:
Camere leggermente piccole come spazi (almeno 2 di 3 provate) Una camera aveva una colonna nel bagno, che toglieva ulteriore spazio.
Aria condizionata che emanava odore di umidità.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The staff were very polite and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The rooms and generally the building were quite run down. We booked 3 rooms. All faced a wall. The towels were old and stained. The staff were not able to provide suggestions on good restaurants/activities around the area

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location, near the church

review.rating: Great hotel in Old Quarter central!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff, to a tee, were absolutely brilliant. The hotel is amazing value for money and in a superb location. I would 100% recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is absolutely beautiful inside and out. Location in centre of old quarter ( near Cathedral and Hoan Kiem Lake) . Beds are firm but soft with vert comfy duvet and plenty pillows. Food is absolutely fenomenal! Everyone is so nice and kind and helpful. Keep in mind they are very detailed about everything so make sure you keep the room and stuff in there nice i perserved because they do check it at check in.

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in the old quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a lovely stay in the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Mr Martin was very helpful and friendly. The hotel was in a great location. There was a great selection for breakfast. Rooms were very clean. Would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel Is very clean. Within mins of walking distance to the night market and the lake. Staff are friendly. Very well taken care of by the staff. Awesome for price paid.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: nice and friendly staff. was very clean which is a must for me. good breakfast. excellent location

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great hotel at an excellent location (Old Quarter) in Hanoi. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the room was spacious with a comfy and large bed. Absolutely beautiful views from the restaurant. Would recommend to my friends and family.

review.rating: Booking.com rating is not accurate which is a surprise as I have never been let down in decades
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Staff tried really hard and were friendly always.  The Hotel is well located
review.comment_negative: Smell of sewerage, value for money, very average breakfast,

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Staff behavior.
review.comment_negative: The rooms were very small and we booked a room with a balcony view , but we didn't get that. Not value for money.

review.rating: Lovely hotel in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing! Breakfast was so good! The location is Amazing, Close to All the attractions. Staff was Very helpful and Kind. Everyday, when we came back in the Evening, we got a clean Room! Beds were so comfy. Definitely recommend!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Tọa lạc vị trí trung tâm, ngay bên nhà thờ chính của Hanoi, trong khuc vực phố cổ và hồ gươm

review.rating: Beautiful hotel a short walk from the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We spend two nights here in October 2023. The staff is so friendly and service minded. We really enjoyed staying here . The hotel is great located just near the Hoàn Kiếm Lake and the Old quarter. We booked two rooms with connection door which was perfect for us (family of five, two adults and three children), the hotel also helped us arrange transfer from the airport to the hotel and to Halong Bay on our day of departure.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location, staff, tour desk specially Mr Martin was very accommodating and excellent in his service. Highly recommended. Breakfast was excellent and varieties.
review.comment_negative: All good.

review.rating: Very nice and clean, staff are helpful
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location
review.comment_negative: Na

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Very boutique hotel right on top one of  shopping centre in middle of Old quarter Hanoi, very convenience for shopping and food, (very close) to Night market,Cathedral etc..
 the room very beautiful and modern, bed are comfy and toilet are big and very clean.
Staff are friendly and attentive, hotel rooms are very well designed and cosy.
Highly recommend this hotel to everyone next time when visit Saigon.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great time staying at the  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Room was clean and comfy, with a cute little balcony for you to check out the street below. Super close to the central lake area, and convenient enough when you use Grab to get around. Service is also wonderful, they give a good detailed breakdown of the sights and also suggest an itinerary based on what you like to see.  would recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every aspect of my experience at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was exceptional. Located in one of Hanoi's most eccentric neighbourhoods, the rooms are chic in design and spacious in comfort. Even though the hotel is located on a busy street, the rooms keep the noise out for a comfortable sleep. Martin the manager, easily resolved a booking conflict with such grace that at any other hotel would have made a big deal. They truly cares for their guests with genuine kindness. You will be in very good hands. My sister and I stayed for four nights with one of their packages, which we highly recommend. We plan on going back to Hanoi and will definitely book with them again.

review.rating: An excellent stay at Hanoi Graceful Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Me and my husband stayed at this hotel for our vacation. It’s in the old quarter, easy to find. The hotel is comfortable and the staff is nice. A girl called Phuong was very attentive and she helped us a lot. We had our perfect experience here. We recommend this hotel to you.

review.rating: ทำดีเล สงบ พนักงานใจดี
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: พนักงานช่วยเหลือดีมาก ภาษาอังกฤษใช้ได้ อาหารเช้าอร่อย โดยเฉพาะ Pho ฝากกระเป๋าได้
review.comment_negative: ห้องเล็กกว่านี้รูป มีเสาในห้องทำให้ ขัดๆ

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My stay in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was enjoyable and comfortable. The hotel is on good location, well ventilated, clean, service prompt, Great hospitality, Good health friendly breakfast. Most is the attitude of the owner. He offers personal involvement, care and offers great tour guidance. He takes extra care to ensure cozy and comfortable stay of elderly guests. Worth the money spent. Would look forward to recommend to my relatives and friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a great boutique hotel in the central of Hanoi. Very convenient with an accommodating staff. Martin- the manager who went out of his way to assist in transfer, providing recommendations and tour’s information. He even answered all my questions via WhatApps anytime, that’s brilliant! Breakfast was also pretty good. I highly recommend this place!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was amazing! They helped us schedule transportation to and from the airport and upgraded our room. The service was exceptional, the room was beautiful and the location was perfect! I highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is amazing! The location, staff and rooms are phenomenal. Any question or need we had was responded to with enthusiasm and solutions. If you're going to be in Hanoi, this is the perfect place to stay!

review.rating: An amazing location, an amazing hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good central location,helpful friendly staff speaking good English. Room So beautifully decorated, amazingly comfortable beds, nothing was too much trouble for all the wonderful staff, who go above and beyond expectations. Breakfast was fabulous with so much variety. In a great location. Definitely 5* and would highly recommend and stay again if I return to Ha Noi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: tốt
review.comment_negative: ko

review.rating: Wonderful respite in craziness of Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for three nights, booked for us as part of a tour booking with Halong Tours. The rooms were decent size and king size bed was comfortable, we had the best sleep! The windows were double glaze so it was incredibly quiet. In a great location on the edge of the old quarter, lots of good food along the street for a quick meal, although full of tourists and at tourist prices. We were able to leave our luggage when visiting Lan Ha Bay and Sapa which was really convenient. The staff were really friendly and helpful.  I’d stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in an excellent location in the Old quarter close to everything, with lots of life but in a quiet street. The most remarkable thing, however, is the excellent attention of all the staff. I would like to highlight Martin,Sabi,Jame - their kindness, professionalism and help to the passengers. We stayed many days in various stages and everything was always easy thanks to them who helped us to organize excursions, book transfers, etc. at very reasonable prices with very good service. We enjoyed our stay with them very much. Very good value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The stay in your Hotel was a wonderful experience. Kind stuff and a good morning buffet. We enjoyed the stay in Hanoi with its people, The Hotel is super located. You can go by foot to all touristic places. The wellness area is also relaxing and u get easy an appointment.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
La amabilidad del personal del hotel, muy limpio, la ducha muy buena, la ubicación es espectacular 👌🏼 

Nos ayudaron con todo lo que necesitamos durante la estadía
review.comment_negative: La habitación en la que nos hospedamos un poco pequeña para el standar de los hoteles de Hanoi

review.rating: Very beautiful and large rooms - staff are fab! Currently no amenities like spa, restaurant, pool.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The location is in an lot quieter part of Hanoi but very close to the lake and the main quarter.  The rooms where beautiful and very larger with a great big balcony - we stayed on the 9th floor.
review.comment_negative: The hotel does not have breakfast (even if you pay for it and they are renovating their restaurant and spa).  They have no amenities like pool, spa, restaurant etc.  It is very nice is you can get over that part and there is a lot of cafes and restaurants nearby!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff are very friendly and they will always make you feel at home. The location is great and the room is comfortable. The breakfast on the 10th floor was great, I would like come back Hanoi Lheritage Diamond again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect, room so clean, bed so comfy, all staffs helpful, really nice and friendly, My friend and I was impress in this hotel and loved it all. Next time this hotel is only one choice that I wanna stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Lhertage Diamond hotel just recently and I must say the overall customer service was fantastic. Special gout out to all the staff especially Sabi who was very helpful and accommodating. Hotel is very central and a short walk to everything.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
we stayed at the Lheritage Diamond hotel for 2 days and we had amazing service the whole time. All the staff were very friendly, especially Sabi. The rooms were really comfortable, clean and very spacious. The breakfast was also great.
Overall we had a wonderful time at the hotel and highly recommend it.

review.rating: Highly recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very beautiful hotel in a very central location within the Old Quarter of Hanoi. Rooms are just good and well equipped. The staff is very helpful and kind and speaks good English. The breakfast was really delicious with excellent quality local and intercontinental food .This is the place for you.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, friendly staff and good value for money, overall great stay
review.comment_negative: Only downside is lack of storage space with only a small wardrobe and no space for bags or toiletries

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Starting from the entrance, hotel is very prominent and easy to be identified. All staff were very friendly and welcome upon arrival. Checking in was very smooth without any issue and the room was very clean with 2 different pillows and comfortable beds. Hotel breakfast have many different variety to choose with different menu each day. Hotel location is very near the Old Quarter Lake with less than 5 mins walk. There are convenient stores nearby to get all necessity. Overall, it’s been a great and pleasant stay which will choose again the next time in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Amazing hotel, great service. Sabi very helpful at check in. Martin and James are also always so friendly and helpful! Great location everything within walking distance. Rooms are cleaned everyday and topped up with bottle water and coffee.
Great price, If I go to Hanoi again I will stay at this Hotel

review.rating: A Gem in the Heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel offers great value for money. Centrally located in the old quarter of Hanoi makes the Lheritage Diamond accessible to most of the attractions in Hanoi. It is on a short quiet street which is important in the old quarter. New accommodations means that everything works as expected, plumbing, however, is the staff. Exceptionally friendly, courteous and helpful. They anticipate your needs and have a full range of travel services. Left luggage, escorted train terminal trips and even last minute showers are the types of extra services you can expect. I was very impressed at how the staff worked together to ensure my stay was comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone in Hanoi, but especially family travelers.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The hotel is lovely. The executive suite was great. The bed super comfortable, nice balcony, nice bathroom. Staff super friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: I have nothing negative to say. I really liked the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Good location
review.comment_negative: Hotel lobby and rooms smelled of incense. Nosie from school nearby on certain days in the morning. Average breakfast for a 3 star hotel. No city view as claimed on booking.com, window looks out to a wall of a tiny alley.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location, clean, spacious and friendly staff thank you the manager name Martin. he was kind and helpful. the service was great. Hopefully can get the special price for our next stay. We'll come and stay for our next trip. Thank you all.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a great, well-priced hotel in a great location in Old Quarter. A lot of other great reviews on rooms, but I wanted to leave a review about the service - which is incredible!  I highly recommend this place for all Indians as you also get the Indian Food over here. In addition they also provide Tours on a very good & cheap price….I went to Halong Bay, Ninh Binh though them….

review.rating: Fantastic hotel located in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel for families, affordable clean and friendly.

Breakfast buffet is sufficient and service always friendly.

Spa service was excellent. Location is great and lots within walking distance.

Finn is the greatest. Sabi is amazing

review.rating: Great hotel in a good location.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is the second time I've returned to the hotel. Everything was great, the staff were very friendly, they even remembered my name - this is a great thing about the service that the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel provides. Another thing is that you can find help from any of the staff, they are great at knowing everything.

review.rating: Great hotel, amazing staff & top location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel, lovely rooms, great location in Hanoi Old quarter central and the staff were incredibly helpful and helped us organize transfers to ha long bay. Great service and lovely people. Thanks for great recommendations and a lovely trip

review.rating: polecam ze względu na super lokalizację, dobre śniadania
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: lokalizacja
review.comment_negative: mały pokój, okno na ścianę kolejnego budynku

review.rating: Perfect Hotel in central old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfect hotel, would definitely come back for my next stay ! Rooms Amazing! Brand new, well furnished and decorate. Perfect service, welcoming, always ready to answer your request. Staff all speak perfect English. Good advise to go around Hanoi. Breakfast : Products are of quality, large variety of choice and perfect service. Western but also Asian fresh products.  Location: Excellent location, in the old quarter of Hanoi. Everything is accessible by 5mn walking. Excellent value in overall. All the staff make an effort to make your stay memorable. Thanks again !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location and service. The time here was enjoyable. Will definitely recommend for my friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for 2 nights in Sep 2022. The room was clean and the beds were pretty comfortable. It’s located in the heart of the Old City, and there’s tons of shopping and food all around. The staff were super nice and helpful. We can say we were very happy with everything and look forward to returning to this hotel.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel good service and great location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The staff was very helpfull 
Martin made our stay very easy
review.comment_negative: The room wasnt cleaned very well after cleaning service and when it was busy at the breakfast , the staff didnt had time to comfort the guests needs (no service ,no food)

review.rating: Nice room, clean room and good location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room is great and clean, location is also perfect with plenty of food and street stalls around.We stayed 3 nights and the staff allowed us to store our luggage while we had 1 night stay at Halong Bay. Great Buffet Breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: In total I spent 3 nights at this wonderful hotel. Located in a quiet street, but close to all facilities in the old town. The staff were very friendly and helpful, especially with my luggage that didn't arrive on arrival at the airport. For the money, you will get a high standard room, with all the facilities you need.
review.comment_negative: The restaurant/breakfast was not open yet, because of the COVID restrictions. But this was known before arrival.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I enjoyed my stay here. Very central location in the Old Quarter, room was quiet nevertheless. Very comfortable bed, good shower. The manager and the receptionist are very friendly and helpful with a lot of advice. I would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. It is beautifully appointed, and all brand new. I was particularly impressed with the wet-room bathroom, but everything in the room was well thought out. The staff were amazing. All spoke fluent English and could not do enough to to help. Plus, it was very reasonably priced. Definitely stay here if you are coming to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Staff was good breakfast was ok
review.comment_negative: Though the staff were great the rating and price for this hotel is exaggerated. It is a clear 3 star and not a 4 star which are available for around Singapore $50-60

review.rating: Excellent hotel in the heart of Hanoi's Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent boutique hotel in a great location. Right in the middle of the Old Quarter, it's about a five minute walk to St. Joseph's Cathedral and a 2 minute walk to the night market and the lake. We chose a room with a balcony, and so it faced the street,  And it was great having a balcony to be able to step outside to watch the traffic chaos below. They do have rooms that face the back of the hotel if you want to avoid the noise. Breakfast had a wide selection of both western and Vietnamese options. One definite highlight was the staff - they were all so gracious, helpful and accommodating. A special thank you to Martin. We loved Hanoi and if we ever get to return, we will stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My family and I stayed in many hotels during our time in Vietnam and this was definitely our farvourite. The staff were so kind and accommodating, the rooms were lovely and clean and the breakfast options were delicious! Could not recommend this place more. I Will definitely be staying here again when I visit next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân làm việc cũng nhanh nhẹn. Ban công phòng là nơi duy nhất khá tốt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lần đầu về thăm Hanoi , tôi rất ấn tượng với phong cách dịch vụ của khách sạn, đặc biệt vị trí trung tâm phố cổ, 3 tháng tới trở lại Vietnam,tôi sẽ ở lại khách sạn Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The stay here was adequate we only stayed one night and was one of the most expensive places we have stayed in. The staff were lovely and offered to put us in early after a long night on the overnight train, our room would be ready for us in five minutes if we paid a hefty price otherwise we would have to wait till afternoon, this is the first time this has happened and although I understand check in times are required if the room is ready then let us in!!
review.comment_negative: It was fine and staff were very friendly

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên tuyệt cời
review.comment_negative: Hơi ồn.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nói chung là khá ổn. Phòng có ban công nhỏ, đủ để đứng. Sạch sẽ.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location was good.
review.comment_negative:
The room facing the street was very noisy and noise from the passage was clearly heard.
The dining room tables and windows were dirty.
We left our room to go out at 11:30am and returned about 4pm to find our room was not serviced even though we had left the “please clean our room” sign on the door.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service from the moment we arrived through our departure was wonderful. The staff were excellent, super helpful, polite and very friendly. The hotel has a great location. I highly recommend this hotel. Ms. Sabi, our guest officer, goes above and beyond to provide excellent service. She extends a helping hand, especially in terms of food and tours. She even offered to be on whatsapp if we have any questions.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: I had a wonderful stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. It is perfectly located in the Old Quarter in Hanoi and the staff were exceptionally helpful, polite, and friendly. The food was also fantastic, I would recommend this stay to anyone wanting to visit Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
It was the best choice for us the book holiday emerald. The location is so central we could reach all the major tourist attractions easily. The breakfast on all days was excellent. A good choice for veg and non veg.
A special shout out to Jame and Martin who was very helpful with our early checkin and very informative about local things.
Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Hanoi.

review.rating: Great Place to Stay in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cannot fault this place in anyway, great location, really nicely styled and designed, rooms very comfortable, great spa, and best of all the service from the staff was as friendly and helpful as we could ever expect. We would particularly like to thank Martin and Sabi who were not only friendly but went beyond expectation. The location is perfect for the old town, in the middle of things but in a reasonably quiet road. Our first ever trip to Vietnam and this was a tribute to a lovely country

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Came here to treat myself for my last night in Vietnam. Beautifully designed boutique hotel with great staff. Quiet rooms, very convenient location in the Old Quarter .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We had gone to Hanoi for a week's trip. Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was chosen by us considering it was at the centre of Hanoi. The location was absolutely perfect, being right in the middle of the Old Streets, just about 50m from Hoan Kiem lake.
The room was very comfortable and in good condition. Service by the staff was very prompt. Good food preparation by the cooks (though, I would've hoped the heating would be a bit better at the food counter).
The reception and tour information desks were very kind and helpful, advising us on many of our trip itineraries.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Situated on the edge of the night time entertainment area in the old quarter of Hanoi. My room was quiet, clean and comfortable with a large modern shower room. Breakfast buffet choices were excellent with eggs, omelettes etc. cooked to order. Beautiful dining room which is sadly underused as they only seem to serve breakfast in it. The staff were friendly, helpful and very professional at all times. I made a good choice of Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location brilliant. Staff lovely.
review.comment_negative: Rooms were a bit dark.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We totally recommend staying here! The staff were amazingly helpful & friendly! Clean room, nice breakfast

review.rating: Excellent location and amazing staff that were so attentive
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our 4-nights stay a week ago was superb in every way. The room was extremely comfortable and spotlessly clean. The staff were accomodating to our requests, friendly and well-trained. The hotel is located amidst the historic district and ideal for walking around and shopping. In summary, we could not have been more happy with our stay. It was excellent.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Staff was very professional and helped with everything!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A genuinely hospitable and welcoming place to stay. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond and would highly recommend it to others looking for comfort on the edge of the old quarter. It was the staff that made this stay particularly enjoyable. They made our stay the wonderful experience that it was! They were incredibly helpful and went over and beyond expectations with information and advice on places to visit and further travel options.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment I walked in I felt like I was pampered! Don’t think I’ve ever had a hotel stay so lovely. Everyone I met was incredibly nice and helpful. Ms Sabi was always around to greet me with a smile and share a ton of awesome information, and book some tours for me. I will definitely be back!

review.rating: Amazing hotel with great staff and location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The staff was very nice and helpful, in special thanks to Martin, Sabi and James. Great location and views.
The buffet breakfast was super complete with a mix of European and Asian options. The room was comfortable and clean.
If we come back to Hanoi, we'll stay here again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is perfect. Breakfast is delicious. We stay here for three nights and they do change the varieties of the breakfast buffet. Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel has the best customer service! We stayed here for three nights. They kept our luggage when we’re out for Ha Long Bay 2-day trip, have a lot of good things to say. All these small little things mattered! The Staff in  Hotel is fantastic! I will definitely stay here again if we’re coming to Hanoi next time!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức khá. Phòng sạch sẽ, ban công là một điểm cộng, dù nhỏ.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lage, Zimmer, Bad, Frühstück
review.comment_negative: Klimaanlage (Funktion fragwürdig, entweder heißoderkalt), Fenster direkt gegenüber von anderem Haus. Man hätte sich die Hand durchs Fenster geben können. Dementsprechend kein Tageslicht im Zimmer.

review.rating: Stay in this hotel you will loves it
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay at Lheritage Diamond hotel. Excellent accommodation in a perfect location. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and the room was clean and the bed was large and comfortable. The buffet breakfast had beautiful views of the city and  had a great range of options. I would highly recommend this hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My husband and I stayed there for a few days in 4/2023. Mr Martin the hotel manager, was very efficient and kind in his communication for the booking. He also arranged for a very nice Halong Bay cruise for us - definitively worth booking through the hotel rather than on the web. The hotel offers a pick up/drop off service to/from the airport, which is a very reasonable cost given the long ride. We were upgraded the first night (before leaving for the cruise), I guess it was for our honeymoon. The nights afterwards were as fine as all the rooms are very design, with nice wooden floor, marble bathroom and  shower. The breakfast is excellent. And above all: the service. The staff is so nice and friendly, and it feels genuine. Also the hotel is located perfectly in the old quarters. We would definitively recommend this hotel and stay there again next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Le petit déjeuner avec une belle vue sur la cathédrale est vraiment un plus.
L'emplacement est idéal en plein cœur de la vieille ville.
Le personnel n'était pas le plus chaleureux rencontré pendant notre voyage mais ils étaient quand même professionnels et aimables.
review.comment_negative: Pas grand chose !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_negative: Phòng cách âm không tốt, cửa phòng khác mở gây ồn. Nhân viên tự ý mở khóa phòng khi khách đang trong phòng. Không xách giúp hành lý cho khách khi ra xe.

reviewer.name: Rowena
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice comfortable room, great interior, nice that it came with breakfast at the price it was. It was a great location too, close to all the shops and night market, would definitely recommend and stay here again

review.rating: We had high expectations since we stayed at the same hotel 3 years prior, but our stay now was pretty disappointing.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is fine.
review.comment_negative: Not clean, rooms look like they haven’t been maintained since construction of the hotel. We stayed at the hotel 3 years prior and then the rooms looked pretty decent. Now not so however.

review.rating: Great Price for a Greater Value!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
It is located in a very convenient spot. Staff are very helpful and friendly.
The room and bathroom are clean.
review.comment_negative: NA

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I experienced the best hotel in my life. The staff were very kind, the room and bathroom were very clean, and when I came back from going out, it was well organized. The breakfast was excellent . I really want to go back to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond! All the staff were kind, but the best was Martin. He had the best sense.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond in Aug this year as part of wider Vietnam trip. This was my favourite Vietnam Hotel . The people who run the hotel are just lovely and friendly and really want to help you and to make sure you have a great time. I stayed at the Lheritage Diamond and their sister hotel the Hanoi Lheriage , both are ideally located to explore the famous sights of the old quarter. The rooms are lovely, the beds so comfortable. You really can't go wrong with choosing this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent from check in to check out. I used their airport transportation pick up service which was great. No issues. The room was comfortable, and very nice touches like a note and rose pedals. Bed was very comfortable. The buffet breakfast was excellent! Also the hotel is right next to Hoan Kiem lake and Cathedral which was very convenient . Highly recommend.

review.rating: Excellent hotel in Centre Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: everything was great, location is just steps to the lake , And around the hotel there are many coffee shops and you have to walking about 5 minutes to walking Street.

review.rating: Super hotel in a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great stay in Hanoi after 2 days elsewhere, upgraded room which was nice. Guest relations is covered by Ms Phuong who is a great help with local knowledge and trips.  We would definitely stay here again if we are lucky enough to return to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: location is great, staff welcoming and polite, room clean and comfortable, breakfast pleasant, highly recommended and would definitely book again when back in Hanoi in the future

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: 我們從Sapa回來後，同樣入住此飯店。當晚接待人員為James，非常熱心提供我們前往樂天百貨的方式，服務優秀。隔日退房Sabi 總是充滿笑容協助排解我們的難題。服務人員真的都非常棒

review.rating: A fantastic place to stay in the Old Quarter.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Friendliest/kind/ attentive staff at bespoke hotel. Martin was very caring and friendly staff I’d highly recommend the place.
Located quiet side of the city so no issues about sleeping at night. Breakfast was also very nice!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The staff went above and beyond in all aspects of service. The room was new and clean. The location is perfect...close to everything...but on a quieter street. Every morning you can enjoy an incredible breakfast on the top floor with a view of the lake and city. My wife and eleven year old daughter agree with me that this was probably our favorite big city boutique hotel experience...ever. Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I felt like royalty the whole time in Vietnam. Martin,Sabi  provided an incredible service during our stay in Christmas time 2023. Overall 10/10, decoration, food, service and location. Definitely I will recommend this place to my friends.

review.rating: Buena relación calidad /precio y hotel apropiado para viajar en familia
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Bien ubicado , personal amable y limpio
review.comment_negative: Estuvo todo correcto

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative: NA

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Extremely friendly and all round supportive staff. Excellent breakfast, for both quality and quantity. Very nice location, with many shops and restaurants. Clean, nice rooms, fully matching the website photographs.

review.rating: Clean and spacious hotel rooms conveniently located in the old quarter.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We just spent 3 nights at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond and had a fabulous stay there. Location of the hotel, friendliness and helpfulness of all the staff (special mention of Martin) who helped us with all our requirements, food, etc. Was excellent. We would love to get back there for our future trips.

review.rating: Exellent place, great location, best staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I absolutely loved my time at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel! The staff were genuinely friendly and very helpful.They seemed to really want my stay to be amazing. I wish I had stayed longer. I had planned for most of my time to be in Hoi An... and only stayed in Hanoi for two days. Thanks to the staff and tours they had recommended, I now have a great impression of Hanoi and the people. I hope to visit again someday. I highly recommend Hanoi Lheritage! Thank you!

review.rating: Great hotel in Hanoi old quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is wonderful. It's in a perfect, tucked away location in the middle of busy old town but the hotel and rooms and quiet and tranquill. The rooms are big and clean with good aircon and breakfast was a good buffet with a view. When we arrived we were greeted by Martin who gave us lots of advice and a map about where to go and how to get there. He was so helpful! She organised tickets for the water puppet show and a day trip to the Ninhbinh. We had to checkout before leaving Hanoi and she stored our luggage for us and allowed us to use the shower in the spa before our overnight train. She was always happy to help and was very friendly. Thank you Grace for making our stay so effortless!

review.rating: Would definitely return to this hotel next time.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Warm, helpful, genuine staff. Great location. Loved our room which was comfortable and spacious.Buffet Breakfast good view is fantastic. Martin and the team were very helpful and made our stay wonderful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent location in the Old Quarter. Very helpful staff right from the front desk to the restaurant and the bar.. Staff take interest in knowing your first name and always greet you by your first name, proving they take an interest in you. The front desk can make Grab bookings for you which saves the hassle if you can't speak Vietnamese to a taxi driver. Also Grab you know up front your costs and my word Grab is cheap and convenient in Hanoi. I fully endorse Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for the astute traveler who cherishes comfort and a home away from home

review.rating: Great hotel and value for money !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great little hotel in the madness that is Hanoi Old Quarter. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Sabi at reception arranged a fabulous 2 day cruise for us to Halong Bay and taxis too and from the airport. The hotel is near the lake where you can access the open top bus to all the attractions on offer in the city, also have a lovely evening stroll.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great location unfortunately I booked superior room as only ones left where de lux

Could not swing a cat in the room very cramped
review.comment_negative: Install a new coffee machine to suit westerners who like American or latte

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff is excellent and very helpful. Phuong in particular helped us arrange tour which is very professional.The hotel location is the best in Hanoi old town and this is very convenient to us who are the first time of visiting Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Todo limpio y personal estupendo

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Location is excelent near St Joseph Cathedral
Very friendly staff
Modern amenities
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast options can be improved
The area for breakfast is at 10th floor - there is also the kitchen, you will end up smelling like the food
Matress was a little too hard

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: L’emplacement. La gentillesse du personnel. Le petit déjeuner.
review.comment_negative: Il ne faut pas prendre une chambre qui donne sur la rue. Trop bruyant avec la circulation

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was excellent just right next to the Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral. The room size was good and the bed was vert comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with decent buffet selection and guest can also order from their ala carte menu which is included. Finally special thanks to all the staffs who made our stay memorable especially the manager and also Martin... Will definitely stay here again if we visit Hanoi again!

review.rating: Great hotel in Hanoi old quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It's my 2nd time staying here. This time, brought a group of 6 friends with me. All of us are pleased and felt totally comfortable with everything provided, especially the service staff. You can easily contact the hotel in advance before arrival and be assured of any assistance required.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with great views from the restaurant. The staff are excellent and the breakfast was amazing. Located right in the center of the old part of the city, there is so much to do in the surrounding streets.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were so nice. They handled everything with smile always. If you need something in your journey, just ask to staff. They will handle everything . Definitely would recommend  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond if you're heading to Hanoi, specifically to Old Quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Was my first time in Vietnam and the staff, Martin and staff in particular, for Lhertiage diamond were the kindest most accommodating people I’ve ever experienced in a hotel stay. They arranged a transfer to the hotel from the airport, a trip to Ninh Binh for us, and we’re always super positive and looking to help us out. The area was great, right next to a great Bun Cha place when it’s open, and great for walking around and exploring the craziness that is Hanoi.

review.rating: Absolutely the place to stay when visiting Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The reception was very friendly. We were given iced tea and a flannel to cool off with as soon as we arrived. One of the staff took our bags up to the room for us, which was very welcome after a long day. We needed to take a taxi to the bus station for a tour early in the morning - the receptionist booked this for us an organised for us to have a takeaway breakfast. Service was above and beyond our expectations. The room was spacious and the bed was the most comfortable one I’d slept in so far. I would definitely recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Hotel Location  in the heart of Hanoi's Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great value for a new hotel in a good location. New and clean facilities, comfy bed, fast Wi-fi, and wide range of breakfast spreads including freshly done pho, eggs and pancakes. Even the water pressure from rain shower was excellent. More importantly the staff were very helpful attentive and friendly. Thank you and We are looking forward to our stay again at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Vị trí ngay trung tâm, đi bộ ra hồ Gươm rất gần
Nhân viên lễ tân và phục vụ rất chuyên nghiệp, lịch sự

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: El trato del personal

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The standard of service at this hotel is equivalent to anything you might experience. All the staff were very attentive and fully engaged all the time. We stayed in a small but very cleverly designed room with a large double bed and a shower room separate from the toilet and wash basin. All spotless. Reliable speedy wifi. Comfy bed. Qiet, efficient air con.Lovely long conversation with the  manager. A map provided with restaurant and shopping recommendations. Incredible value for money given the standard of service.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Love the hotel design and the room was very clean. Thank you for the free upgrade! For buffet breakfast, there was a wide variety of good quality food catering to the diverse needs of guests. The staff were attentive and responsive to your needs. I appreciate their service recovery when feedback was given regarding the longer than expected check in time. Hope that the management will work on these issues.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment we checked in, to the moment they escorted us to our car as we left: this was the most impeccably run hotel we have ever stayed in. The room was fantastic and the bed was very comfortable with lovely linens. Located in the heart of the action of Hanoi. Do not hesitate to stay here.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff verry good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was amazing!!! Staff and entire property was excellent!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is perfect for the cost-conscious traveler who also likes to have her modern amenities. Rooms have wifi, AC, and Western flush toilets. Buffet Breakfast is good and the staff is incredible - very kind, hospitable, and welcoming. We booked our Ha Long Bay tours through Martin Manager at this hotel, and he is fantastic. The tours were high quality and competitively priced. Would definitely recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Stay at the hotel is great! Staff is very friendly and helpful! The location is excellent where most of the well-known street food shops are in walking distance and a lot of souvenir shops/travel agencies around. The street is not noisy at night .
Rooms are clean and comfortable. Breakfast is delicious with variety of choices. Good value for money!
Definitely recommend to anyone who is visiting Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay and the location of the hotel was perfect. The breakfast was included and it was delicious. We were on the second floor facing the street and we didn’t find it too noisy. The air conditioning worked perfectly and the beds and pillows were very comfortable. We were right on the lake in the old town. Perfect for walking tours.

review.rating: Geat stay and very nice breaksfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel location is good as restaurants selling good food ....are just nearby.  has great rooms and amazing staff. Perfect value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is at the center of Old Quarter , near market, restaurant , coffee shop , souvenir shop. Staffs are accommodating . Cleaning staff are honest . Rooms are clean. Rate is acceptable and not so expensive. I would recommend this hotel to my friends.

review.rating: Great location- Staff that went above and beyond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel couldn't be better it's in a perfect location in the old quarter and the rooms are a good size and spotlessly clean.I have stayed in hotels all over the world but the staff here are by far the nicest and most attentive. I would not hesitate to stay here again.The tours they arranged for us were also top class! 5 star service in the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel we will be back as soon as we can!

review.rating: Great accommodation, great location and wonderful staff. Thanks a lot.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff, mainly all the help of Martin. The staff helped us with the transfers and always offer to us the best rooms. Thanks a lot team.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wonderful stay as this new hotel. Amazing location, lots of great places to eat in very local area. Great neighborhood, felt very comfortable walking around at all times. Hotel clean, super comfortable beds and great breakfast, Spa a lovely bonus on site. However what made this trip was the amazing staff, delightful, chatty, knowledgeable and went out of their way to make our stay very special. Appreciated upgrade to bigger room after our trip to Halong bay - couldn't recommend this hotel more!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was really nice, the room had a really good size  and the location is perfect to visit Hanoï.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to say, everything was at my convinience.

review.rating: will hold my judgments due to everybody starting back up again after covid.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Google says it’s a four star hotel. I wouldn’t even consider this a three star. maybe I’ll give it a pass because things are getting back from Covid. but if this is like this normally, Google, you f’ed up.
review.comment_negative: under staff, there were old customers receipts in my drawer, bathroom trash can was full from previous guest. gave me one room key and charged me 200k dong for losing it.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What you see online, all are exactly the same when you actually stay at Lheritage Diamond Hotel, excellent service, well-equipped facilities .Located in the Old Quarter, walking distance to everything popular in downtown Hanoi. I did have a great & dreamy time and will recommend this Hotel.

review.rating: One of the best accommodation in Hanoi Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Comfortable and furnished room with sufficient amenities. Strategically located with walking distance to Hoan Kiem Lake and lots of shops and good food nearby.Martin and Sabi were very hospitable and helpful during check in and check out process, and gave good recommendations on where to go and delicious food nearby.

review.rating: Even with the car transport hiccup, the staff service and sincere attitudes make up their mistake. Overall a comfortable
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Location, the room size, one of the interconnecting room even have a queen bed+ a twin bed that give family of 5 spacious space. 
cleanliness, attentive and helpful staff
review.comment_negative:
1. The front 3.5 star-look lobby
2.stayed at one of the interconnecting room, one of the room has very small window that look directly into other unit, so closed to the room, assume only 3-5 metre away. Luckily only a storage unit ; no view at all. 
3. The poor internet connection. 
4.  Arranged a car pick up; car didn’t turn up until 50 minutes later. Was told by hotel staff that the car they sent broke down . Manager said they have stopped using that car service after our incident. They waived off the car charges and gave us slight discount to contra the cost that we incurred due to multiple call back to hotel. I will say they try all best to give their best service after. Applaud to that effort.

review.rating: 除了地點方便，其他很差，不推薦

review.comment_positive: 早餐一般，可以接受，地點方便
review.comment_negative: 員工態度尚可，房間清潔很差

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The location is good.The staffs are very helpful and actively provide information/support to the guests.
review.comment_negative: Limited variety on hotel breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Super nice hotel right in the Old Quarter. The staff is the friendliest we met in Vietnam. Bathroom so beautiful. The best pillows ever. Breakfast buffet is great and can even order from the menu which is also included.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service at this hotel is absolutely amazing. The staff goes above and beyond to make sure that your stay at Hanoi is as fun and comfortable as possible. The only complaint I have is that the Wi-Fi connection is inconsistent at times. However, you have cable television as well as YouTube and Netflix in every room so entertainment will not be an issue.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is superb. It’s walking distance to the main spots. . Great breakfast and the staff went above and beyond for us with a request we had made. They aim to please and it shows.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Hotel was a wonderful place to start our holiday in Vietnam. The staff were very friendly, especially Sabi, who was very helpful at reception. The breakfast was very yummy, the staff there very attentive.I would recommend the Lheritage Diamond Hotel to anyone visiting Hanoi. , very centrally positioned in the Old Quarter. .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nothing.
review.comment_negative:
Everything.
Rooms were dirty and extremely small. The bathroom had mold and was disgusting

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was my first trip to Vietnam and I couldn’t have went to a better place to stay. The staff is really lovely and speaks good English. They try to make the stay as much comfortable as possible. Also the hotel is at a very good location, not far away from Hoan Kiem Lake or the Cathedral. I would stay at this hotel every time in future trips.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Thank you Martin and all the staff at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel and spa”. My family and I stayed 2 nights and felt very welcomed and looked after. The breakfast was great as was the location We all enjoyed a wonderful massage in the spa. We were so well taken care of by the staff special mention to Sabi who went above and beyond to make our stay as pleasant as possible.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. If there are any cons to mention, the rooms are Excellent .  Location and cleanliness of the hotel were great. The staff, above all our Manager Mr Martin  provided a superb service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  is an experience like no other! From beautiful and inviting room, to friendly staff always ensuring your comfort - this small boutique hotel has it all. Plus, the spa massage? Unforgettable! My husband and I fell in love with this place after our indulgent treatments; a perfect way to wind down each amazing day we spent here. If you're looking for a wonderful accommodation option when visiting Old Quarter of Hanoi, book this hotel – trust us: you won't be disappointed

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment we arrived until we sadly had to leave we were treated like special guests. All of the staff were helpful and friendly. The location is very good and close to the Cathedral and the Lake. We had a pleasant walk around the lake each day.The breakfast was very good and all items we tried were hot.Overall a very good experience and highly recommended.

review.rating: THE STAFFS AT THE HOTEL ARE THE BEST! GREAT HOSPITALITY!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: GREAT LOCATION!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment we stepped into this hotel, we were treated like royalty! The staff was friendly, professional, and very welcoming. They arranged pick-up from the airport and it went seamlessly.The rooms are clean, comfortable, and well-decorated. The hotel is a calm respite from the chaotic and bustling streets of Hanoi. We would highly recommend a stay here!

review.rating: Great Hotel to Stay near the Lake
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: from the airport transfer to the check in to the buffet breakfast., this hotel has delivered. we had an episode having left something behind in a grab car and the concierge was super helpful in recovering the item swiftly and without fuss. the room was spacious and comfortable, albeit with a slightly quirky layout. still, we very much enjoyed our stay. the location is superb too right next to where all the action is.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel reopened just few month ago, so very shiny and new. Excellent reception at check-in, room was large, clean with all facilities and amenities available. It was the nicest decoration and best shower and a comfortable, big bed. It’s at a central place to explore Hanoi.Breakfast was European or Eastern style. Definitely recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice interior. Conveniently located in Old Quarter area. Short walk from Hoan Kiem lake. Nice food places in the area Cong Coffee ..... Night market is also about 2 streets away. Our rooms, on the back of the hotel, were very quiet and pleasant.

review.rating: Nice boutique hotel with Great location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a very pleasant stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. We booked this hotel because it was not too expensive and it looks cleaned. It was a really good experience to stay for 2 nights. I am going back to Hanoi at the end of the month and booked again at this hotel. Staff is very nice, very helpful. Decoration is nice and the location is perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms were clean and the staff was amazing, especially Mr Martin. He went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone that wants to stay in Hanoi Old Quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff are rery friendly , warm and accomodating. Room is nice and clean. Location is very accessible to all, center of Hanoi Old Quarter. Foods are palatable and good. Neighboorhood is safe and quite. Wifi connectivity is fast and easy to access.

review.rating: Experience at Lheritage Diamond hotel and spa
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice check in staff, very much supportive. Nice decoration style and the location is outstanding for walking around.

review.rating: Fantastic hotel with great rooms and very friendly staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
I travel a lot for work and my recommend me to stay in this hotel. The rooms were really clean and the location is great!
The staff were super helpful, Would highly recommend this hotel! Thank you to all the staff!

review.rating: Best place to stay in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel really exceeded our expectations! The staff were super sweet and professional, they even managed to get our delayed luggage to us at the boat we on in Halong Bay! We were so grateful and happy with their support.The hotel is also in the best location for visiting both the old quarters as well as the French quarters. All in all would definitely recommend staying here!

review.rating: Staff were friendly and helpful with local tips. You walk into a great air conditioned Reception and the welcome continu
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: great value room, really air conditioned reception

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel manager gave me excellent service. He explained the different tour packages well and made sure i had a great time. I recommend the Ninh Binh trip but there are many options. The hotel is nice, clean, and offers laundry service if you need it. If you have any Questions the receptionist staff also speaks great English and can guide you. I recommend you stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The location is great and the value is very high. I will stay here again in my next trip.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is very good and close to attractions such as the lake and the church
review.comment_negative: The breakfast lacks variety

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Nice room, friendly stuffs. Comfortable bed.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: everythign was good
review.comment_negative: nil

review.rating: Amazing Place with even better staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The room size was good, the location amazing the stuff great
review.comment_negative: They did not have breakfast because of Covid I imagine.

review.rating: Loved this Hotel and would return
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I loved my stay at this hotel. As a female solo traveller, I was extremely well looked after, especially by Ms Phuong. The place felt brand new and well located in the old quarter. The spa facilities were great. The breakfast buffet was extensive. I have already recommended this gem of a hotel to friends and family.

review.rating: Unforgettable experience in Hanoi aided by excellent hotel staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: First time been to Hanoi with a big suprise how attentive the service of Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was to us. The staff was kind and patient with our questions about food, trip, shopping etc...The room was super clean and location was perfect to walk around the Old Quarter, only minutes to the lake. We love staying here so much and definitely come back after our trip to Sapa, which was recommended by Mr Martin  with a very reasonable price

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Overall experience was incredibly pleasant! The staff were friendly, and accommodated to our needs. Martin, the manager, was wonderfully accommodating. He made our stay extra-special. He booked our Ha Long Bay trip, scoring us a steep discount on a 5-stay cruise. The rooms were very nice, and have good views from the balcony . Rooms had hot water, strong water pressure, a mini-fridge, and a desk. My family enjoyed staying there since it was in the city, and near the cathedral. Strong wifi for working, and not very noisy. Near good restaurants, and about a 5 minute walk from the lake. I recommend it!

review.rating: De los mejores lugares en relación calidad y precio en el corazón de Hanoi.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: La ubicación y el servicio son perfectas
review.comment_negative: Nada.

review.rating: Excellent hotel in the old quarter, near Hoan Kiem Lake and great activities around
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is a very beautiful hotel! Its location is good which near the attractions. All the facilities are clean and new. The staff are very nice and they greet to us and chat with us everyday! They are very kind, helpful and cheerful! The breakfast there are good as well. We stayed there 4 nights and we are truly recommend this hotel to all of you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff and especially the receptionists were extremely friendly, knowledgeable, and accommodating. Can't thank them enough for helping me with early check-in and finding a suitable tour for me given my time constraints. Would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: Not clean, poor smell, poor bed & planket, small desk, bath room dirty,...in executive suite room.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative: Out loook of hotel, room, kitchen...most are not the same with pictures in booking.com. Not clean, poor smell, the desk in room too small not comportable put laptop to work, poor bed not well sleep, bath room washing & shower tubes dirty

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was a very clean and comfortable hotel in a great location. We had rooms with windows and very quiet for sleeping in this busy part of the city. The room had everything we needed. The hot breakfast on the top floor was a wonderful start to our day.

review.rating: Great location, rooms and most staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had an exceptional experience at this hotel. The service was truly outstanding, with a staff that went above and beyond to make my stay memorable, especially receptionist, she was a great help. The installations were equally impressive, offering a perfect blend of luxury and comfort. It was a fantastic stay that exceeded my expectations in every way.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Upon request also received an upgrade to city view room. Located in the central part of Hanoi so everything is within walking distance. Pricing is among one of the most competitive since it’s not on the main road but only a stone throw away.

review.rating: The best location in Hanoi Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing time at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond . The location was right in the heart of the old quarter and was walkable to tons of stuff.  The best aspect of the hotel was the extremely friendly and helpful staff. They always had a smile and went above and beyond when we needed anything. We had a Ha Long Bay day trip that the hotel booked for us which went very well. Overall I would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi for all of the reasons I mentioned combined with the very reasonable price.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel! Best place I stayed at in Vietnam, Their breakfast buffet is awesome too. have western food/ Vietnam food and both were great! 10/10 would stay there again. Thanks Mr Martin for all you did for me. I’ll always cherish my stay with you guys.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, nhưng hơi nhỏ. Ban công cũng không rộng lắm.

review.rating: Wonderful first stop on our honeymoon!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely wonderful rooms, location and service
Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxury central hotel at more than reasonable rates.
The staff were more than helpful to book tours and answer any queries about the local sights that we had.
review.comment_negative: we had an issue with an unpleasant smell on arrival in the bedroom but we were swiftly moved to the same kind of room within 15 minutes of reporting the issue to the receptionist. Fantastic response from the staff!

review.rating: A little piece of perfection in the centre of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: When returning to Hanoi, I always stay at this hotel.Love the location, just off from the lake in the old quarters.places of interest in walking distance.good value for money .Probably the best breakfast I’ve had in Vietnam. Also the beds are so comfortable. And thank you to all the lovely staff and management for your help. hopefully I’ll see you soon.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Excellent girl on reception and tour manager assisted us on all queries we had.
review.comment_negative: The smell coming from the drains is a little strong and overwhelming. There is no AC in the hallway, and a restaurant or bar food option would be beneficial .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was a nice hotel. The sheets were clean and the pillows were nice. The room was large and nicely decorated.  The location was good in another part of Old Quarter that we hadn’t explored so that was fun too.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: 很乾淨，櫃檯人員很親切，詢問其他地方的行程也很熱情的介紹，三個人的行李在三人房都可以攤開來 很方便

review.rating: Great hotel, staff and travel desk!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was beautiful and in the heart of the old quarter Hanoi. The staff we extremely friendly and welcoming. Our room was comfortable and clean. The bathroom is updated - good water pressure. Very close to the lake and night market. Close to numerous restaurants, shopping and spas. Breakfast was included - providing many choices.Would stay here again

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I would really recommend this hotel for people who are staying in Hanoi for the first time. They gave so many helpful hints! The staff were so lovely and the beds were huge (two large singles pushed together). The smallest room we stayed in during our trip but comfortable enough for a short stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Muy céntrico.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức khá, không quá đặc biệt. Nhân viên lễ tân cũng bình thường, không nhiệt tình lắm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Out on my annual rest in Hanoi and as always Lheritage Diamond & Spa took great care of me . Even though my flight from Seoul was delayed , when I walked out of the airport there was my driver holding a sign with my name ready to take me to the hotel. I can't say enough about Sabi, Martin, James.. . Always glad to see you and a smile on their face . They make you feel like more than a hotel guest , they treat you like family . Thank you!!!!

review.rating: Excellence is an understatement. Highly recommend staying here
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Hotel is super well located and the team is just super welcoming! They recommend nice people to take us around, a great cruise in Halong bay, and arranged private transfers. Everything was just right in time. The property is next to the lake and a few touristic attractions. There were nearby a lot of fine dining restaurants and local restaurants . It gave us a chance to walk around and feel the contrast of the city. We just LOVED IT! thank you all for making our days so nicely intense in Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were the most accommodating. Many of them speaks great English. Can ask for recommendations. Conveniently relocated. The staff are absolutely amazing ,so helpful and welcoming. Highly recommend. Rooms are very clean and the staff always try and make sure the you the best stay possible

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfection is in the details. And the staff of the Lheritage Diamond Hotel does take care of all the details. Attentive, extremely well trained, always ready to ask a nice question and to help, the personnel really made my stay extremely enjoyable. I would like to personally thank Martin, Sabi for their hospitality!!! We would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family and look forward to coming back!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The location is ideal since you are right in the middle of a very busy area. Lots of food options and  alot of shopping options. 
The rooms were decent sized . 
The staff was very courteous and kept looking to please us.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast was a little disappointing. Very limited options.

review.rating: A lovely oasis in a busy city!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was in a great location close to restaurants and bars. Large well appointed rooms.
Wonderfully helpful and friendly staff, they were able to make excellent recommendations.
There was an excellent variety of food for breakfast. I would definitely staff in this hotel again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location right at the walking street in the heart of Old Quarter - was a superb location for tourist who wanted to see the night life of Hanoi  - fanatic front desk staff who spoke good English - staffs are friendly and helpful - bellboys are always ever ready to help - the rooms are cozy and well maintained - bed is huge and comfortable -will definitely recommend this hotel!!

review.rating: Hotel posizione centrale ma camera claustrofobica.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cordialità dello staff terrazza panoramica per la colazione
review.comment_negative: Camera piccola con vista muro.. Odore di umido in camera

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment step in to hotel check in to check out, experience is fantastic. Greeted with welcome drink follow by guide instruction of hotel information, surrounding place of interest and upon check out which was very pleasant and unexpected.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good location in the center of the old district.The staffs are very friendly and well-trained. The room is wonderful with good small and good atmosphere. The elevator is little bit small when you have to carry all your belongings with you. The internet signal is very well, I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to be in the heart of the action in the old quarter in Hanoi.
