review.rating: Good location and value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff were friendly

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazingly attentive Sabi, Martin, Jame. were all so warm and accommodating. The rooms are comfortable, beautifully designed, and with such amazing city views. Breakfast was delicious and plentiful. And, the hotel’s location was super, walking distance in every direction to interesting sites and points of interest. We also enjoyed the unique location in the Old Quarter, a nice, cool respite from the heat of Hanoi. Thank You !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Martin and the staff were absolutely wonderful! They went above and beyond to make our stay pleasant. Very clean hotel and a great free breakfast (I highly recommend the kumquat juice)! Will be back Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.rating: Excellent Hotel, clean, modern, friendly and Location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a central position,you can find everything about Hanoi around it . The rooms were clean, the staff was welcoming and helpful. We are very thankful to the staff of the hotel who was always here to help us - either by recommending very good places to eat, drink and visit ; also by organizing Booking, trips and transportation. On top of that, the location is also very convenient to visit the city.If I'll back in Hanoi I'll back in Lheritage Diamond Hotel for sure

review.rating: Amazing hotel with great location, beautiful decor, and most wonderful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent location on Nha Chung street in the old quarter. Friendly, accommodating staff, willing to help with a smile. Beautiful modern yet classy decor with insta-worthy shots in every corner of the hotel. Definitely worth the value for higher level room with balcony that gives you the stunning view of Hanoi city! The room is spotlessly clean and the whole hotel smelt amazing just like a zen spa! The complimentary breakfast on 10th floor with panoramic view of the city.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in Old Quarter away from the street
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms are cosy and comfortable, and loved that the hotel is in a great location . Best thing was the staff who were warm and friendly. Especially James and his colleagues who went the extra mile and recommended us places to visit/eat whole we were there. Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel located in the old town. Wonderful bedroom and breakfast. I fully recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Value for money, good location, clean hotel and superb staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My friend and I stayed here for 4 nights. I can't say enough positive things about this hotel. The staff, from reception to those serving breakfast, were wonderful! Breakfast had a large assortment of tasty options. We found the hotel quiet and in a great location. I would absolutely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Közel a nevezetessègekhez
Atfoglalas nagyobb szobára helyben
review.comment_negative:
Ha, kesobb erkezel szinte elfogy a reggeli
3 szazalek extra kartyahasznalati dij
Az eredeti foglalasnal az ablak egy 1,5 meterre  fekvo falra nezett
Zajos szobák,  nem a kulteri hanem a belteri zajok a folyosón.
Klíma egyenesen az ágyra fúj, lehetetlen atallitani így a megfázás garantált, ha csak nem akkar az ember melegben aludni.

review.rating: Excellent service from very helpful staff, great value, location & cleanliness as well
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Located on center of old quarter street, once you open the door hotel, many restaurants and walking street will meet you there. Operator is very welcome support. I love here and will back once visit Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Colazione abbondante con vista sui tetti della città

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel in walking distance to many attractive streets without the bustle of something nearer to Hoan Kiem lake for example. For the price this cozy hotel was pretty impressive with big clean rooms and toilet, serves quality breakfast in on the rooftop with a great view and fantastic staff who go the extra mile for you. Highly recommended not just for solo travelers on a budget but also for those traveling with families or friends too.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Centrally located, easy to walk and tour the entire Old Quarter. The staff were exceptionally friend and helpful. We had THE BEST massages here and had an amazing breakfast every morning!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A wonderful stay in a beautiful hotel, an oasis of calm in the heart of the old quarter. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and so did those traveling with me.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Gần Bờ Hồ

review.rating: Reserve 15 mins to check out as the staff really get to the room to check.  check your bill carefly
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Sabi is super professional and always helpful to provide information and arrange our trip.  Jenny is also very kind and smart to resolve our money exchange and payment issue and trip. 

Breakfast is very good,  Location is excellent, just few steps to the St Joseph church.  

Hotel car is punctual, comfortable and good price.
review.comment_negative:
- room is not vacuumed or swept  every day, we found a black lady underwear under the tv set frame in the first day.  We also found our hairs on the floor after return.  And they dumped my ear plugs but they didn't clear the trash bin every day.  
- the water pipes are pretty noisy in the toilet all day long, not sure it only happens in our family room.  
- a male receptionist asked for 3 % credit card surcharge for the whole bills when we checkin.  We felt very shocked and told him that this is the first time we heard it for hotel stay. So we proved that our booking deposit amount and also the tour and transportation package are includive all tax and service charge.  Then he finally didn't charge.   The next day we clarified with Jenny and there is no such surcharge rule.

review.rating: Perfect stay in the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were so lovely, open and close the door for you every time you walk in without question always polite and well mannered and willing to help you find your way around Hanoi! Special mention Martin who help me to reconfirm the Ha Giang bus, informed them our request, and answered all our questions. Would stay again any time I am there. Definitely stay here if get the chance

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Comfortable big room with good facilities! Staff were excellent and very helpful.

review.rating: Great location and a great hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff here were the most sincere and accommodating of all the places we stayed while in Vietnam. They took care of everything we needed with a smile and helpfulness. We would not even consider staying anywhere else in Ha Noi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and exactly as shown in the pictures
review.comment_negative: The air con did not cool the room properly

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel in the heart of Hanoi. We stayed here 2 nights on vacation. Front desk was very friendly and accommodating, and walked through a brochure on local sights and culture. Lots of ‘extras’: at check out, they quickly checked our room to make sure nothing was left behind, had same day laundry service, and gave us a to go breakfast for our 6:00am airport departure. The room was very comfortable. Location was great, close to old quarter and also the pedestrian only area around the lake.

review.rating: The best hotel and best location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good service from Mr Martin, he has a good memory. Although I saw that he seemed very busy at night, when I returned to the hotel, he still remembered my name and room number. In addition, he showed me a great local restaurant. Well worth coming back on next business trip

review.rating: Sạch, ăn sáng ngon, thuận lợi đi các điểm , nhân viên rất nhiệt tình
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Sạch, ăn sáng ngon, thuận lợi đi các điểm , nhân viên rất nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My husband and I spent 2 nights at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. Our room was very comfortable and modern, the breakfast was delicious and  was a great place to sightseeing. The staff were so friendly and made us feel so special each time we left our room. Returning to our hotel each afternoon was like returning to friends who were genuinely interested in our days events. The hotel is perfectly situated in Old Quarter right near Hoam Kiem Lake, great shopping and hundreds of great restaurants and coffee shops. This hotel is a must for anyone needing accommodation in Hanoi!

review.rating: Value for money and Great location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Good staff and great breakfast. Awesome location
review.comment_negative: Rooms could be slightly better. But location advantage is huge

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Can really recommend this hotel. Everywhere was very clean, and all the staff were friendly and helpful. We had a welcome drink brought straight to us when we arrived after a long journey. Wide selection for breakfast. Good location too.

review.rating: Highly recommend. Staff care of everything. Book here and you will have no worries
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel maybe cheaper than others, but it’s a real gem that we found. Great place to stay, clean and all staff were very good with us and so helpful all the time. Location is really good for the lake and the street market over the weekends. Lots of nearby tourist spots and are within walking distance.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a fantastic stay here! The hotel is centrally located, in the heart of the hustle and bustle of beautiful Hanoi! Sabi was an exceptional host, making sure that everything was perfect! The rooms are comfortable and stylish, the restaurant has amazing views of the city and the breakfast delicious! Thank you to all of the staff for a memorable stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel. Great location to many attractions and close to the famous train Street. All staff members were very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very comfy and clean. The breakfast was just delicious choice of Western and Asian food and plenty of it. Great service!

review.rating: Great Central location and awesome Customer Service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful hotel  in Old Quarter and centrally located. The genuine service provided by Sabi truly leaves a lasting impression. All the Restaurant staff including concierge were very friendly and helpful gave us an exceptional service. Breakfast was truly amazing and yummy.Lheritage Diamond Hotel has a beautiful art-deco design and is very sophisticated.
Amazing stay! Clean, quiet and very comfortable rooms. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good location. Very comfy and clean accommodation. Brilliant customer service.  friendliness and helpfulness. Staff make every effort to remember guests’ names and were always willing to help us make the most of our time in Hanoi. Our room was beautiful, clean and fitted with everything we needed for our stay. The bed was large and comfortable, and the water pressure of our shower was fantastic. We loved our time at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond and will definitely return next time we’re in Hanoi.

review.rating: Enjoy in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really helpful staff in this central hotel. Provide lots of information about tours and Hanoi city. Clean bedrooms and elevator. Allow you to safely store your bags after you’ve checked out. Would recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sạch, nhân viên nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel with beautiful view from buffet breakfast rest. We were upgraded to a suite with balcony directly to the city. The nice staff helped us from our early arrival and until our room was ready by holding our luggage and giving us access to bath. Especially thanks to Quality.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: location
review.comment_negative: none

review.rating: Enjoyable stay nice place good location staff friendly and helpful
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was very good and service was exceptional
review.comment_negative: Everything was fine

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a great time and where welcomed by a lovely staff. Especially Sabi, how helped us make reservations en do the planning how to spend time in Hanoi and traveling trough Vietnam. Thank you for that Sabi, and thanks to the staff for a perfect stay in a fantastic hotel in the middle of Hanoi city!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Gorgeous boutique hotel at the end of a quaint lane. A minute from Hoan Kiem lake. Unparalleled staff. Incredible water pressure, massive, comfy bed. The location is also one of the best in Old Quarter. Will be back for sure.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed here two nights in Feb 2024/ Amazing experience. Staff are extremely helpful and speak good English so communication is good. They were really flexible, allowing earlier check in, gave good recommendations of things to do in the area. They offer a laundry service. Good sized bedrooms with a huge bed. Would recommend staying here.

review.rating: A nice hotel at the heart of the city
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location and staff
review.comment_negative: Rooms were small and the doors creak when a door to the next room is opened or closed

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: it’s central location
review.comment_negative: they didn’t have generators back up when there was no light as lift also didn’t work while we checked in at 3 am in morning

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
This was definitely value for Money in the busiest part of the Old town.
It is close to the lake and restaurants  . The Bedrooms were nice and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast had lots of choice and very good. We booked a city tour with Martin which we booked through the hotel - definitely recommend this! He is excellent, knowledgeable and took us all of the key areas of interest.

review.rating: First Class Hospitality in the Heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were brilliant! From the moment we arrived the customer service was exceptional. Nothing was too much trouble. The team went above and beyond to assist us with booking tours, making external calls for us to confirm things, and making sure we were comfortable and even brewing up a special tea when my husband was feeling unwell. Thanks Mr Martin and his team for a wonderful stay. The location was great too!

review.rating: What a perfect start to our Vietnam trip!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A busy hotel for a reason - the Service, Location. Rooms were well thought out, Service from check in to check out was amazing . Martin, the GM even introduced himself and gave everyone a bottle of water for the airport on check out and remembers your name. Breakfast was decent too and the rooftop pool wasn’t too busy. Within a few seconds walk to local family mart and few mins walk to everything ie famous cafes, landmarks.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: clean and spacious room. delicious breakfast. particularly kind, accomodating and helpful staff. thank you for absolutely everything you have done for us, you are amazing. We will come back for sure and we will recommend this hotel to everyone that passes by Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here only one night before we leave to Sapa. A wonderful hotel with heart-warming staffs, clean & spacious rooms, delicious breakfast with many choice of Vietnamese & western foods, and a nice street view from their restaurant. Definately comeback again on our next trip in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel was a great way to start off a vacation. Right in the heart of the main area of Hanoi, the Hotel is close to so many restaurants, shops and things to see, as well as super close to the lake to stroll around. The public areas and rooms are all clean and aesthetically appealing. Beds are super comfy and it is nice to have a bathtub after a hot summer day in Hanoi. Staff are very helpful and pleasant. I would definitely stay here again when coming back to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I would like to say thank you so much for upgrading us to Deluxe room. The receptionist also so lovely. The room condition overall clean and comfortable. Hotel location is in the centre, short walkaway to Lake and Cathedral. Along the way, a lot of delicious street food. It's a fun walking experience while in Hanoi. The breakfast also complete with mix Vietnamese, Asian and western delicacy. And the staffs also so helpful. Thanks for your great service. I would love to stay again at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  if we visit Vietnam again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Honestly this hotel is wonderful! It's very clean, the rooms are large, the hotel is quiet, the staff are very friendly and approachable, the location is fantastic. We have nothing but good things to say. Highly recommend.

review.rating: best places with wonderful and dedicated staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel right in the centre of Hanoi old town. Accessed through a walkway from the busy main road, but quiet and peaceful once inside. Rooms & beds very comfortable, so much choice at breakfast. The staff were all very friendly, special mention to James who was so kind and helpful and is a real asset to the hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: All staffs this hotel is really smart, excellent and heart-warming! Even though my staying were very short, four days individually, however, they remember my name and gave us their best support for our comfortable experiences. Absolutely I'll be back here with taking longer vacation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location and all staff were very welcoming. Mr. Martin was extremely helpful and hospitable. The hotel asked for feedback and we gave some comments about the service. Mr. Martin had a really nice discussion with us to elaborate further so they could make things even better. Very impressed with the professionalism as they genuinely strive to provide great service. Will definitely stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great helpful stuff, an excellent place in the middle of old town, highly recommend! Near by to Hoankiem lake and Cathedral , coffee bars, lots of shops. Good room, nice beads good pillows. Fresh towels , nice and clean overall./ thanks Sabi an other stuff for good service, very helpful!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were extremely happy that we decided to choose to stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond boutique hotel. Impeccable service, very clean, convenient location. The breakfast buffet was also excellent with a wide array of both local and western options, fresh squeezed juice, omelet station, pho station, and you can special order americanos and other drinks. They provided us with free bottle of water when going out of excursions. They assisted us with free luggage storage when we went to halong bay. Staff very friendly and helpful with expedited laundry services, spa bookings, and recommendations. Would stay here again! The spa was also fantastic for a couples massage .

review.rating: Bon emplacement à côté de la cathédrale. Équipement basique.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Correct
review.comment_negative: Attention l hôtel se fait pirater. Le pirate demande de refaire le paiement via un lien qu’il envoie depuis le compte booking de l’hôtel avec toutes les informations de réservation. Gros problème de sécurité informatique.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
location is good 
staffs are very helpful
review.comment_negative: the facility is a little old and feels different from what we saw on website

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: If you get the opportunity to stay here please do. A gem of a hotel. Staff extremely helpful and friendly. The facilities are great, and the location couldn’t be better. Totally recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative:
The hotel offered us incentives to make us cancel our reservation and book directly with them at the time of checking in. 
The room was much smaller than as presented in the picture. The room window faced a concrete wall. There was a disgusting roll-away bed stored in the hallway next to our room door during our stay. There was not storage space to unpack. The room was not cleaned during our stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Comfortable bed, hot shower
review.comment_negative: Offered no information about the premises on check in.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Staff were amazing. Thank you

review.rating: Value for money and great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked 2 nights at the hotel and they’ve upgraded the room for us! The hotel design is beautiful and new. Every staffs were so friendly and helpful! The hotel is near tourist attractions and location is centre of old quarter. Really recommend if you want a nice warmth hotel with good service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had the best time in this hotel ! Room is beautifully decorated, perfectly clean and beds are comfy! But what we will mostly remember is the staff! Such great people working there. Thanks again for all your nice attentions, it is in the details that we recognize greatness ! As we arrived very early from night bus, our room was not ready, but they offered to prepare beds for us in the spa so we could relax ! They were always making sure we were having a good time, always so friendly and thoughtful ! We really loved our time with you, price is important for us as we travel for a long time, but it is absolutely worth it ! Hopefully we will come back again

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_negative: Never book airport transport service from the hotel. Our driver was constantly on the phone while driving at busy traffic in Hanoi, and he had 2 phones. Therefore, his phones never stopped the whole trip. Such an unpleasant experience.

review.rating: Great place to stay in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel with great facilities with such a view and everything is good, hotel with fantastic service and full of warmth are the things make you impressed and your journey special. Hotel is very clean and well maintained and also in a great location close to everywhere but just slightly off the main streets so it's not noisy at all. it was good enough but I wouldn't write a review for them if it wasn't the service I had. The staff there was absolutely fantastic. You will be happy entering back into the hotel after a trip in Hanoi's humid and hot weather. Warm greeting with smile from the heart, taking care of you, remembering everything you've asked for, helping you with recommended restaurants, area,  etc, keeping everything about you on track.Thank you for making my holiday memorable!

review.rating: Staff that went above and beyond
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond couldn't be better it's in a perfect location in the old quarter and the rooms are a good size and spotlessly clean. Buffet Breakfast is also excellent and made to order every morning but the best thing about this hotel is the staff...I have stayed in hotels all over the world but the staff here are by far the nicest and most attentive. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, All breakfast were delicious & the room was cleaned always.  thank all staff. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location,  close proximity  to the fun streets in the old town , with awesome food , very friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: The property  is a bit dated  needs some updating  and maintenance.  . And their are a few other options in the area similar  price point which look better maintained.

review.rating: Elegance and comfort with the best service quality
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel location is extremely convenient to all the main attractions and rooms are very modern and luxurious. The service staff also made sure to provide a very personalized attention to make our stay in Hanoi a really comfortable and memorable one. Definitely recommend to everyone who is visiting Hanoi.

review.rating: Hôtel très bien situé, nous avons passé un très bon sejour.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Hôtel très bien situé dans le vieux quartier, tout à proximité de l’hôtel. Manager de l’hôtel (James) était au petit soin afin que tout se passe pour le mieux. Petit déjeuner très copieux et intégré dans le prix de la chambre.
review.comment_negative: Hôtel est plutôt correcte mais les installions sont un peu dépassé, personnel veut absolument vous vendre les prestations de l’hôtel ce qui est un peu trop de temps en temps et vous demande de mettre 5/5 sur Tripadvisor

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good value. The staff is very friendly, always welcome me by big smile. Solar booked for me so many great tour( Halong Bay, sapa and Ninh Binh). Breakfast was really good. So many options, served as buffet and menu. Restaurant on rooftop so I can see grand view of city. Thank you so much for your service. I will back here.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel. Excellent location in Old Quarter. Staff were very friendly. Beds are fantastic. The best sleep i had the whole trip. Shower pressure good. Would stay there again.

review.rating: Wonderful place to stay in Ha Noi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were exceptionally happy and helpful. The hotel is in a good location near the lake and with restaurants nearby.Easy to go for eat nor shopping. Value for money.

review.rating: Good But not the best choice
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in quiet location not too bad.
review.comment_negative: There is no breakfast and need to walk about 700 - 800 M to OLD Quarter. There is no nothing to buy except for few cafe around the area.

review.rating: Great place to stay with the family
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Great place to stay with the family, we booked the family room and it was lovely. Spacious, clean, with 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms that interconnect. Very central location, great art shops downstairs and the very famous Pho 10 just down the road for dinner.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast can be improved with some more choices but there was enough variety and it was fine for something to have before exploring the city.

review.rating: Conveniently located in the Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Clean and comfortable room. Good location near to every landmarks in the Old Quarter. Staffs were extremely helpful and friendly. We really enjoyed our stay!

review.rating: Nice little hotel in the city centre
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff who went out of the way to make your stay pleasant. Location was also brilliant, walking distance to the night market and the beautiful cathedral was right next door. Plenty of places to eat.
review.comment_negative: Bedding could have been better

review.rating: The best service and hospitality and very friendly helpful staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk staff ; Martin, Lam, Phuong and the rest of the great people that made our trip so fantastic! They went out of their way to fulfill any issues we had and showed us different tours that we could do. This property is in the heart of the Old Quarter. It was the best vacation that we have had in our 55 years. Vietnam people are so helpful, friendly and just so hard working. We will be back again and again! Thank You so much

review.rating: V Good location, staff and room.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The hotel was extremely clean. The room was excellent. It had a very large terrace/balcony. The staff were incredibly kind and helpful (example: when I wanted to buy bottles of water - the concierge ran out to a local shop to save me money, as the bottled water from the hotel was more expensive).
review.comment_negative: For a 4 star hotel, I felt that the breakfast was poor. Also, when I checked in, I felt that the Manager was a bit too eager/pushy with offers of taxis/tours etc (at least let the door close behind me before trying to sell me something). This was a shame, because all the other staff were excellent.

review.rating: Un hotel correcte amb molt bona relació qualitat preu
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
La ubicació, 
L'esmorzar, 
La dutxa.
review.comment_negative:
Les vistes,
Les escales,

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Comfortable and clean with lovely furniture and bathroom, the staff took very good care of us and provided everything we needed.I would strongly recommend this hotel, as the service was the best I have experienced in any hotel in the world.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Look no where if you need a cozy room, lightening fast service and a team ready to cater to your every demand , without a frown .Smooth check in , organizing a wonderful day trip ,storing our luggage while we were at the cruise. Would highly recommend this place for its room , service , amenities and especially its team . Thank you Lheritage Diamond!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great Hotel, clean, cosy comfortable, super friendly and helpful staff. Centraly located in the heart of the Old Quarter and within walking distance to many attractions in the Old Quarter. The breakfast was great. 
Great price for what it offers and I would stay there again
review.comment_negative: Nothing to add here as I enjoyed my stay 100%

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: ハノイ大聖堂に近く10階の朝食会場から大聖堂が見える
review.comment_negative: 窓はあっても景色のよい部屋は少ない。

review.rating: Recommend for its location, breakfast and warm and friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A wonderful hotel in a perfect location within the old quarter. The buffet breakfast exceptional.The massages were brilliant, I couldn’t stop myself going back multiple times. I would definitely stay with Martin and his team again when visiting Hanoi. I would definitely recommend Hanoi Lheritage Hotel Group.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The hotel was at the centre of Hanoi, so very convenient for travelers. The room was clean, and very quiet, although there were music events from nearby Hoan Kiem lake.
review.comment_negative: The room did not meet my expectation as in the advertised photos. The staff said each room has different design, but that did not explain the differences (smaller size, no bathtub). Maybe the photos need to be more realistic to avoid confused expectation.

review.rating: It was clean and accessible, but thought there were other hotels with better value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Close to central Hoan Kien, can go to the Cathedral quickly.

The facility is clean and the staff is friendly.
review.comment_negative:
At first, I was charged 3% more than the price on booking.com.
When I told them that I did not agree with the price, they told me that their manager had forgotten to show the price on booking.com and that it was not necessary this.

I upgraded my room and stayed on the 9th floor, but it was a little noisy because I could hear the restaurant on the 10th floor all the way up.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: great location. friendly staff. good breakfast. clean hotel room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are nice and clean. Location is strategic, just front the Cathedral & Starbucks.They manager Martin even took care of our transport transfer to the airport on the day of departure. I will be definitely staying here again.

review.rating: A wonderful hotel in the heart of the Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel and service.Very clean and breakfast it's very good. The hotel it's  the centre of old Hanoi and it's very in good position for night life and restaurants. Very good experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
ハノイ大聖堂の目の前
出発の時、朝ごはんを持たせてくれた
部屋は清潔だった

review.rating: The best hotel location in Hanoi Old Quarter central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very convenient,near to the place we have an appointment and near to other places to watch scenery. Will choose next visit Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is clean. Mr Martin very friendly. He is very helpful and help us to resolve all our request. He even help me to check have I pass them the breakfast form. Reception help us on our booking of grab. Bring us to our booking car. Our car being cancel he even trying to help us to resolve our another booking. And make sure we are safe.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I returned after a road trip to Hagiang and able to book again at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond to extend my stay in Hanoi. The staffs are superb, friendly, helpful and so kind to support me. The staffs helped to get my room earlier for free so I could take rest after the long motorbike trip, and on my departure day the car was not able to reach the door and it was raining, but the bell man helped me to transfer all my stuffs.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel's service was perfect! Very centered location - near to hoan kiem lake, 15m from St. Joseph's Cathedral and 1 block away from Hang Gai St. Too many restaurants surrounds the hotel,excellent buffet breakfast. Bed is soft and comfortable. Room is spacious. Amenities very good. New hotel but with high standards of service. Really recommended one in Hanoi!

review.rating: Good choice for a few days in Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and available to assist. Room was clean and very comfortable. Lovely breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: L emplacement est très bien. Les employés sont super gentils.
review.comment_negative:
Le.petit déjeuner est pas top.
La propreté des chambre laisse à désirer

review.rating: Best Hotel To Stay In Hanoi Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Came here for family vacation and it was a great choice. The facilities are great. Condition is good. Staff service is excellent. I love the cozy and warm vibe at the lobby. It's chill in the early morning and late night. Would definitely come back.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The staff were very kind and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
I have stayed in this beautiful hotel in Feb and I must say this is the first hotel that really makes me feel so happy.
The staff treated me so well and I never felt as if I was staying in a hotel but rather in a ‘family’ home. Ms Sabi and hotels staff were so friendly and accommodating . This made me feel reluctant to leave after my 5-nights stay.
Room was so clean and so comfortable. Breakfast was great and loved the coffee. They even made me a simple breakfast on my departure day as it was too early for the proper mini buffet to operate.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I'm very satisfied and impressed front desk's staff they are always welcome to us smiling and give good service. also room is clean and cozy like my room i wanna meet them again thank you for make good memory.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great Manager and Staff. The rooms are clean and best of all the bed rooms and bathrooms are clean. As an American, I recommend this place for couple of family, and even friends.

review.rating: A Wonderful Stay in Hanoi's Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Lovely clean rooms, and located within walking distance to all the attractions in Hanoi.
The hotel manager Mr Martin is the friendliest and most helpful guy you will meet! He helped us organise airport transfer last minute, booked transport for us to and from Tam Coc, exchange US dollars for Vietnamese dong (at a great rate too!), and gave us heaps of tips on what to see, eat and do.The rate included free buffet breakfast  which was delicious and included pho, eggs, breads and pastries, and fresh fruit plus more!

review.rating: Excellent service in a conveniently located hotel with comfortable rooms.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location in centre of old quarter ( near Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral ) . Staff were very nice, helpful and happy to provide a good service to you. Booked a couple of tours through the hotel,  Buffet Breakfast was great with pho in the morning or eggs. Room was relatively clean and had all the amenities one could want.

review.rating: Perhaps the best treatment I have ever experienced
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is perfectly located right of the Cathedral square and is surrounded by street food, bars and motorbike rentals. The staff were incredibly helpful, kind and friendly. They helped us arrange a bus for a day trip and even offered to let us shower when we came back even though we had already checked out. The deluxe room was comfortable .Breakfast was delicious! We will definitely come back.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stay at hotel in Nov 2023. Everyone I met was incredibly nice and helpful. Sabi was always around to greet me with a smile and share a ton of awesome information, and book some tours for me. staff in the restaurant was lovely. I don’t have anything bad to say about this hotel and its staff. I will definitely be back!

review.rating: Our whole family recommends this hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was our first trip to Vietnam and I couldn’t have went to a better place to stay. The staff is really lovely and speaks good English. They try to make the stay as much comfortable as possible. Also the hotel is at a very good location, near Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral . I would stay at this hotel every time in future trips.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staffs are extremely capable, helpful and always smiling whenever I see them. Location is near the entrance to Old Quarter and there are many delicious food vendors and store right below the hotel and access to ..... The room looks exactly as shown in the picture which is clean and beautiful for its price. Breakfast buffet was good with selection of western breakfast and local delights to choose from.Thank you!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located right in the heart of the old town so a perfect location as a base. The staff are exceptional and made us feel at home. Mr Martin arranged all our taxis and helped make sure we knew where to to be etc. The rooms are clean and beds comfy and it is a little oasis in the middle of the chaos of Hanoi. We were sad to be leaving but as we had booked to fly to Da Nang it was time to depart. however we departed in real style as the book us an executive taxi to the airport so we left with an even heavier heart. Thank you for such a wonderful welcome to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great staff and a perfect location. It is located right next to the wonderful Cathedral and Lake of Old Town Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location, breakfast and cleanness. Helpful and friendly staff. If u travel wz children and they prefer not vietnamese cusine, so best place to choose

review.rating: Brilliant base for the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: An excellent place to stay! Great location and facilities, yummy breakfast and friendly helpful staff. Sabi, in particular, was extremely helpful in booking some of the best tours of my trip and assisted me in organizing the rest of my time in Vietnam. Such an excellent experience all around!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The place is amazing and easy to navigate. The food is fantastic, and you can also request breakfast items from the menu for free at no extra charge. The front desk, particularly my friend Happy, is extremely helpful and kind to our group. Happy truly lives up to her name. There are also plenty of amenities available. I highly recommend this place.

review.rating: The staff are amazing, they are locals, take their advice
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a fantastic hotel! The service was amazing. We checked in almost at midnight and were greeted with juice and the friendliest night staff. The next morning, we had the free breakfast and it was so fresh and delicious. You could have custom pho and omelet's and there were so many vegetarian options for our friend. And we had a staff member come to our table, give us a map and asked what we’d like to see. And not in an intrusive way….just super helpful!  Would absolutely recommend this centrally located hotel to Hanoi visitors and definitely my friends! Again, just the nicest staff and great service.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Nothing
review.comment_negative:
It was the most awful hotel we have ever been to. First, the check in was delayed (that is acceptable) but then, they give us a room that was not ready! The bathroom was full of dirt on the floor, the shaving machine was used, not to talk about how noisy the room was (all night listening to the horns and noisy neighbors)
We have been to several hotels in our stay to Vietnam and we understand that the category (stars) does not correspond sometimes to the ones we have in Europe… but in this case we don’t give it any star.

review.rating: Recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Reasonable price for mediocre travelers and the rooms seem comfortable too. Nice service. Nice breakfast. The location is very good , near many restaurant and cafe , shopping..... recommend to our friend

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Super Friendly staff, awesome rooms,great breakfast, perfect location. You can’t ask for more! Will definitely stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great experience of feeling at home while away from home . Well appointed rooms and an excellent welcome drink from staff. I cannot find any gap in their service quality and would recommend this place to people visiting or staying long term in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel with excellent location located right at the center of the Old Quarter, extremely clean & comfortable. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff, she also makes our trip more interesting with her advice & tips about the city, supermarket, shops, restaurants bars are within walking distance. I would definitely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality. I’m so happy with my stay and that actually was sad to just to leave. Thank you again for going just that little step extra for the guests !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: phòng sạch sẽ, ngay trung tâm, tiện ăn uống và đi các địa điểm thăm quan

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is actually my second stay with the Lheritage Hotel group and I love it every time. The staff are extremely friendly and the hotel is super clean. I especially loved the restaurant at the top floor . One thin that could use some improvement is better sound proof walls since I could hear everything that was going on in the hall. Other then that, I am definitely staying at the Lheritage Diamond Hotel again next time I've in town.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: ubicación y el baño
review.comment_negative: desayuno personal

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, great breakfast, clean rooms, amazing staff

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên cũng được, không quá nhiệt tình nhưng làm đủ việc. Phòng có ban công là điểm cộng.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The customer service here is fanatic in addition to the location being very central - only a short walk to just about anything you could need/want. Bed is comfy and room is reasonably clean. Would recommend if you’re in Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Being near food and attractions, this conveniently located euro-styled boutique hotel was a gem to stay for my recent anniversary. With spacious & comfortable bedrooms plus boasting of buffet breakfast menu of International and local cuisines . Special mention to Martin and his team who were always attentive to details. Being patient and understanding, he was always on hand to address our concerns and provided us with quick fix solutions. Highly recommended for travellers looking to experience Vietnamese hospitality; Looking forward to a return stay soon

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had 3 lovely nights at the hotel. The location was perfect, really nice. The Room was clean.The staff were nice and helpful. The breakfast was really good.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Tôi đặt phòng cho nhóm bạn từ SG đến HN tham quan, tất cả đều rất vui và hài lòng về khách sạn. Giữa trung tâm nên họ đi bộ tham quan đc nhiều nơi.

review.rating: Great stay at the Lheritage Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Could not recommend this hotel enough. The staff are the most wonderful, attentive, friendliest people I’ve ever had the pleasure of meeting. Whilst all were incredible, Ms Sabi was outstanding and really made our stay. We enjoyed our stay so much, we booked back in twice more over the course of our trip. We would’ve have booked in again, but they were booked up! So instead we booked in at the sister hotel which we have no doubt will be up to the same standard. Couldn’t ask for more. Thank you to all at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond who made our stay so special!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is incredible! Check on process was outstanding. The lobby was really nice with a great aromatherapy smell. Stayed in Deluxe Room. Internet connection was perfect .Bathroom was so luxurious with nice complimentary toiletries .Bedding was super comfy, I have a really great sleep at night. Breakfast served was also great with nice view at the higher floor. Various option for buffet as well as for ala-carte. Vegetarian option also available. I’m happy to say that all the staff is really accommodating as and when you have a question or seek for opinion i.e. place for eating, shopping etc. Good job and kudos to all the team of Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. Sure will be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was a wonderful experience to ride a beautiful Cyclo for 30 minutes - one of the room benefits that the hotel gave us. Always paying attention to the psychology and feelings of customers, Ms. Sabi proposed that experience when riding a Cyclo for us. Not only that, She also took care of breakfast on the 10th floor throughout the meal. Always meet needs. Then she went down to work at the front desk. So hardworking and a lot of dedication.

review.rating: Amazing staff, extremely polite and respectful
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the moment I walked in the door to the moment I departed, I was looked after impeccably. I was given excellent recommendations on where to go and the places to go to eat in the city. And the customer service extended to stays and excursions in other parts of North Vietnam and around. The room was great and the breakfast was excellent. I would like be back this Hotel again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best location in Old Quarter ( Near the Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral ) . Fantastic staff. They really helped us in everything we needed. They booked taxis and tours for us. They were very accountable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room and service level is 5 stars for sure. All the staff were attentive and went above and beyond to help us in any way possible. The location is also one of the best in Old Quarter, A minute from Hoan Kiem lake. Totally recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.rating: Great Location, Good Service, Great Value for Money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very luxurious and amazing staff. Wonderful buffet breakfast . I loved the location as it is central to most sights you want to see. Definitely a hotel I would stay at again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: sạch sẽ
review.comment_negative: không có

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I recommend this hotel in many ways. Location Right is near the Lake Hoankiem! comfortable place to take a walk and tour. bedding was good, and I was satisfied with breakfast and restaurant. All the staff members were so kind and bright that they left a lot of good memories.

review.rating: Wonderful stay in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent hotel, in the centre of the lively old quarter but the moment you walk into the lobby, peace and calm. The rooms are superb, spotless with a wonderful attention to detail. Breakfast on the 10th was wonderful, try the omelette with all the fillings, light pastries and beautiful hand made Yoghurt. The staff are caring and helpful, minds of local information. My only complaint, we didn't stay longer....enjoy a visit.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: It's literally a 3*+ hotel if you will compare it to others all around the world. But if you take into account that it's a Hanoi old town area, it's a really 4*+ hotel. Very friendly staff, helping as much as they can, small and old, but clean room with all standard accessories for 5* hotel. Breakfast is okay to have something to eat, but if you like pho bo, it will make your day. And if you'll compare the price with other network hotels, you see the difference.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It's our first time at Hanoi. We didn't expect to feel at home so fast that on the 2nd day, we are already planning to come back with our kids. This hotel is clean, very comfortable and safe. Most of all, the staff are very helpful specially Martin. He made sure that we go to places worth-seeing and the food places worth-tasting. He gave us a map and showed us how to reach the places by foot and by taxi. He took care of us like we are his family. Thank you Martin and also to the rest of the staff of Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.rating: Fantastic hotel and exceptional value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A fantastic hotel right at the centre of Hanoi city, with easy access to the main sights. Relaxed and friendly service, providing great recommendations for restaurants and sightseeing. Thank you for an amazing stay.

review.rating: Clean and quiet budget hotel in the Old Quarter of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel staff is very helpful and friendly that we've ever come across. Not only did they offer spot-on restaurant and sightseeing recommendations, help us to book travel and tours, they also provided us with a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay . We liked them so much that after our initial booking, we stayed with them again when we came back to Hanoi from Sapa. When our stay in Ninh Binh was cut short. We really cannot say enough good things about the team at Lheritage Diamond Hotel and would go out of our way to stay with them again if we are ever in Hanoi in the future!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel in the center of Hanoi, comfortable room and bed. Very friendly staff, always helpful with recommendations and guidance. Delicious breakfast with amazing diversity of products and great views from the Restaurant on the top floor.

review.rating: Excellent hotel, clean and super friendly staff. Would recommend thoroughly.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent service with every staff very attentive. Buffet breakfast having wide selection of food. Not only different types of fruits, but many local Vietnam delights. The view in our room overlooking the St Joseph Cathedral is really great. Since the hotel location is prime, one can walk leisurely to the Cathedral and also to the Hoan Kiem Lake within 3 minutes. A must stay in Hanoi Old City.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff were friendly and helpful. Spoke several languanges and helped with our luggage. Rooms are good and location is very walkable to Hoan Kiem lake and other attractions.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
I stayed for 5 days in Hanoi for holiday with a friend. The stuff is friendly, supportive and at the same time always discreet.
The place is close enough to old quarter to walk and distant enough to have your quiet time. The rooms are nice, comfortable and clean. The breakfast is excellent and serve asian and western food. I can recommend it highly as business hotel and for me it worked perfectly as holiday hotel

reviewer.name: Meilis
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We recently stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond ,as a young family looking to explore Hanoi, it was a fantastic location. The staff are warm, friendly and helpful. Phuong really looked after us from the beginning to end of our stay. Thank you!

review.rating: Wonderful stay in a lovely gem of a hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It is a very nice boutique hotel. The property was clean, breakfast excellent but what we loved the most was the service that this hotel provided. Staff was very helpful with whatever requests and questions we had.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: First, we have to disclose that we have stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel some time over the past six months. It is very difficult for a hotel to keep the service level at a high level over time but this hotel has managed to do that.The staff is very attentive and friendly, rooms are clean and nicely appointed, the location cannot be beat and the food in the restaurant is the best selection and quality in the Old Quarter. The breakfast which is a nice variety of fruits, salads, breads, etc. to start your day in Hanoi. We love seeing our welcoming friends at the Lheritage Diamond and look forward to our next stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Was greeted with a warm welcome upon arrival. Porters were helpful and the reception ladies  was helpful and made an effort to ensure we have transport and everything in order. Good recommendations for food around the area. Left my luggage under their care while we went to halong bay and sapa. Breakfast was great with egg options and pho for hot food and other continental spread was available as well. Small boutique hotel with great hospitality. You can expect the best service. Extremely convenient location with food and massage. Rooms were clean and beds comfy .

review.rating: OK value for money at the reduced price offered.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location was perfect for a short stay. Breakfast food was well cooked. My room was OK.
review.comment_negative: The choice and amount of breakfast food offered were insufficient.. The view from my room was a wall!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a new hotel and very beautiful inside...the rooms are gorgeous, the breakfast is amazing and the staff will go beyond the call of duty to assist you with your visit in Hanoi. If you are a new visitor to Hanoi, you probably will have all the questions we had and feel overwhelmed by the traffic, crossing streets, knowing how to maneuver through the city, plan trips, restaurant, etc. The staff at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  are incredible and made our stay very relaxed, supported and enjoyable. They stored some of our luggage while we were gone and that made traveling easier. I can’t say enough about staying at this hotel and the staff. It’s in a great location too. Don’t hesitate to stay at this lovely hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kindness on a whole new level clean room so polite and willing to help you this place is for sure getting a good review from me and I could write a book how pleasant of a stay this was your awesome and good job you well deserve a excellent on Booking hope to see you again soon....

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had stayed 3 nights at Hanoi Lheritage  in this trip and I see the consistency in services, and cleanliness throughout. The smile and from the heart and the willingness to help you against a bad taxi driver and changing your bus ticket is genuine. The hotel is very clean and fresh, hygiene level is very good and the bed is comfortable. Location is also good near the old quarter.

review.rating: Clean, centrally located hotel with helpful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a lovely hotel superbly placed for city sightseeing. Very close to the Cathedral and Lake . Comfortable rooms in the traditional size, baths, with shower. Excellent all-day dining and friendly staff. Recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: No negatives at all. Staff couldn’t have been more lovely and helpful to us. We were able to leave our suitcases here when we went up to Sapa for a couple of days and then when we came back for our final night in Hanoi they had everything stored for us. They have brilliant recommendations for where to eat and places to visit etc. Couldn’t recommend highly enough and would definitely stay here again .

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Fantastic rooftop breakfast room with views across the city. Good location for exploring the city.
review.comment_negative: The hotel was smaller than it looked in the photos so when we arrived we were not sure if we were in the right place. We had a room with two good windows but it was a bit dingy.

review.rating: 깨끗하고 조용하게 휴식하기 좋은 편안한 숙소
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: 깨끗하고 테라스에서 성요셉 성당이 보이는 것이 장점이며 아침과 저녁에는 조용하게 휴식할 수 있었음.
review.comment_negative: 욕조에 스파 기능을 여러번 사용했는데, 매번 물때인지 녹인지 건더기가 나와서 물을 여러번 버려내고 사용했다. 스파 기계를 청소해야할 것 같다. 욕실과 화장실은 매우 깨끗하다.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a very good stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel and I recommend.. with special thanks to Mr Martin Hotel Manager for his hospitality. Location is good. Overall very good experience and would love to come back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: good location, comfortable bed and attentive staff

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: centraal gelegen
review.comment_negative: nvt

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location
review.comment_negative: Reception  to small

review.rating: It’s ok if you need a bed
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is really great. The beds are comfortable. Staff is nice. The breakfast was very decent.
review.comment_negative: The room wasn’t clean enough. Especially the bathroom. There was is a window between the bathroom and the bed. Not sure why I would like to see my significant other poop. There are some curtains, but they don’t close fully and they are very dirty (full of mold).

review.rating: Great hotel in a perfect location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is just next to the Hanoi headquarter where is very convenient to discover Hanoi city. I have been stayed in city view room thus it was a bit noisy at night but it was still acceptable if you want to have a view otherwise the backside will be a better choice. The room is clean, nice with full equipment. WiFi is free and fast.Most of the staff is nice especially Mr Martin who checked me in is very friendly and helpful. Happy to be back here again

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: everything about the hotel went well.
review.comment_negative: nothing i dont like

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Excellent location and very friendly staff
review.comment_negative: I was expecting more based on the pictures

review.rating: Value for money and great location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cosy and clean room, helpful and friendly front desk staff and great location in the old quarter.

review.rating: Best and luxurious hotel in Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We have had such a great stay at the Lheritage Diamond hotel. The manager, Martin has gone above and beyond to make sure our daughter who is coeliac has had plenty to eat at breakfast time. Nothing was too much trouble, he always took the time to answer our questions and help us with anything. We definitely recommend a stay here, the rooms are charming and spacious and everything is so close. Thank you and we will be back soon!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location,Very helpful staff and delicious breakfast!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel. Staff were very friendly. Breakfast was good.  Beds are fantastic. The best sleep i had the whole trip. Shower pressure good. Would stay there again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: good location, staff were very helpful
review.comment_negative: basic rooms are very small with windows looking right into neighbouring flats.

review.rating: Friendliest and Best Staff of our Vietnam Trip
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Even though I checked out 2 days before, they kept my luggage for free during walking around Hanoi, which was very helpful. I was also able to take a shower. Martin and James are very very kind staffs. I love this hotel.
I Will use this hotel next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is ideally located in Old Quarters where a lot of good local food/restaurants are located. The hotel is really grand and the rooms are really nice and spacious. What stood out is the amazing service from the staff of the hotel. They were really friendly, attentive and professional. Service is truly a standout for this hotel. My family and I would like to give a special thanks to Mr Martin for making our stay a memorable one. Will definitely come back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel was super well located in the old quarters, right in the middle of the action. Service was phenomenal as they were super willing to go out of their way to help and make me feel comfortable during my stay. Would highly recommend!

review.rating: Lovely hotel, great location, friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really enjoyed our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel! The staff is very friendly and helpful, the rooms are clean and have all basic amenities. The hotel is well situated and it is easy to walk to different attractions. If I ever go back to Hanoi I wouldn’t hesitate to book this hotel again.

review.rating: An amazing stay with the incredible staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We used Hanoi as a base for part of our trip to Vietnam, coming and going over the course of a few weeks. Every time we stayed in Hanoi, we stayed at  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond, and I'm so glad we did. The hotel is clean and very nice, the beds are soft, the complimentary breakfast is delicious, and most importantly, the staff are friendly and helpful. It's also in a great location in the Old Quarter. I would highly recommend Diamond to anyone staying in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was extremely accommodating and allowed us to check in early. The room was clean, very comfortable, and all the staff we engaged with were amazing. The hotel breakfast was delicious and everyday there was something different. Take advantage of the rooftop bar the view is beautiful. The staff went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfect location, the staff was friendly and helpful, the room upgraded without Extra charge. We checked in before 14:00. Thanks for everything

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were fantastic so friendly and helpful nothing was too much to ask I could not fault the service. The beds were large and comfortable and the rooms clean and tidy. 100% would recommend for a place to stay in the Old Quarter of Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was an excellent place to stay, was really easy to book and communication was easy with staff, it is a great location in old quarter, very friendly staff, clean and comfortable rooms and affordable prices. We had a grand suite balcony room. Thank you Martin and staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: There is so much to rave about with this hotel.They helped us with everything from excursions, where places were and helped us transfer to our next hotel where our tour started from. We used the spa which was fantastic, breakfast was excellent and the hotel and pool beautiful.The hotel and staff are one of the nicest hotels I have stayed in and I have traveled a lot. Can’t recommend it enough.

review.rating: Best place to stay for first timers in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Highly recommended. It’s hard to say how much we love this hotel, without seeming false. We have stayed in some fabulous hotels around the world, but very few make you feel as naturally at home as soon as you step into the lobby as you will here. Staff are all outstanding. Rooms are delightfully furnished and beds so comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of everything in The Old Quarter and the staff will help you with whatever you need. Thanks to Martin & Sabi for looking after us on our visits.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: La situation est idéale. Le personnel est très à l’écoute, Sabi notamment, qui se démène dans tous les sens, pour trouver des solutions à tout, un grand merci à toute cette équipe de professionnels

review.rating: Great hotel location in middle of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location and convenient access to centre of old quarter, Hanoi. Very friendly hospitality and staffs are very helpful and polite. Room is kept clean. Food are excellent and tasty and staffs will ensure will enjoy the best out of it. Second time staying here and will come back again.

review.rating: The best staff and hotel in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great time here for a 2-night stay! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Awesome food too. Martin was great and helped me book tours to Ninh Bình and Hạ Long Bay. Would stay here again on my next trip to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Không gian phù hợp cho nhóm bạn ở tạm. Ban công là nơi có thể ngồi hóng mát buổi tối.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I would recommend this hotel for anyone who needs a great place to stay in Hanoi, very friendly, courteous and informative staff. The rooms are great & the breakfast is great.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing staff and hotel. Sabi went out of her way to make everything as comfortable as she could for us. We could store our luggage and even have a shower after we checked out. Location is perfect, you can walk everywhere you need to. We’ll be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Very large, calm and comfortable family room with 2 bathrooms. excellent location. friendly staff. With other words, very pleasant stay.
review.comment_negative: the breakfast buffet was just OK; with other words, it was disappointing for a hotel of that high standard. very surprising. I just advised them to go to Solaria Hotel (two streets away) to see what a hotel of the same high standards and same prices can offer…

review.rating: Great hotel in a great city
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent  customer service & beautiful room. Great city views. Broad selection of Western & Vietnamese breakfast buffet. Great  Located in  Hanoi Old Quarter central and 5 min walk to night market, very friendly staff who are extremely helpful ,

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Remek környéken van, tiszta, kis hotel. Az utcára nyíló szobák lehet kicsit zajosabbak, de megéri, hogy ne egy házfalat nézzünk a szobából, hanem a nyüzsgő forgalmat. Segítőkész személyzet, kicserélték az egyik szobánkat, amikor azt kifogásoltuk. Ár-érték arányában tökéletes. A szállás programokat is kínál.
review.comment_negative: A étkezőt csak lépcsőn lehet elérni, nem megy fel odáig a lift. Nekünk nem volt problémánk, de babakocsival nem lenne megoldható.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Tiene una ubicación excelente al lado de la catedral!!! las habitaciones limpias y grandes

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Front door staff was attentive
The rooms were a nice style
Clean and functional rooms
Bathtub was a good size
Good location, near cathedral and restaurants / cafes (street facing rooms are a bit noisy however)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Lovely location in the old quarter - on one of the less-busy and greener streets within the area. Very close to all other attractions. 
The room was clean and new.
review.comment_negative: Room is a bit small - but cant expect spacious room in this area

review.rating: Delicious breakfasts, incredibly friendly, cheerful and helpful staff, very pleasant rooms
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a fabulous 3 night stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The hotel is located right in the busy heart of the old quarter. Stepping outside you can immediately experience Hanoi street-life, yet inside the hotel is peaceful, quiet and relaxing. The staff were excellent - always friendly and helpful, taking an interest in our trip, giving great recommendations for restaurants and so on, and going beyond expectations organizing transport, booking and checking in, and even contacting our next hotel. The breakfast was delicious, with lots on the menu and very attentive staff. The room was a high standard, well-equipped and very clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A wonderful hotel experience. The room was very clean and comfortable and all our needs were taken care of. The hotel arranged a taxi for us from the airport. The staff were very helpful especially Martin Hotel Manager. Highly recommended hotel

review.rating: Central of all things in Ha noi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: An excellent hotel, located in the heart of the old town area of Hanoi. Rooms were very clean, modern and elegant. Service was excellent, with very friendly and helpful staff that made the stay a pleasure. Definitely one of my favourite hotels in Asia.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really very impressive hotel. Staff deliver a seamless experience at check in, opening door when going in and out, departure etc. Really makes you feel looked after. Design is excellent and build quality of rooms very good.  Would also recommend asking for the 'hotel map' - this is nicely designed by the hotel (rather than the free city ones with lots of adverts) and very helpful.

review.rating: Amazing service and location in centre of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel located in the old part of town. Close to Hoan Kiem lake. Quiet at night. Clean, nice rooms and friendly staff that will help you in any way. Prices are good and breakfast it’s great. We would stay here again ! We recommend!

review.rating: Peaceful lovely hotel in a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
On our recent visit to Hanoi we had the good fortune to have booked at this awesome property for our 6 day trip.
The moment Mr.Martin the GM of the hotel got to know that we were celebrating our anniversary he got us upgraded to an amazing Suite on the 8th floor. The Hotel is outstanding but the hospitality of the staff with a special mention to Mr.Jame and the lovely Ms. Sabi ensured that we had the most amazing stay there.
We sincerely thank all the above people for making our trip memorable. We will surely be back soon.

review.rating: the best location in Old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A new boutique hotel, beautiful, chic and clean! Biggest praise is the staff. The best service I've gotten from a boutique hotel. Staff were very friendly and sincere. We were greeted by welcome  and were given very detailed recommendation of the city. They upgraded our room for our family to stay at the same floor! We headed off to Halong Bay after a 3 day stay, hotel offered us free luggage storage for lighter travel. When we came back to collect our luggage, we had issues getting transport to our next hotel due to multiple luggage.
