But staff went all out to help us communicate with the drivers and eventually offered to help us book a 7 seater and communicated with driver for meter fare. Very very amazed by the service!

review.rating: Nice hotel on a good location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutely loved this hotel .The staff were genuinely nice and friendly . The food and drinks were delicious . Very comfortable rooms, Excellent location. If I ever return to Hanoi I will come back to this hotel and recommend to friends and family. Thank you for all your kindness to us during our visit .

review.rating: Lovely central hotel with great service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fabulous hotel in the heart of Old Hanoi. A perfect base for exploring. Beautifully decorated - I loved the big bathtub in the bathroom - in modern yet traditional style. Exceptional staff, courteous, professional, efficient and charming. Thank you Martin, Sabi, Jame for all your help. Very comfortable bedroom and excellent breakfast. Highly recommended.

reviewer.name: Sultan
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: المساحة جيدة قريب من نص المدينة
review.comment_negative: لا يوجد

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is amazing. Services are exceptional and great with vietnamese hospitality.  Clean and nice room and bed, bathroom, and most of all friendly and kind staffs. Having stayed at this hotel made my trip to Vietnam the best among all of my travels. Especially loved the vietnamese hospitality. Thank you!

review.rating: Comfortable stay in a central location.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Location and beds were comfortable.
I appreciated the breakfast boxes that they prepared for us since we had an early flight.
review.comment_negative: The smell of flowers in the lobby. I don’t know what the flowers were but it made me dizzy.

review.rating: One of the nicest places I have ever stayed in
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hidden gem, tucked away on a side street in Ha Noi’s Old Quarter, is fantastic! The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The facility was quite clean and well maintained. The rooms are stocked with snacks, water, toiletries, and a minibar. The Buffet breakfast is nice. Phuong at the front desk was very pleasant and helpful! The doorman during the day was also very kind. This facility is within easy walking distance of all the food, shopping, and people watching of the Old Quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Truly an amazing hotel! It is in a great location that is near, tourist sights, restaurants.The staff are extremly helpful, and many of them speak English. My wife and I also got massages...we enjoyed them soo much...we got them a second time. This is a  new hotel with large rooms. The bathrooms are particularly large. I'm 6'3 and 250lbs and its the first room in Asia that I have had more than enough space! Martin front desk agent, can give you great recomendations for bars and restaurants.thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Vị trí
review.comment_negative: Nhỏ, chưa sạch

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My family  stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond in Apr 2023. Vietnamese hospitality is incredible but this hotel had the very best and we traveled from south to north Vietnam. When we checked in, we had a welcome drink and Martin the hotel Manager sat with us, explained the hotel and city, and asked us what we had planned for our time in Hanoi. He provided us suggestions, gave us feedback on if what we planned was sufficient to fill our time, and gave us recommendations based on what we asked him such as where is the best place to try the Vietnamese egg coffee....The service here is unparalleled, and the location is fantastic. Breakfast was delicious as well!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location
review.comment_negative: Not clean, small room with uncomfortable bed. Breakfast is really poor.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
location and balcony 
shower and bed great
review.comment_negative: dated

review.rating: Comfortable rooms with an amazing breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Comfortable clean rooms with a nice big bed.  Amazing buffet breakfast with an Asian and western spread.
review.comment_negative: No windows in the room.  Like a lot of hotels in Hanoi.  Above average price for the room.  So many more options around.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We can’t recommend this hotel highly enough. The staff put themselves out to help and are so homely and welcoming. The hotel has had a makeover and is beautiful. Phuong at reception was exceptional and made knowledgeable suggestions for our stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel its self is great, best location, convenient to access to anywhere.  The decor of the room is very modern. All staff here are helpful and polite. I will be back Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel again!

review.rating: We are happy with the services provided ( breakfast, taxi to airport,etc…)
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Good location and good services.
We booked a family room for 3 adults and 2 children. Rooms are clean. Hotel staffs are helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent rooms, awesome location, decent breakfast. Good value room rate given the location. The corner nearby the St Joseph’s cathedral has plenty of great shops, dining and cafes, and it’s only 2 minute walk from the hotel.
review.comment_negative: Minor point but the coffee and tea supplied at breakfast was terrible.

review.rating: Best hotel to stay at city center
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We definitely recommend this hotel. Kind and professional staffs, great location near the Lake and night market and cozy, clean room condition. This hotel is newly built, so the room condition is the best. Clean, neat and cozy.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: location is good.
review.comment_negative: don't have.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel could not be better located, just 2 minutes waking from Hoàn Kiếm lake and close to most of the highlights in the city. Rooms are big, clean and in very good condition. Breakfast buffet it's very complete, from local food to Western options. But the best by far it's been the service and the staff. They are extremely attentive and professional. If I ever come back to Hanoi I'll definitely repeat.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every year, I come back here. Must say no place can compare to this hotel that in a center of a city and convenient for everything. Specially, all staff there are friendly and give the best service. Mr. Martin is always smiling, helpful and friendly in his service. He is amazing. Mr. Jame and all staff at the concierge are incredible. They always welcome me back every year with a big smile on their face. Love it love it…. Looking forward to seeing them soon.

review.room_type: Suite Executive

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Gostei da localização e da atenção dos funcionários. Cafe da manhã bom.
review.comment_negative: Da limpeza: o banheiro tinha pó. Chão sujo do quarto. Barulho a noite por falta de isolamento to do andar superior, do restaurante. Caro para o que entrega. Móveis antiquados.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed at this lovely hotel for five nights. The room was clean, well-decorated and lovely. I also enjoyed breakfast on the 10th floor, where you can see the beautiful view of the old quarter. And the servers are friendly, kind and caring. All the staff members at the hotel gave me kind, friendly, professional and hardworking impressions. I especially thank you to Phuong who supported and cared about me a lot during my stay. Hope to come back to this hotel soon.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is so beautifully decorated and the service is exceptional. From the first moment we walked in - Martin greeted us with a big smile and made sure our stay was perfect! You can also email to them before arriving to arrange your airport transfers . Definitely the best hotel I have been to and will definitely come back to Hanoi and stay here again.

review.rating: Hotel en el centro de un Hanoi con mucha gente y hasta dificil de caminar

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk customer service. We checked in twice & requested the same room & they provided our request. Great location & service! Will definitely stay here again the next time we are in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a beautiful hotel in a great location and the service is superb. The free buffet breakfast, has more than enough to satisfy. The king size bed beautifully comfortable, air con perfect, reliable wifi and an exceptional bathroom. The shower is one of the best I've had anywhere in the world, it's magnificent. I visit Hanoi for work often and have found my new go to hotel. I cannot fault it at all and will absolutely stay here again. To the staff, you all go out of your way to make the guests stay perfect. Thank you, you are all wonderful.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: very clean nice comfy room and great staff and location
review.comment_negative: breakfast was a bit poor

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sehr nettes Personal. Sehr gutes Frühstück.
review.comment_negative: Sehr kleines Zimmer.

review.rating: GREAT HOTEL IN THE HEART OH HANOI
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our experience at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was excellent, a highlight of our trip! Besides the great accommodations and value, the service provided by the staff was the best we’ve ever had. Sabi in particular went above and beyond in helping us plan our trip, schedule spa visits, reserve cabs, etc. She really made our entire trip easy and enjoyable.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: la posizione
review.comment_negative: la stanza non era quella prenotata dalle foto

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really loved this hotel. The staff were all without exception so friendly and helpful. Shout out particularly to Martin who helped us with booking a tour to Ha Long Bay, getting our laundry done etc. The location is excellent, right on the edge of the Old Quarter and convenient for Hoan Kiem lake. The room was a great size and very comfortable. We could not recommend this hotel highly enough. Really enjoyed our few days staying there.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect from the service to the room to location. The breakfast is amazing, and their speciality tea is incredible. We loved our stay so much we returned from HaLong Bay early and booked with them again! We would recommend this hotel to everyone, we loved every second.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The overall service is great, the room and restaurant are clean and foods are nice, staffs are providing good service and able to provide useful information for me to travel in the city. I recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff of the LHeritage Diamond Hotel was amazing! They were constantly trying to help in every way they could.  So was the front desk staff. All were extremely helpful. All in all the hotel was first class. They made our stay extremely pleasant.

review.rating: A comfortable, convenient, and very welcoming experience
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in the centre of old quarter. The room was spacious, clean, and comfortable. The hotel manager Martin was very good with communication and the hotel staff was kind and gave good restaurant suggestions. I would definitely recommend this hotel, especially if you want some peace at night.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great hotel in a great location! centre of the Old Quarter area.The hotel itself was also really good, with comfortable rooms. Breakfast buffet at restaurant is really good. Service was excellent and on par with other 4 star hotels I've been in as well, being friendly and professional without coming across as being too stiff. All in all, I had a great stay here across the 4 nights that I was in Hanoi and would definitely consider coming back again in the future!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay here. Firstly the staff are excellent! They’re so friendly and always wanting to help, they were amazing. Great location, great breakfast, the room was clean and while it was on a main road, we didn’t hear the traffic much. The only bad thing about this place was the hard pillows but very minor. Would definitely recommend if looking for a hotel in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I felt extremely comfortable staying in this hotel. The location is safe yet close to the city center - walking under 3 minutes ,the staff was very helpful, attentive, polite; the breakfast decent. This would be my hotel choice when I return to Hanoi

review.rating: Excellent stay hotel in Old Quarter .
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel exceeded my expectations. the staff at this hotel go above and beyond to make sure that your stay at Hanoi is as comfortable and fun as possible. I had multiple requests and had many questions and every single one of them was answered quickly. The location is extremely convenient and close to many tourist attractions and great restaurants.  I can confidently recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel is a wonderful find. Ideally located in old quarter. Staff couldn’t have been more helpful, always ready to help, always with a smile on their faces. Breakfast was a delightful buffet, lots of tropical fruit together with local Asian dishes. Highly recommend and would definitely return for an authentic stay in Hanoi.

review.rating: Luxury Boutique Hotel , Personal & Welcoming Staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was my first visit to Hanoi and stayed at Lheritage Diamond Hotel & Spa. The facilities and cleanliness were at the best. The whole staff  were very friendly and helpful. Every time, if i needed any help or guidance, they would give me the best recommendations. The variety of food in the breakfast was phenomenal. From the roof-top the view of Hanoi (old quarter) was amazing. Above all, the location of the hotel is such that all the best restaurants, shops and bars, are at walking distance. Next time, i visit Hanoi, I will definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Central location - Best staff and customer service. We stayed here for 3 nights at the start of our trip and then for 1 night upon returning from Sapa and before going to Ninh Binh. Located in the Old Quarter, easy walking distance to the shops, restaurants, night market.They had an a la carte menu for breakfast in addition to the buffet and were so happy to cater for our vegan dietary requirements. All the staff from the door staff, reception staff and restaurant were so helpful. This was such a thoughtful gesture and it touched our hearts. Thank you so much.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng có vài món cơ bản, không có gì đặc sắc. Phòng có ban công, cũng được.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed for one night during our honeymoon but wish we could have stayed longer. The desk staff were amazing and could not have been more attentive and genuine. The hotel was very nicely decorated and central. The breakfast was one of the best we had on our trip. If we come back to Hanoi we would return to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  without question and have already recommended it to friends.

review.rating: Very nice stay very nice staf
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: very good location, walking distance to main Hanoi attractions - Hoan kiem lake, night market, legend beer, dong xuan market, water puppet show, beer street, train cafe etc. hotel staff was friendly and helpful, they speak fluent English! was given a comprehensive map and list of attraction upon check in, very helpful!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay here! Friendly staff, nice amenities conveniently located in old quarters highly recommend this place. The breakfast buffet was excellent. Special shout-out to the hotel staff for accommodating all our requests and help us with planning local tours.

review.rating: Great hotel in the centre of Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: An amazing experience for us as they surprised us with an upgraded room for our 30th Anniversary. The whole team’s hospitality was commendable from the start of checking in to saying goodbye. Their personal touches, smiles and sweet gesture tick our happy bucket. Their bed was the most comfortable one throughout our whole trip in Vietnam. The Buffet Breakfast was included and we love that they had some local food for us too. This is a clear winner for us though our stay was short , it was very memorable.  We will be back ! Thank you for making our day so special .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is perfectly located in the Old Quarters in Hanoi. Everything is brand new because this hotel is new. The bed is so soft and comfortable. The pillows and comforter are so fluffy and it feels like you're sleeping on clouds. We only stayed here one night before our cruise to Halong Bay, but the customer service we received was top notch. All staffs were very helpful from the moment we arrived. The breakfast from the hotel was great and had variety. We enjoyed it before we got picked up for our cruise.  The view from the restaurant though is simply amazing and worth the extra expense. If I ever go back to Hanoi, I would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: location was excellent
review.comment_negative: rooms are compact

review.rating: Personal muy atentos, cama comoda, buena ducha, aire acondionado 10 ptos
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: El personal
review.comment_negative: El ruido, el barrio con mucha gente.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was a joy to stay with. The location is great - in the old town near the lake. The room was well appointed with a comfortable bed and lovely rain shower. The staff went over and above to make our stay enjoyable - they arranged an airport transfer, tickets to the water puppet show and even a tour guide. They greeted us warmly every time we passed through the spectacular lobby and seemed genuinely happy that we enjoyed their hospitality. Definitely highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Staying at The Lheritage Diamond Hotel in Hanoi was a delightful experience. I was welcomed by smiling and kind staff from the young man outside greeting me as I got of my taxi to the nice ladies at the reception desk. This continued throughout my full stay. My room was very nice! Comfortable, quiet, and with high class amenities. I took a bath and the bath oil is just so relaxing.
I also went to the hotels SPA and I must say my cupping massage was very pleasant, very professional. I enjoyed it so much!
Breakfast buffet is so delicious. So many dishes to choose from, fresh and I could see the kitchen staff checking on it constantly, and the waiting staff was also very kind and professional. The location is so convenient, right in the heart of Hanoi Old Quarter, walking distance to everywhere you want to walk to. Yes, I had a wonderful stay and it will certainly not be my last one.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It's an excellent Hotel at an ideal location in the centre of old quarter with extremely friendly and helpful personnel. They help with trips and taxi's and basically everything to make your stay pleasant. The rooms are very clean and quiet with comfortable beds.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good breakfast
review.comment_negative: Value for money. It just felt tired and cramped.  We stayed at similar priced hotels on our vacation in Hanoi with way better facilities and service.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Posizione incredibilmente comoda, muoversi a piedi è un gioco da ragazzi! Letto comodissimo e staff a disposizione per ogni evenienza!

review.comment_positive: clean rooms. nice comfortable beds with all facilities as would a 5* hotel. breakfast was great. staff was extremely helpful and professional esp Thi (at front desk). good spread at breakfast.
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is conveniently located, room are wide and clean but not very new. Breakfast is abundant and very good. I enjoyed an awesome Vietnamese massage at a good price to be in a hotel. Hotel staff was super-friendly and helpful, especially Martin who also managed to give us our room early which was much appreciated after a long trip.

review.comment_positive: Wonderful urban boutique hotel in the Old Quarter. Really hip and cool rooms and lobby, outstanding staff, excellent breakfast buffet, great view from top floor.  Would definitely recommend and would stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Vị trí trung tâm Hà nội, rất thuận tiện. Nhân viên thân thiện, chu đáo

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is clean and well organized. The staff were amazing and attentive to all of our requests. James one of the employees, made sure we had everything we needed and our stay was as comfortable as possible. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a delightful hotel experience! We will definitely be back next time!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had two excellent stays at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  in Hanoi! It was so lovely we came back after visiting other regions. The staff are very helpful, always going out of their way to help with reservations for excursions, train tickets (cheaper than online prices) and calling taxis. The rooms are very nice, beds comfortable with nice linens and a fully stocked bathroom with nice tub and shower. The breakfast selections were amazing, including a made-to-order station. They allowed us to store our luggage on two occasions which was very helpful. We were welcomed with drinks and cold towels upon arrival. The location is perfect and we couldn’t have asked for more. I highly recommend this hotel!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is really comfortable. Situated in a great part of town. The staff team were delightful and seemed genuinely concerned that I was looked after well which I was. Nothing was too much trouble. Staff very helpful in ordering Vespa bike and airport transfer.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: 5star location. Very friendly staff. Will recommend to anyone who visit Hanoi to choose this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent value and close to all the old town tourist activity. Staff were very helpful, especially in suggesting and booking excursions (to Sapa and Halong Bay) then cancelling and returning deposits - due to shortened trip. Would stay here again.

review.rating: Location, cleanliness, staff & service, amenities, property conditions & facilities
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.rating: Best hotel to choose in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Have stayed here now on numerous occasions.. Lovely hotel that has everything you would want.. Clean spacious bedrooms, comfy beds.. Yummy buffet breakfast with a wide variety.. Also had a lift which is a bonus.. Located in a side street so not so busy and 1 minute walk to the lake.. Have stayed in 3 different rooms from Balcony to window view . Thank you!

review.rating: Short and that was a good thing.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel design was nice, room was clean and comfortable. Queen bed was fine for superior room, breakfast was nice as there is buffet option and ala carte menu to choose from. Staff at this hotel was excellent in attending to guest needs. they help me to arrange last minute tours when it was quite late at night. Overall, a recommended place to stay in Hanoi, near to the busy streets in Old quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
excellent staff member at reception called Martin
who couldn’t be more helpful. great location!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel and staff were all kind and friendly. The hotel was beautiful and the staff were incredibly helpful and hospitable. Sabi, Jame and Martin went above and beyond to ensure we were looked after as did all the staff who we interacted with.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
For me, great customer service and staff equates to a great stay. This was the case with this hotel. The hotel is pretty good and the facilities are also the same. 

There was a certain incident in our room which could have easily taken this review down to the 4/10 realm, but the staff definitely saved it. For this I’m willing to give them a 10/10 because they went above and beyond to make-up and make us feel better.
review.comment_negative: It’s a bit noisy considering the location, all the honking by motorbikes can get to you sometimes

review.rating: Top notch hotel, service, food and location unsurpassed!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My husband and I had a wonderful experience staying at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel! The staff were incredibly friendly. Ms Sabi was amazing and helped check us in and kept in touch over WhatsApp, giving us great recommendations for food and things to check out nearby! The location is unbeatable too, being in the center of old town Hanoi and within a short walking distance of all of old town.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel in centre of old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A truly fantastic hotel with wonderful staff. Quick and easy check in. Large comfortable room with everything you need including a safe. Friendly professional staff dedicated to delivering quality customer service. The hotel location is very good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Vị trí thuận lợi đi bộ ra phố cổ và các hàng quán ăn
review.comment_negative: Phụ thu 3% nếu khách trả bằng thẻ mà không có thông báo trên trang khách sạn hoặc in thông báo ra tại quầy công khai. Lấy lí do máy thẻ bị hỏng để buột khách thanh toán tiền mặt hoặc chuyển khoản.

review.rating: Get the Executive suite with balcony

review.comment_positive: Great room.  Large, modern clean with big balcony and large modern bathroom.  Good wifi and good TV.
review.comment_negative: Lobby and reception are tired.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location.
review.comment_negative: The room size is small

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at this hotel as part of our honeymoon in January! Could not fault a thing! From the welcome, very comfortable room and location in the heart of the busy old town! We met Sabi when we arrived who was incredibly kind and welcoming and showed us the key ‘hot spots’ to visit in town! Including her favourite egg coffee ( which is an absolute must) she shared her WhatsApp number in case we needed anything and was on hand to help with a taxi we had prearranged .. sending reg numbers etc to ensure we were ok!
10/10 would recommend to stay here!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Nice large terrasse in the room, very good breakfast, very central situation near old city lake

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative: It wasn’t clean enough and not comfortable compare with the cost

review.rating: Great hotel in the middle of the action!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is great just next to Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral , the room are nice and modern. But above everything is the kindness of the persons at the reception. They were helping us for anything we need at anytime 24/24. Definitely great value for money and all our family can recommend this hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: New hotel and they are doing it right. Staff are doing their best to put it a cut above the rest and excellent value for quality, service and location. Wish I had found this place early. Could have stayed longer. Will be back again. Early checkout for the airport and they had a to go pack ready for me to have on the way. Many thanks!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in the heart of the old quarter which is where all the action is in this sprawling city. The welcoming and warm hotel nestles nicely into the busy lively streets with modesty. Having good sized, clean, quiet rooms and lots of little touches that you might expect in a modern thinking boutique hotel, toothbrushes, razors, diverse mini bar etc. With excellent breakfast choice and freshly made crepes to die for the day got off to a fine start every time. Its not a flash place, in fact it benefits in my view from not being pretentious. But, what really made my stay so enjoyable was, like a lot of other reviews have indicated, the warm generosity of the staff. Here I felt very much at home for my 4 nights stay and I'd happily stay there again.....and remember, if you do go, try the crepes

review.rating: We will come back next time
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayey at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond and Spa in Hanoi Vietnam, the place was near at commercial area, like shopping store, restaurant tourist spot..
The room was very beautiful and clean spacious, the bed was very comfortable and also the pillow was very soft. The breakfast was delicious, yummy, many fruits, also the hotel staff are very good services.
thank you so much, we stay for days. God Bless

review.rating: Lovely hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good. Value for money. Nice buffet breakfast at top floor with view. Staff fluent in English and helpful and friendly. The rooms are nicely decorated and newish. Clean rooms and towel. The in-room wifi works well. We will comeback again to this Hotel once we are in Vietnam!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: KS gần hồ, và nhà thờ
review.comment_negative: Đồ ăn sáng hơi ít

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Special thanks to hotel Manager Mr. Martin who provided great guidance for our first trip in Hanoi. He recommended many places of interest and great local delicacies. Truly enjoyable experience. Not the least to mention, the hotel provides good comfort with accessibility at really affordable pricing. Looking for a place to stay in Hanoi? Consider your stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Thanks.

review.rating: Wonderful stay for first timers in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff here are so lovely and accommodating. A special thank you to Martin and his staff for always chatting to us! The rooms are spacious, clean and comfy! I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel close to the main attractions of the city.

review.rating: Great hotel location in Hanoi Old Quarter Central!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location,Service and Value for Money

review.rating: Friendly and helpful staff, perfect location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had really great time during my stay. Especially thanks to Martin, he provided a lot of restaurant and place to visit idea for us which very helpful as my stay was Tet period many shop closed, he keep in touch with us everyday to give us some idea and make sure we enjoyed everyday. Not to mentioned, he prepared birthday surprise and gifts for me. Which the whole experience was incredible. The hotel have great Spa,  breakfast, location and clean. As well as all staff are very friendly and helpful. It's the best service and hospitality I ever had so far, which definitely the only hotel I want to stay again in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Inexpensive hotel is strategically located in the old quarter with easy access to many sights and sounds. Easy 2 minutes stroll to Hoa Kiem lake. Easy walk to many small shops and street food. There is a spa facility in house. Easily fits four. The room was spacious and size larger the average. One other deluxe room was booked for . The rooms were well equipped . Free breakfast was included. Selection was plentiful and choices vary each day. Delicious Vietnamese food and cuisine. There was an egg station where you can order omelette or egg .Food presented beautifully. Beef and chicken pho was delicious and filling! Great food and great stay. Thank you Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our rooms were just as spacious as they’re supposed to be and worth every penning. Complimentary was such a treat with lots of selections. With the help of guest service representative , nothing was too much trouble, our choices became much easier as one is seriously allergic to gluten. He also provided us with great insight about Hanoi and tourist attractions in Vietnam.We’ll be coming back pretty soon.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Hotel place to stay. Greeted by Mr. Martin with a welcome cup of tea as he explained the property in a lovely lobby area designed. Very comfortable room. The entire staff is very friendly and accommodating .Great location, very clean and new. Air conditioning also works very well in the room! Breakfast has loads of options as well. Will stay here next time I visit!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We spent two nights at this hotel. Staff went out of their way to help us. They were professional, helpful, friendly and supportive. Rooms were clean and well presented, breakfast was good, we slept really well despite the fact we were right by road and lots of traffic. Sound was unheard. Ling, one of the staff was one of the team and she made sure that we got the connection for the train. She was brilliant. All the staff were. Brilliant hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is first class, rooms are spacious and well appointed.staff friendly and very helpful. Breakfast is amazing. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again.

review.rating: Clean hotel near Hoan Kiem lake.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel, very organized, and very clean. Staff so friendly and attentive and greeted us on arrival & gave us a gift when we left.  We took advantage of the spa and treatments were great and very relaxing. Eggs/omelette for breakfast were prepared on request and remaining breakfast buffet was a good selection. Location in the Old Quarter was perfect . We had room 705 at the back of the building which was very quiet. Will would definitely stay here again when next in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.rating: Would recommend as one of the best premier hotels in Hanoi

review.comment_positive: My experience was really very good specially because of organizer Mr Martin  who not only organize 1 day tour for Ninh Binh and 2D1N trip for 5⭐ cruise in Halong Bay with best room as per our need with in our budget in Hanoi must contact him for any bookings in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had a recent stay here. I must say, this hotel provided some of the best service I experienced. Everything from greeting me every time I entered to providing great local recommendations for my first time in Hanoi. The room was always clean and staff very friendly. I would stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location was great and the staff very helpful.
review.comment_negative:
The shower had quite a lot of mold, it therefore didn’t feel very clean. The walls are very thin. We could hear the room next door talking (and shouting) and everyone else talking in the hallway (and doors repeatedly slamming).

On one of the days, the cleaning staff entered our room at 9:00 am when we were still in bed. They did not knock or check whether we were still in our room (which was quite a big possibility as it was 9 am). That did not feel great waking up like that.

Breakfast was ok, nothing too special.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed 3 nights in this wonderful . The rooms were large and beutifully decorated. Comfy beds. It is located in the middle of the old town which is very busy. But inside the rooms it was quiet. The breakfast was great. But most of all, we are so impressed by the service, kindness and willingness to help from the staff. A special thanks to James, Sabi, Martin for their wonderful service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Excellent location and great hotel. Excellent breakfast and rooms are clean with air conditioning.
Would recommend to all types of people who are looking for a hotel that ticks the box. The perfect cheap place to stay whilst in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The second time coming back to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. Despite many difficulties of covid-19, I am really surprised they still maintain a very welcoming and friendly manner. Felt like coming back home not only an accommodation. I know they have faced many difficulties that's why I respect their effort more.
Thank you so much for everything, I wish you all the best.

review.rating: The best location in Old quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed three nights in a suite. Rooms are big with window. Location is perfect in the middle of the old quarter within walking distance to all major sights in Hanoi. Hotel is spotless clean. Breakfast was great. Employees speak English very well for Vietnam and have a polite and very friendly attitude. Not stressful either as you find in many other places. If you need information or help to something, talk to Phuong at the reception. She is a great customer service  and get things done. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức khá, có ban công nên thoáng. Gia đình tôi cũng không có phàn nàn gì.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I have had the opportunity to experience many hotels in Hanoi, because of the nature of my current job. But when I arrived at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel, I was very impressed and enjoyed this place ( the best location in hanoi) . great breakfast.

review.rating: Perfect hotel location in Old town central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sabi was an excellent host who went out of her way to help with all of our needs. She answered all of our questions, rearranged transport we had booked last minute due to a cancelled trip and was very efficient. She also recommended great places to eat. The rooms were comfortable, the bedding was very soft and the mattress firm but comfy. The rooms were to a good clean standard and we got bottles of water courtesy of the hotel each morning. The road the hotel is on is quite busy and the air leaks through the windows but this didn’t disturb us too much. We were also able to leave our luggage in the hotel for 3 days whilst we headed over to Sapa which was great! Overall we had a nice stay and would definitely recommend. Thanks!

review.rating: The hotel was clean with friendly staff,  but is is looking very tired
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel was valued at for money right in the middle of a busy city but it was quiet at night which was good
review.comment_negative: The breakfast was very basic with a poor choice , but the staff was friendly . I would say the breakfast area badly needs updating

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is conveniently located in the heart of the old quarter. However taxi or grab can be easily hauled from location. Breakfast on site had very options (Vietnamese and western) and we overall enjoyed everything we tried. Lastly, staff was very courteous and helpful. Definitely recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Central location, within walking distance of many good restaurants. The hotel organized transport to and from the airport for us, and the driver was already at the airport when we landed, so we didn't have to wait. The room was simple but spacious, and we were very comfortable staying here. The entire team was extremely helpful and friendly, making our stay very enjoyable. Would stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is on the old quarter central . As soon as we arrived they made us feel so welcome. The room was clean . The breakfast was amazing, clean, fresh juices, tasty food, excellent bun bo and beef pho. The broth for both dishes were tasty. Amazing roof top bar with amazing views. Close and easy to walk to all the attractions. Great food recommendations by the staff who were very attentive and gave a personalised service. We would highly recommend this hotel and would stay here in the future

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.comment_negative: perhaps because it's in the older quarter, and like all the hotels nearby, the hotel room is not very spacey. But not a problem in general

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
This hotel is superb. We stayed 3 nights. The rooms are modern and very well appointed. The breakfast buffets are superb. Service was outstanding from front desk to housekeeping to servers in the restaurant.
The location was excellent, close to the lake to walk around, I will be back Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The place is in the middle of old quarter so it is easily accessible. Staff was very friendly and helpful! It’s a bit hard to find the hotel but room is comfy and clean. I would highly recommend!

review.rating: Great hotel location in Hanoi central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice clean hotel in a great area. Staff were very helpful. They stored our bags while we went on an overnight excursion to ha long bay, offered a room for us to shower in once we got back (even though we did not have another night booked), and helped us book an overnight bus to our next destination.

review.rating: Clean the room.. there is a cockroach n mosquitoes. The toilet smells a little bad ordor n not clean

review.rating: Great view, Satisfactory Breakfast, Quiet, Kid-friendly
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Rooms
The executive room on high floor was spacious, clean and equipped. Although there was only 2 tea/coffee bags which is not enough! Mini bar and snacks were full of varieties. There was a hair drier and I received an iron with deck when I asked for it. Thete were two big windows on two walls and a small openable window in the bathroom. Bath room has glass walls with adjustable drapers.
Nearby activities
Plenty of shops, restaurants, cultural sites and activities are nearby in the old quarter.
Safety
It was pretty safe and near the main streets. Although it is better for solo travelers to be back before 10 pm.
Walkability
It is on a busy street near the main street (Trang Thi) almost 5 min to reach hoan kiem lake. A Winmart supermarket is at the right side of Trang Thi cross if you need to buy grocery or other stuff.
Food & drinks
Breakfast was good and included fruits, juices, susages, and bacon. Some vegan options are there as well. There was only chedar cheese available while I like feta. Egges can be ordered as fried or omlette.
review.comment_negative: In vietnam they only give cold milk while I expected hot milk poured in my coffee!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Good location
review.comment_negative: Too many children. Breakfast was average

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I strongly recommend this place for anyone looking for a good hotel to stay in Hanoi, it’s in the heart of Hanoi old quarter and easily accessible to all the tourists destinations. The hospitality was excellent and it was like home, Martin and Sabi are super helpful with coordinating our pick up and drop off, Sabi always being available via Whatapps while we were out and about for suggestions and tips. Overall, we had a wonderful experience!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: During my two week vacation in Vietnam, I stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel on 02 separate occasions! That should tell you how awesome I think this hotel is. The rooms are comfy, the breakfast was delicious and possibly my favorite during my trip , and the hotel staff were all so warm and friendly. Martin was so hospitable and made our stay in Hanoi so special. In fact, they even helped us arrange transportation, hotels in other cities, and a cruise in Halong Bay! They truly went above and beyond and we couldn’t be more grateful!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A very luxurious hotel amongst the craziness of the Old Quarter. The furnishings and artwork are beautiful. The rooms (albeit on the small side) are well appointed with very comfortable beds. The breakfast buffet had a pretty good choice including local, other Asian & Western/European choices. I will miss having my daily bowl of yummy Beef Pho. I would recommend booking a Hanoi Lheritage Diamond room to get a room on a higher floor. Thanks to all the very helpful staff for a great stay.

review.rating: Good location, friendly staffs, nice hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were absolutely amazing! Very accommodating and welcoming! Showed up restaurants on a map with great recommendations. They helped accomodate us when we were delayed due to visa issues. The room was lovely and as was breakfast. The hotel is so so central to the main activities. Would stay again!

review.rating: Très bien situé. Martin, l’agent de voyage à l’intérieur de l’hôtel a organisé nos transports au Vietnam par WhatsApp en

review.comment_positive: Such a pleasant trip for us to stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel . The breakfast was fantastic with both vegan and non vegan food . The staff were very friendly too especially Hotel Manager Mr Martin. Such a big helper for me . I will defenitely comeback again soon !!!

review.rating: hài lòng với kì nghỉ này
