review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel has about 10 floors and restaurant on top floor,and yes it has a elevator that works great, the room is very clean, has very good bedding and mattress. The bathroom is very nice and they give you all the amenities I can think of (soap, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, razor, toothbrush, comb, sewing kit, ear swabs). Fresh towels everyday and the water is hot, hot , hot all day long. The shower id great, it is one of those big shower heads and it works great. As far as the staff goes, I cant say enough about how helpful they are, they where all so nice, friendly and made you feel at home. Thanks to all!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
First, the location was amazing. It was located right in the heart of the Old Quarter. We had an 18 hour layover in Hanoi and this allowed us to maximize our short time here. We got to experience the culture of Vietnam in an incredible way.
Second, Hotel manager Mr Martin , he helped coordinate a private car from the airport to the hotel and gave us a full itinerary of places to eat and visit to maximize our short stay. thank you for all that you did for us. I hope to see you again soon.We will definitely be visiting here again in our next trip to Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location was great,  near shops,  restaurants, and the Cathedral.
review.comment_negative: The room was not sound proof, so we could hear other guests opening/ closing their door, moving etc and the street was also noisy.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic staff. They really helped us in everything we needed. They booked taxis and tours for us. They were very accountable. Location is perfect in Old quarter central.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: 立地がいい。受付でタクシーの手配等すぐに対応してくれました。最終日5:30にホテルを出発しなくてはならなかったが、5:30にタクシーを用意してくれて朝ごはんまで用意してくれました。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a great hotel, beautiful and very comfortable. The location is great and the service just amazing! Sabi was wonderful and really went out of her way to make sure we were cared for and happy at all times, including surprising us for our honeymoon! Breakfast was delicious too. We just wished we would have stayed at the Lheritage Diamond longer!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is in a convenient location in Hanoi. Its but a 2 minute walk to the Lake area and Hanoi's St Joseph Cathedral. But what sets this hotel apart is the small gestures of hospitality they gave my family on our visit. They arranged for us to get a better & larger room for our extra companion at a lower cost; They made sure to ask our inputs & comments on the tours we booked via the hotel each day and best of all they made sure to pack us a delicious & nutritious breakfast since we are unable to avail of it due to our early morning flight home. All this gestures might be small in nature but this is what truly matters and sets them apart from other hotels in Hanoi. Thank you to Lheritage Diamond Hotel making our vacation in Hanoi a truly wonderful stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: phục vụ tận tình, chu đáo

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is the best out of all we have stayed! They have the best buffet breakfast as well as the best staff! Would definitely go back to LHertiage Diamond Hotel if I were to visit Vietnam again someday!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Todo, amabilidad y buen servicio
review.comment_negative: nada

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a lovely hotel! The staff are very friendly and helpful, great breakfast including buffet with a la carte options . Close to the lake , Cathedral and old city streets. I had a room facing the street but good windows  glazed so the street sounds didn’t bother me. It felt like a home away from home while I was there!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our one-night stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was a short but great one. The service was impeccable. The hotel staff booked us a 2-way bus service to and from Sapa. The room was spacious which is rare for a hotel in Vietnam, The location is also very central as it is very close to the night market at Old Quarter. Overall a very pleasant stay and value for money. Highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Highly recommend this hotel to everyone who wants to travel to Hanoi. The manager Mr Martin provided excellent service. He really helped us a lot. Definitely will go back to the hotel next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was absolutely perfect. The room was spotless and provided a comfortable haven for us. The breakfast was delicious, offering a variety of choices each morning. During our Ha Long Bay tour, we left for a night, and upon our return, we were delighted to find that the hotel had upgraded our room in honor of our honeymoon. This thoughtful gesture made our stay even more special. The location in Hanoi's Old Quarter couldn't be better, with easy access to all the attractions. Highly recommend this hotel for an unforgettable stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We arranged airport pick-up which was waiting with my name even though there was a delay getting in through customs, lovely staff, comfortable room & nice firm bed. Best coffee with mix of very good Vietnamese & Western breakfast [made to order omelets] fresh fruit. & - Great location! in Old Quarter by Lake. Hotel arranged Ha Long Bay Tour.

review.rating: Great experience and value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is an excellent boutique hotel conveniently located in the Old Quarter near most of the main sights in Hanoi.Delicious breakfast buffet with both western and local food choices. Sabi at the front desk also helped to arrange for two rickshaw/pedicab to take us on a 2 hr tour around Hanoi and helped to avoid the hassle of me trying to figure out how to negotiate with drivers to take us around town. SHe also helped to arrange for us to have puppet show tickets at will call.
There was no hesitation to help answer questions and provide 4 star service. It made for a memorable and very comfortable trip to Hanoi.

review.rating: Great location, okayish breakfast, dirty bathrobes
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: It has one of the best locations. It is very centre in the old quarter and you can go anywhere from that point. Is very close to food places, cafes, shopping stores, hair salon. We also like the staff appart from one person. they were polite and helpful
review.comment_negative:
What we didn’t like is that the room felt dirty to us. The bathrobes were both dirty and we requested to change them. The staff were great and in return they brought us a bottle of wine but I think the damage was irreplaceable. The bathroom had a bad smell and the ventilation wasn’t enough. The metal in the bathroom were rusty (such us the shower phone, the bin, etc). Also, although the staff were overall great, one particular person even though she was polite and friendly she was very pushy. She was very pushy to make us pay upfront for tours she was pushing to make us buy. we assumed that she wanted us to book in advance because maybe they are getting a commission, so that’s way she was trying to make us buy before because she said that in half hour her shift will be over, but guess what… her shift didn’t over in half hour (we checked it).

Overall it was a good stay, okay breakfast, but not value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Nice place to stay
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: One of the best hotels inHanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Spent 3 nights at the hotel with my  daughter and highly recommended it to anyone staying in Hanoi as it’s conveniently located. The hotel has a luxurious vibe and the rooftop restaurant.The rooms are spacious modern and very clean. Best of all was the staff, nothing was an inconvenience to them, they are courteous, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. Mr Martin saw to all of our needs and was extremely friendly and made our stay extra special. Would definitely stay here again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: An absolutely ideal location in the heart of the old town. Martin and his team did an excellent job of looking after us all and made us feel extremely welcome from the outset. I would definitely recommend this hotel, it is immaculately clean and very well maintained. Thanks to all for a great stay. We will be back!

review.rating: A warm and welcoming place with the best staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My three generations family - stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for 3 nights, and we all loved Every thing at the hotel: The location is lively, but still comfortable, the rooms are beautifully decorated, the restaurant serves a very good breakfast. And the staff are all particularly helpful and friendly.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is great. The spa was good. Good value for the price. The best part is the staff. The go above and beyond and is very helpful. I would stay here again.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Ubicado
review.comment_negative: NO demasiado amplio

review.rating: Amazing hotel with super friendly staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service was excellent and the facilities were very well maintained. Beautiful modern room. Jame & Sabi at the front desk were very helpful throughout the stay and gave me excellent recommendations for my time in Hanoi. Thank you so much!

review.rating: An amazing place to stay with an over the top staff for service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: New hotel with perfect location right in the heart of the Old Quarter. Every time we stepped through the door the staff welcomed us warmly. The rooms are very comfortable and we had everything we needed. The staff also made check-out very easy, allowing us to leave our luggage and have a shower before going to the airport. I couldn't recommend this hotel more !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Một nơi ở tạm ổn cho chuyến đi ngắn ngày. Phòng có ban công, cũng sạch.

review.rating: The room was not a family room.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The location!
review.comment_negative: Our room was too small for the family of four. We arrived to late at night to say anything

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: In overall the hotel was very good. Rooms were clean and in good condition, breakfast was delicious, staff very friendly and helpful and the location of the hotel was very very good. It is excellent choice those wanting to explore the old quarters of Hanoi and spend few days close by restaurants and shopping opportunities in the city.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service was amazing, they helped us celebrate a birthday! Everyone was so welcoming . The breakfast was delicious and it is well positioned to enjoy Hanoi! We got multiple recommendations to go to amazing restaurants and cafes. They allowed us to leave our luggage here for safe keeping which was extremely helpful!Beds were so comfy & the rooms are spacious. There is also a lovely restaurant with great views

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms and beds are excellent and well-cleaned daily. It is a luxury hotel and its location is in the Old Town central , so you can have access to the stores and restaurants. Moreover, it is located in Old quarter which is the center of Hanoi for any venue you would like to visit.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wow. We stayed here in May 2023. We had flights cancelled and arrived late and they were so accommodating. The room was extremely clean, excellent central location and the staff were beyond helpful and kind! We were able to book a trip to Ha Long Bay right from their helpful staff at the reception and they arranged drives to and from the airport. After Ha Long Bay they let us keep our bags there for safekeeping even though we were leaving Hanoi that night. Highly recommended!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing service, Phuong is the most amazing receptionist of all time. Absolutely delightful and so so helpful, with our stay and with allowing us to leave bags and shower before the bus to halong bay.

review.rating: Wonderful respite in craziness of Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lheritgage Diamond  hotel is a must stay if you travel to Hanoi, the staff are amazing people and will help you with anything you need around Hanoi, the room was so comfortable and quite I also enjoyed the breakfast every morning. Such a nice gem can’t wait to come back one day!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Quiet area with quiet rooms. Easy to find. Delicious breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Room was very small and had no view. Price was quite high.

review.rating: Great location and very helpful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed at this hotel in Aug 2023, The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Martin was helping us with the check in process and explained everything in detail. Located in the heart of old quarter, getting around was very easy. As I had a late flight, they were kind enough to look after my bags until then.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel , had the best stay, restaurant is amazing , food lovely, beds very comfortable, right in the heart of the city , everything within walking distance, had the best massage I’ve ever had there we would definitely return to this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative:
On the Booking identified include Breakfast - In the reality, No Breakfast !! 
bathroom has only small soap!! other Hotel on this rate provide all the thing for bath

review.rating: We enjoy our stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond very much!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location of the hotel is superb and walking distance to the market and shopping mall. Highly recommend for everyone come here stay at Lounge, you will get significantly outstanding service in Hanoi. The service was excellent, and our server Martin was both attentive and extremely helpful. Overall, a very positive experience which we would recommend to anyone.

review.rating: Excellent hotel location in Hanoi Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a wonderful experience at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel. The staff were lovely and extremely responsive - if I needed anything they would promptly try their best to help me (eg. Booking tours, directions, recommendations etc.) Everyone was very smiley and friendly which made for a great stay. Would highly recommend - the breakfast is also very good and the rooms were clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Excellent location! right I. the middle of old town n all the action. Cafes all around. Staffs were very nice and accommodating.
review.comment_negative: The hotel is old , rooms can be small.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, chỗ ở trung tâm

review.rating: Clean modern hotel in the perfect location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here twice so far on this trip. Friendly and helpful staff (helped us organize laundry & transport to destinations, as well as packing a takeaway breakfast box for our journey) , lots of restaurants and amenities nearby and clean modern rooms. We even received an upgrade on our return visit after Ha Long Bay. Would thoroughly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I booked this hotel last-minute and it was one of few available options. It's a few minutes walking from the lake, right in the heart of the Old Quarter. I was "upgraded" to a room with windows. However, the kindness of the staff and their continuous willingness to make every effort to ensure you have a pleasant stay is one I haven't experienced thus far. The team is very young and very kind,thank you so much!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My first time at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel, and I enjoyed my 2 nights stay in a Superior room. The room was on the smaller size, but this is in keeping with Hanoi hotels, and more than big enough for me. A huge bed, nice compact bathroom with a walk in shower; everything was clean and well presented. The staff are very nice, and super helpful. The hotel is close to some of these, but I had a 4th floor room, and it was peaceful and quiet. Hotel is well priced for what it has to offer, and I would be more than happy to return.

review.rating: Boutique Hotel in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location. We had lovely city view room when we stayed 1st time & we’re lucky enough to get the same room a few days later. it really did feel like returning home. Thank you to everyone who made us feel so welcomed & your great local recommendations.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Centrally location with restaurants, eateries, cafes, shopping all at arms length. Staff are all cubs and super energetic. Lake is hardly 2 minutes away. Saturday Sunday night market is 5 minutes walk. Can book all the trips from hotel and travel companies near by. Rooms are cost clean with daily house keeping. Has tea makers.  Lift is also super fast.
Breakfast is good with cornflakes milk, bread, croissants and local food with 2 vegetarian option and a soup. Tea coffee on the house. Will recommend several people. My special mention for all the reception girls.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable hotel in a great location with an absolutely lovely crew of people working there. We were in and out of Hanoi in December and spent a total of 6 nights at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond , in 3 different rooms, all nice. Would definitely go back. Thanks and love to Martin and Sabi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: we had no idea what to expect but this place is a gem. The location is perfect. Highly Highly recommend, and would stay again. Beautiful hotel, with amazing people.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: God beliggenhed
review.comment_negative:
Blev mødt af en meget emsig receptionist som gerne ville have, at jeg annullerede min reservation på booking.com og betalte direkte til hotellet. Jeg fortalte hende flere gange at det ikke var muligt pga annullering betingelserne.
Værelse lugtede meget parfumeret, det var åbenbart de produkter rengøringen brugte.
Meget kedeligt udvalg til morgenmaden

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Truly a stone's throw away from Hoan Kiem Lake. Vibrant day and night life around this hotel. Walking distance from food, tourist attractions and massage. Friendly staff and super nice hotel rooms too! it is worth it!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location of this hotel is amazing and the breakfast is lovely. What made this hotel exceptionally special for me was the amazing helpful staff. The communication with the hotel was flawless before I even arrived in Vietnam, with them reaching out to me about possible tours, helping with a SIM card and arranging a taxi for me from the airport. As I arrived, I started talking with Martin about my travel plans. Within no time Martin had whipped up a whole itinerary for me based on my interests, and I did not even have to ask him to do this. He advice felt honest and genuine, as opposed to some of the places I have stayed where they just tried to get me to book stuff with them. The kind of service you sometimes forget exists. I highly recommend staying here.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was in a great location close to restaurants and bars. Large well appointed rooms. Wonderfully helpful and friendly staff, they were able to make excellent recommendations. There was an excellent variety of food for breakfast.
I would definitely staff in this hotel again.

review.rating: Great stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is strategically located in the old quarters. We were so welcomed by the front desk, especially Martin with a big smile upon our arrival. He was very helpful from the beginning of my booking and he would replied all my enquiries via email. We felt the warmness of everyone at the hotel. The room is clean and the bed was good! Thanks to the hotel for upgrading us to a bigger room on our last night with them! I had such a big double bed of my own! The breakfast spread was amazing and the staff are friendly. I will surely come back to this hotel if I ever visit Hanoi again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Delightful spotless boutique hotel in the heart of the old quarter Extraordinary service and warmth Made ya feel totally at home.. Staffs are all nice friendly, receptionists, breakfast staff, bellman even housekeeping has good hospitality for guests.

review.rating: very nice affordable hotel in heart of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We liked everything about this hotel. It had a lovely feel to it mixing traditional Vietnamese styling with more contemporary ideas. Its location is perfect for walking around the Old Quarter of Hanoi, being close to Catherad and Hoan Kiem lake. To go further afield choose cyclotrot transport which are readily available or use the Hop on hop off Tour buses which are located nearby. Our welcome was most friendly with the receptionists offering to help with arrangements. ALL staff were charming, helpful and attentive, including the Manager who took time to acknowledge our visit. We strongly recommend this hotel to anyone wishing to stay in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a relatively new hotel right in the old quarter of Hanoi. Everything is modern, clean, and nice. Complimentary breakfast comes with free omelets and espresso drinks. Great location not far away from beer street and banh mi places. The staff, including Jame and Sabi, were extremely friendly and recognized and remembered us whenever we walked through the lobby. Overall this is a great value with exemplary customer service above all.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is the best hotel in the old quarter, all of the staff are very friendly and helpful. Shout out to staff at reception, They make us a wonderful day and tell us a lot of things and information. We definitely will come back soon

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond which was a lovely room. Great hospitality and good location. Excellent value for money’s down all the staff were very helpful. Would recommend to anyone coming to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
It was the best choice for us the book Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. The location is so central we could reach all the major tourist attractions easily. The breakfast on all days was excellent. A good choice for veg and non veg.
A special shout out to Sabi who was very helpful with our early check in and very informative about local things.
Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was ideal for our stay in Hanoi. The hotel is within walking distance from the lake, Cathedral and many good eateries. The staff were very attentive, organizing airport transport for us. The room was spacious and clean. And everything you need for a comfortable stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Comfortable bed, friendly and welcoming staff. Great location. Buffet Breakfast is included and it was delicious. We would come here again.

review.rating: Where to stay in Hanoi? We’ve got a great value place for you!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Lheritage Diamond Hotel is very reasonably priced and is situated in a great location in the Old Quarter, which is very close to some very good restaurants and bars. We opted for a room with 2 beds as it was more spacious. The room was very clean and tidy and the breakfast was OK. The staff are first class and are very helpful. Very good value for money in a capital city.

review.rating: Excellent hotel in heart of Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hospitality was wonderful. Sabi looked after us from the moment we stepped into the hotel. We were offered a beautiful room decorated beautifully for our 40th wedding anniversary. We will come back to this hotel and recommend to all for the best stay. They have also been very helpful for organize tours, recommendations for trips and transfers. Lheritage has a group of hotels in different destinations so can organize your trip throughout Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff, location
review.comment_negative: NA

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location is great. I will use your service again. Thanks.
review.comment_negative: None

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We met Sabi during we check in at Hotel Lobby. She is so sweet and always have a smile on her face. Her name tag says Ms. Happy, she lives up to her name.We had such a wonderful experience and staff are all so very nice. Thanks so much for the warm welcome and friendly hospitality.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice location in Old Quarter . Hotel area is quiet. Rooms are clean and well maintained. The staff will give you a welcome  on arrival. They will talk to you and see about your plans while in Hanoi. If you plan on visiting Ha Long Bay, Sapa, or Ninh Binh they will try and sell you vacation packages. It's a soft sell not too much pressure. They will start with their highest prices packages and gradually worked their way down. I found the best deals could be had directly travel agents located all over the old quarter. Staff does work hard. They offered to upgrade my room free of charge for my 2nd night even though I declined to use their offers. It's a nice touch.

review.rating: Had a great experience in this hotel, the best hotel we stayed in in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very conveniently located in the old quarter with plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby, and just a couple blocks away from Lake and Cathedral and weekend night market.They have a cute introduction card with a map that contains best eats in Hanoi and I would really recommend checking those spots out. They also have a travel agent to help you book day tours to Ha Long Bay and Ninh Binh and such, however we noted the prices at travel agencies down the street were about 20% cheaper. Staff were very friendly and really went above and beyond to ensure you have a pleasant stay. Highly recommend this place!

review.rating: Great value, awesome stay and lovely staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great place to stay in Hanoi, in the heart of the old town. The staff was great. Helped us with booking trips and accomodated our every needs. Convenient position in walking distance of the lake and of many shops and night market. Would recommend it!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff at this hotel are beyond expectations. Jame at reception was probably the best you could imagine. So helpful. He would book trips and organize anything you need. The breakfast is fit for any King. So much choice, you won't need to eat until the evening.

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were very happy with our stay here. We booked our first night at here and 2 nights later. Before we arrived in Hanoi, Martin and his staff we're so helpful in organizing the rest of our two week holiday. They booked us accommodation, transport, tours and even dropped us off personally at the train station with a picnic in hand, they also picked us up at 5.30am and had a room ready for no extra charge. It is also very clean and in a great location. We would definitely stay here again and recommend to our friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My husband and I had the pleasure of staying at the Hotel Lheritage Diamond during our visit to Hanoi, and I must say, it was a delightful experience. The historic ambiance blended perfectly with modern amenities, setting the stage for an unforgettable experience.The rooms are spacious, meticulously maintained, and the thoughtful attention to detail, such as the quality toiletries and ample storage space, added to the overall convenience. The hotel's location is simply unbeatable. Situated in the heart of the Old Quarter, we were within walking distance of many popular attractions and vibrant neighborhoods. This prime location made it incredibly convenient to explore the city's historical landmarks, trendy boutiques, and delightful restaurants. We definitely recommend staying here to anyone traveling to Hanoi.

review.rating: A Perfect Hotel for a Perfect Trip to Ha Noi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cosy hotel, in a very good location with very kind staff. The bedroom was clean and cosy and the bed very comfortable. The atmosphere is calm and welcoming. If you are looking for a quiet and beautiful place, lt’s the perfect one! Thank you!

review.rating: Impressive hotel in central of Old town - hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It is in the middle of Old Quarter. Plenty of restaurants and shops all around you. Old Quarter is a big tourist area so it if very safe to walk around. You have a few historical places with in walking distance . If you don’t feel like walking that far plenty of taxis and bikes willing to give you a lift.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Located in the heart of the Old Quarter this is a most impressive hotel. The room was spacious and clean and the staff were attentive and diligent at all times. The buffet breakfast choice was extensive and of high quality. If you want to stay in a busy area of Hanoi near most of the tourist spots then this is a good choice.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely staff and had a great experience overall, would highly suggest staying here! Beds were extremely comfortable, classy bathroom and beautiful views from the restaurant at the top level!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Excellent emplacement.
Belle chambre spacieuse avec fenêtre et vue.
Nous avons reçu un panier repas pour compenser notre départ matinal qui nous a empêché de prendre le petit-déjeuner.
review.comment_negative:
Quelques difficultés à obtenir des informations sur le bus pour Sapa. Bon, nous avons fait sans eux.
Climatisation un peu bruyante. Après avoir découvert le mode sleep c'était mieux.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: close to old quarters streets
review.comment_negative: you should check the fridge first, we had to pay 50k vnd for 2 bottles of water that we didn't use. but after a while we got the refund.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every time i came here i always feel peaceful and warm-hearted + friendly staffs  food in here was incredible, suitable for both solo, couples or group dates the surroundings make guests feel comfortable and close to the nature due to the aged-old and luxurious hotels around the Old Quarter

review.rating: Newly renovated hotel with Amazing service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great and helpful staff. Great location. Walkable distance to everywhere. Lam, Martin,were very helpful. Martin even have breakfast to go early when I was leaving to Sa Pa, Thank you!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything about Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is wonderful. They were able to provide a midnight airport transfer for only 22 USD, which was very appreciated as many taxi drivers from the airport will try to scam you. We arrived to a beautiful, spacious room with fresh robes and slippers and an extraordinarily comfortable bed . All of the staff are so friendly and helpful, able to provide recommendations for affordable local gyms and best places to withdraw cash for the lowest fees. My favorite part was definitely the buffet breakfast,there are so many different foods to try (eggs, bacon, salad, cakes, banana bread, cereal/muesli, croissants, banana bread, mini sushi & sandwiches and much more. We love this hotel so much we decided to extend our stay by four more days. Cannot recommend this place enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located on a quiet street, away from the hustle and bustle , and accessible to restaurants and shopping on the main street with a short walk. The rooms were clean. My friends and I were most impressed with the friendly and very helpful staff, in particular Phuong from front desk. We enjoyed our 4 nights stay at the hotel ... and the pillows were the best for some of us!

review.rating: Fabulous hotel in a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is perfectly placed for exploring the old quarter. Although the rooms are compact, they are clean and comfortable and have everything you need. They provide free water and snacks each day and the hotel staff were all fantastic - they were really helpful and recommended good tours of the city.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our stay was thoroughly enjoyable, surpassing our expectations with its quality service and well-equipped facilities. The breakfast variety was a highlight. Definitely worth a top rating.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Best hotel I have stayed for the price that I paid. Location wise cannot be any better. Food and shops all around. The best Pho, Bun cha, Banh mi, desserts and even burgers are just a few steps away. Hotel staff were excellent and friendly. Rooms are relatively small but comfortable. All basic amenities available. Wifi fast. Hot water was good. Rooms was excellent. We will definitely come back again and recommend to my friends.

review.rating: Exceptional service and peaceful oasis in Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is beautiful, clean and located in a significantly quiet street yet just steps away from the Lake and Cathedral. The manager and the team is so helpful. The breakfast is delicious. The beds super comfortable and the rooms were clean. The air conditioners were perfect. The hotel is in the heart of Hanoi. Come and enjoy. We enjoyed very much..

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La situació i el personal, molt atent en tot moment.
review.comment_negative: Que s’hagués de pagar per avançat.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_negative: 惡意欺詐且不誠實的商家，避雷一下吧！我們早在兩個月前就從booking訂了行政套房，當天入住，飯店在完全‘’沒有告知‘’的情況下，將我們的房型換成一個小非常多的客房，還收取一樣的價格，待我們自行發現去理論，他們才承認把我們原本訂的房型給先來的客人，那我是訂心酸的嗎？後來想給我們便宜一點的的價格想要了事！但房型本來就比較小，便宜不是正常的嗎？另外，入住後還發現不明毛髮一大團，總之，一個很不愉快的經驗。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It’s a really good hotel that has nice facilities, service, reception and people. All the people here can speak English. If anyone comes to Hanoi for trip, this will be the first hotel I recommend people staying.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 직원이 친절했음
review.comment_negative: 주차시설

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for 8 nights & were delighted. The rooms are quiet as set back off street, breakfast very good with choice of Vietnamese & western, staff so welcoming & helpful, good value for money, ideal location in Old Quarter - 2 minute walk from Hoan Kiem Lake - would love to return here!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The room very gorgeous and clean
review.comment_negative: All is perfect

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfect Hotel and perfect breakfast .Location is near to everything. Charming and friendly Hotel with very friendly staff. First time in Vietnam, first night in Hanoi. Now off to Sapa for 3 days. 100% will be back Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We used Hanoi as a base for part of our trip to Vietnam, coming and going over the course of a few weeks. Every time we stayed in Hanoi, we stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond, and I'm so glad we did. The hotel is clean and very nice, the beds are soft, the complimentary breakfast is delicious, and most importantly, the staff are friendly and helpful. It's also in a great location in the Old Quarter. I would highly recommend to anyone staying in Hanoi.

review.rating: Best hotel for the price point
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: So cozy and nice place to stay. The staff help us on every minor queries prompt and nicely their service is best than ever. Room is great and clean, location is also perfect with plenty of food and street stalls around. Highly recommended

review.rating: A quieter place to stay in a bustling city
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a very nice hotel.  The rooms are clean.  The staff is friendly and professional.  This hotel is in a good location-a quieter part of old quarter but still close to everything.  The shower was hot and the bed was comfortable.
review.comment_negative: The elevator could be slow

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
朝ごはんは良かったです。
旧市内の場所で、ブラブラするのが良い。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Central location friendly and helpful staff. Walking distance to lake and other large establishments. Hotel also offer transport if required. Lots to see and do in old quarter Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk service are excellent, friendly and give you suggestions where to go in Hanoi. More importantly they advice you how to be safe when you walk around Hanoi. The location of the hotel is walking distance to few famous drink/food shop.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff at the light hotel were absolutely outstanding. The staff helped us arrange car transport, laundry, SIM cards and everything we needed to begin our trip. Great place to explore Ha Noi and surrounding area.

review.rating: Best location, near the Lake and Cathedral !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well located next to walking street. Breakfast was good with lot of options. I especially liked that they served us chicken Pho in breakfast. Will definitely recommend.

review.rating: Quality rooms and dining, friendly staff, central location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. The location was very good. Right in the centre of the Old Quarter, and yet it was on a quiet street. Staff are very helpful and kind. Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Giường ngủ cũng được, phòng cách âm tạm. Nhìn chung là ở mức chấp nhận được, khá tốt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff is very attentive and friendly, rooms are clean and nicely appointed, the location cannot be beat and the food in the restaurant is the best selection and quality in the Old Quarter. the breakfast which is a nice variety of fruits, salads, breads, etc. to start your day in Hanoi. We love seeing our welcoming friends at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel and look forward to our next stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at this hotel and it was very comfortable. The staff were terrific and could not do enough for us. The balcony was great because we could watch the world below us. Even though we were on a busy street you could not hear any noise inside the room. I would recommend this hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing experience, from pickup at the airport to us leaving for a trip to Halong Bay nothing was too much trouble. Excellent facilities.  Wonderful breakfast with a range of food, all 5* quality. Huge bathroom in our room and a great location. Close to St Josephs Cathedral and Hoankiem Lake . Wow! Want to stay there again.

review.rating: Très bien placé pour découvrir la ville
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel très bien situé à 2 pas de la cathédrale et à 5mn du lac, pas de bruit et chambre fonctionnelle avec un lit confortable
review.comment_negative: Malgré son nom il n'y a pas de spa, mais sinon rien d'autre

review.rating: Exceptional service in the heart of old Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel just back from the Lake. The staff were exceptional, led by James. We were particularly grateful for the room upgrade we received. Breakfast was of a high standard. Highly recommended
review.comment_negative: All good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great Location and close to everything. The staff were brilliant and offered some great suggestions for places to eat and things to see .The rooms were lovely, clean and quiet. Beds were comfy and the TV was good for watching whilst in bed .Special thank you to Mr Martin Hotel Manager for your help during our stay.

review.rating: Enjoyed staying at this hotel, very comfortable,very reasonably priced, fantastic staff and location
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The property was in a fantastic location.  Close to the Hoàn Kiếm Lake and around the corner was the terrific Lotus Water Puppet show.  The staff were always very helpful when required and were very happy to provide tour assistance, if required.  They also gave warm, genuine smiles to welcome you to the property.
review.comment_negative: The carpet on the  stairs from level 8 to get to the breakfast room on level 9 (the views are great from the breakfast room) is in need of updating.  It would be great if the carpet could be updated in the corridor on level 8 too.  Maybe a blind on the window behind the vanity basin would be a good addition to the bathroom in the Executive suite.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, very easy-walking to the lake and the main streets. From the hotel we can walk to the Hoan Kiem lake about 1 minute and very center to visit museum and supermarket. Very friendly staff and had very good service from hotel providers.Nice room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a great place in the old quarter to stay. Really easy to get to all the sights. Room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was good too.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Located in central area close to many shops and restaurants. Staff was friendly.
review.comment_negative: The room was uncomfortable due to humidity and muckiness - it never went away and everything always felt wet. Room size was in booking details but it was seriously small.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. The staff speaks good English and the hotel is strategically located. I would certainly recommend this hotel to everyone.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel was fantastic. Great position and beautifully clean. But the staff were outstanding. Always helpful and greeted you us with a smile while being interested in how our day had gone. Would stay here again.

review.rating: Perfect stay in an excellent hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff are wonderful the room comfortable and beautiful pillows. The buffet breakfast is excellent. Overall a great place to stay in Hanoi. Close to everything. Mr Martin was always obliging and most helpful very friendly staff

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice experience, the staff has been extremely attentive and caring to our needs. The hotel's location is within walking distance from the night market and all the touristic attractions in the old quarter of Hanoi. Even when we faced a health issue, the people of the hotel provided customized care and treatment.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was really comfortable! We stayed here for 3 nights total. The breakfast was delicious on top floor was a really nice place to view the city . It's location was also wonderful, being right in centre of the Old Quarter, The staff were also incredibly friendly and helpful when exchanging money and arranging cabs for us to take to the airport. I definitely recommend that you stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  hotel when you visit Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great place to stay at Hanoi, this place is in the heart of the City center at the old quarter. Martin is a great host. We got a chance to stay in multiple room categories and we had a great time. The hotel also has a lift to take you to different floors. This place is a 4* hotel. Breakfast options even available for vegans. You can get very good deals for this hotel at Booking.com. Definitely recommended for family or solo travelers.

review.rating: Best location in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed here for 3 nights during our visit to Vietnam and the stay was super comfortable. The rooms and bathrooms are fairly large and clean . The staff are very polite ,friendly and helpful. The breakfast is tasty & everyday there are new items to the menu . Had a great and comfortable stay here . Thank you

review.rating: A Memorable Stay at Lhritage Diamond Hotel Hanoi - Unforgettable Luxury and Outstanding Service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very welcoming and helpful staff, excellent communication. Clean, big room, walkable distance to everything in Hanoi Old Quarter. Would definitely return.

review.rating: As close to perfection as it can get
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was extremely thoughtful friendly, took so much time to make sure we knew how to make it around Hanoi. Knowing it was a special trip they even prepared lots of surprises for us. The room was really clean, and was just if not better than expected. It really make our trip feel very warm.

review.rating: In totality our stay was good 😊
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Property is very small & as well as room.
review.comment_negative: Very Small room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Amabilité gentillesse et disponibilité du personnel pour satisfaire toutes nos demandes
Emplacement exceptionnel quartier très animé
Confort et petit déjeuner très satisfaisant

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: the hotel room, lobby and restaurant its all so nice. I had the balcony room and it was great. staying in the hotel is very different experience as the staff is so good. you are linked with one executive for all your needs. Overall all the staff was very friendly.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: localização e atendimento dos funcionários
review.comment_negative: nada

review.rating: perfect score for Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was simply superb! Within walking distance to all the sights of the old quarters. The staff there were all really friendly and helpful too! Special shout out to Sabi for her hospitality and her food recommendations! Will definitely stay here again when I am back

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Vị trí trung tâm, có thể đi bộ đến nhà thờ, hồ Hoàn Kiếm, service tốt, nhân viên vui vẻ
review.comment_negative: Phòng hơi nhỏ, ở đúng ngày có sửa đường, tỉa cây giữa đêm và sáng sớm nên ồn.

review.rating: Great location but nothing more rather than that. Will not return.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Two greatest advantages of staying at L’Heritage Diamond Hotel is location and size and cleanliness of the room. Location is awesome - literally two steps from St. Joseph Cathedral and couple minutes of walking to lake and old quarter. I stayed in Deluxe room, which is bigger than standard and it was comfy and clean. Liked the size of the bed.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was pretty basic with limited choice for western taste. There is no bar in the hotel, so no drink or snack options as such but it shouldn’t be a huge issue.
Safe in the room was not fixed to the wall or anything, so literally everyone could take the safe with all valuables with him/her 😃
Very “creative” approach from reception manager, who ask me to pay for the stay immediately as I stepped in into the lobby even before he explained me the hotel’s facilities etc. After payment he insisted me to cancel my booking in Booking.com as he explain he must to pay the commission fee to Booking.com and “it is not good for his business”. 
All in all rather OKish stay but will not book it again if I should return to Hanoi.

review.rating: Great business hotel in the heart of old Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was nice and the staff is lovely , really nice . We had a very good time and we will recommend it . The room was clean and very spacious in floor 7. The restaurant is also very good. They helped us with the transfer they book a tour guide and we had a very good time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Its a relatively new hotel. Very helpful staff. Booked a Halong bay cruise tour through them. Strategic location and value for money. Even provide airport pick up and drop off.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Customer service is excellent. The staff go above and beyond to help with anything.

review.rating: Great staff, clean and good place
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I booked the Lheritage Diamond in Hanoi based on the reviews and it EXCEEDED expectations. The warm hospitality, CENTRAL location, and well-appointed rooms created a comfortable retreat. Jenny at the front desk is the loveliest and most efficient concierge I have ever come across. The free breakfasts are brilliant, a balance of western and Vietnamese options. The hotel is GOOD VALUE. A highly recommended choice for exploring the vibrant city of Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel's location is excellent, easily accessible from the airport, within the Old District but not too close to all the noise. Walking distance from every good places to visit. Lots of good shops and restaurants around. It is surprisingly affordable with good amenities and the staff are extra helpful and courteous. Rooms are clean. The breakfast is superb. It is on the penthouse level, good view of the city from above. Highly recommended. It will be my hotel of choice when I come back to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was excellent just right next to the Hoan Kiem Lake and during weekends the road in front of the hotel is closed to cars allowing locals and tourist to enjoy various activities around the lake. The room size was good and the bed was vert comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with decent buffet selection . Finally special thanks to all the staffs who made our stay memorable .. Will definitely stay here again if we visit Hanoi again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Central Location with balcony, very clean and staff was help full with everything we needed during our stay. If you want to stay in the old quarter no need to look further.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: old city quarter
review.comment_negative: at the check out they demanded %3 transaction cost if I pay with credit card.I refused to pay this, explaning that booking.com price is net at this hotel.Then they say ok.Please be careful.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
Khen
100 điểm sẽ quay lại k chê gì

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was located a few steps away from the church and from the bustling activities.  Very convenient to move around.
The hotel staff like James and Jenny were fantastic and attentive and helpful in answering to our queries.

review.rating: Great hotel location in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is nice and clean, the staff Vivian welcomed us with big smile and kindly guided us, which was a really great first impression to this hotel. The location was good and rooftop has a good view.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well positioned between the Old Quarter and the French Quarter making most tourist destinations walk-able, once you learn how to cross the street in Hanoi!The breakfast is very good. Would recommend this hotel in view of the good service. Excellent value of money.

review.rating: We will definitely be back to Lheritage Diamond !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed for one night during our honeymoon but wish we could have stayed longer. The staffs in front desk were amazing and could not have been more attentive and genuine.The hotel was very nicely decorated and central. If we come back to Hanoi we would return to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel without question and have already recommended it to friends.

review.rating: Wonderful respite in craziness of Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed in the hotel 3 nights in family. The hotel staff is extremely nice and helpfu! The hotel is in the center of the old town in a quiet street. The breakfast is good with Asian and western food.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Convenient location in the Old Quarter with a nice spa!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement près du vieux centre et de la cathédrale.
review.comment_negative: La propreté reste à désirer. Assez bruyant et les photos ne correspondaient pas à la chambre demandée. je ne pense pas avoir été dans une chambre Deluxe, comme cela aurait dû être lors de ma réservation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room was well equipped with all essentials plus little gimmicks like ear plugs, petals of flower and a comprehensive directory on highly recommended eateries... Staff were their biggest assets - well trained , polite / helpful/cheerful ! Location is par excellence ! Sound insulation can be improved .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk staff was extremely friendly and the staff was very helpful and accommodating. Always smiling and very engaging to help whenever you want. The staff can speaks and understand English very well that made the guest feel comfortable in this hotel. Special thanks to Mr. Martin Hotel Manager, He helped me and my friends to contact with the grab driver through Vietnamese since I’m mistakenly put the wrong location for the driver to pick up. He was very friendly and pleasant. Thanks and appreciated for all of your service during our stays here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location is great if you are a tourist. A lot of food & spa options available in the locality nearby. Recommend!
review.comment_negative: Breakfast & spa are not functional as of July 2022.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Hanoi Central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had two nights at this hotel, split with a 3 day trip to Sapa, the staff at the hotel were wonderful, storing our luggage for 3 days, and on our return it was already in our room, excellent and friendly service.

review.rating: Amazing hotel in centre of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We made the right decision to stay at Lheritage Diamond Hotel in the Old Quarter in Hanoi. Hotel location is very convenient, close to good food and the unique sights of Hanoi. Special mention goes to Martin and Phuong for their outstanding and gracious service.

review.rating: Absolutely LOVE this hotel! Highly recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel was much beyond expectations . outstanding staff , clean and well furnished rooms , Location wise we found it to be very convenient without being in too busy of an area, close to everything. We hope to be back soon!

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: 新しいホテルでとても綺麗でした
review.comment_negative: 特になし

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a splendid time at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. The staff was welcoming . The hotel was clean and beautiful! The breakfast was amazing. There were many foods to choose from. I enjoyed my stay. I would highly recommend this hotel to my friends in the future!

review.rating: One of the best in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great hotel, the staff are really friendly and helpful. The location is great and the hotel is nice too, big spacious rooms, clean and have complimentary welcome drink on arrival. I would recommend this hotel, we stayed in 2 different hotels when in Hanoi and this one was much nicer.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best hotel. Located in Old quarter so easily to walk around, staff are super friendly and nice, always a smile! very helpful with what to do, where to go. they even helped with taxi booking from/to airport and they let us kept our luggage after the check out, while we were wondering in Hanoi before our late flight!  I would highly recommend this clean and comfortable hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I spent one night at LHertiage Diamond hotel. Everything was perfect ,better than expected. Great location, super central, nice restaurants near by. Very nice room comfy, light and clean . Bathroom is very clean. Super nice team very helpful and great breakfast.

review.rating: Great stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had a wonderful stay at the Hanoi Lheritage diamond  hotel from check in to check out. We were greeted at the front desk with a welcome drink and very kind staff. The hotel was exceptionally clean and in a great location to see all the sights in old quarter Hanoi. We would recommend this hotel to everyone!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had nice experience during the day... staff were too professional. Special thanks to Mr Martin for making our stay memorable. Breakfast was good enough compare to other. Location of Hotel perfect, everything will be in walking distance

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed in this hotel twice throughout our week and a bit exploring North Vietnam and the team were so helpful and friendly to us. They went above and beyond to help us, letting us check in early, storing our luggage during our Halong Bay cruise and providing a laundry service. The hotel itself is lovely and perfectly located in the Old Quarter. It has a relaxing atmosphere that is perfect returning to after a day exploring the chaos of Hanoi! But really it is the fantastic team that make this hotel such a wonderful stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Right in the middle of the Old Quarter and the best location. We walked most places very safe if you learn to dodge the scooters !! The Manager Mr Dich and staff couldn't do enough for us. Walked us to the currency exchange around the corner booked a fantastic Cruise for us at the last minute. Can t speak highly enough of the Service. Thanh you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La ubicación es excelente! El desayuno está muy bien y sobre todo el personal, que hace todo fácil!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Staffs were very friendly and the facility was clean. The location was perfect
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: situated in the centre of the city
review.comment_negative: no possibility to have breakfast in the hotel and also the spa was closed. the rooms are a little bit different from the pictures on the website (not in a good way)…

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location! 5 minutes walking distance to Hoan Kiem lake and next to St. Joseph Cathedral. The area is surrounded by nice restaurants and cafes, as well as shops of all kinds, including street local food. Staff is really nice and helped me a lot organising the trip.
review.comment_negative: There's no eating facility on site

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good location, near in tourist spot and restaurant, comfortable and affordable room, very good in services, thanks for staff very nice people, food is very good, we will recommend this in our friends, we will come back next time, thanks

review.rating: Perfect hotel to stay at in the Old Quarter of Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our stay was excellent - our room was very well appointed and super clean ! the breakfast is excellent and has a variety of choices from savory to sweet. The location at the heart of the historic quarter is perfect if you want to explore all Hanoi has to offer.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room was so comfortable, quiet and clean with loads of free extras. Me and my boyfriend had a really special holiday in here. We also took a lot of beautiful photos thanks to the great decorations of this hotel. Especially, the receptionist was Phuong. She's very kind and lovely

review.rating: Lovely hotel with very friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Service exceeded expectations  from the moment we arrived Martin looked after us with great energy and kindness determined to make sure we made the most of our stay . Excellent spa and , comfortable room . He was brilliant ! Even helped me out translating for me in the chemist next door.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent concierge services including getting a driver who picked us up at the airport at a reasonable rate. The hotels manager was always there to answer questions and spoke English flawlessly. Rooms were good. Good choice if you are new to traveling in Vietnam.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: חזרתי פעם שניה,השירות פשוט מצויין,ומיקום נהדר

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Can't say enough about this lovely hotel. Comfortable, excellent buffet breakfast, and wonderful staff! Don't miss it!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Worth for what we have paid. Fantastic service. We booked the Superior room, It’s clean and the room decoration was unexpected.. we’re happy and satisfied with their services. The receptionist is very informative, polite and helpful. Hotel is at strategic location. walking distance to Hoan kiam lake, Thang Long puppet show, St Joseph Cathedral, Train Street. Overall, Excellent service given by Hotel.

review.rating: Excellent hotel for location, foods and outstanding services
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Arriving at this hotel was such a great experience. Staff knew our names and could not do enough for us . Very attentive and friendly. Helpfulness from all staff was great. Rooms very well equipped and with excellent comfortable beds. Great Aircon too. View and location is perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We loved Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Staff were wonderfully friendly and attentive, and a great location on the lake , Cathedral. We opted to upgrade to a nice room and this was beautifully done and had everything we required. The buffet breakfast on top floor so delicious. We would highly recommend this place to stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên và cơ sở vật chất tuyệt vời
review.comment_negative: Một số điểm chưa hợp lý: chưa có khăn lau chân trước cửa phòng tắm, ô kính mờ ở cửa phòng tắm chưa kín đáo, người ngoài có thể thấy được, cần có thêm ổ điện ở bồn rửa mặt để thuận tiện hơn trong sấy tóc.

review.rating: Easy central location in Old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very hospitable and the pick up option from the airport was nice. I find booking taxis through the hotels to be better in Vietnam. That way you don't get scammed. Very responsive through WhatsApp. They let me hang out in the lobby and store my bags even though I checked out the day before while waiting for a bus. Thanks for the hospitality!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
Gute Lage in der Altstadt von Hanoi. 
Das Zimmer war relativ groß und sauber.
review.comment_negative: Als wir vor Ort ankamen und die Übernachtung bezahlen wollten, so wie auf booking.com auch gebucht, was bereits Steuern und Servicegebühren beinhaltete, wollte man uns nochmals zusätzliche Gebühren auf den Booking.com Preis drauf schlagen. Das fanden wir nicht in Ordnung. Was wir auch mitgeteilt haben, nach kurzer Diskussion und unserem festen Standpunkt, dass wir nur den gebuchten Preis bezahlen werden, wurde diese zusätzlich aufgetauchte Gebühr wieder gestrichen, kein angenehmes ankommen.

review.rating: pour une nuit ça va pas plus
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: le petit-déjeuner
review.comment_negative: les chambres mal isolées à l’intérieur comme a l’extérieur et elles sont très petites

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location in the centre of Hanoi Old Quarter. Restaurants, cafes and shops nearby. Great restaurant and  Nice buffet breakfast. Staff helpful and friendly and good wifi. Rooms are very nice with a safe and fridge

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Where to begin with reviewing this Hotel! From the moment we arrived until the moment we checked out, we felt very well looked after. The staff are very friendly and are able to assist with any queries- whether it be arranging tours, exchanging money, recommending places of interest. The breakfast each morning consists of a wide range of options including both Vietnamese and other dishes. The facilities are clean and very new. The Hotel is located off the center and we heard minimal noise from street traffic at night. A short walk to attractions, this hotel made our stay in Hanoi a memorable one. Thank you Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.rating: Overall is fine, we had a great stay in the hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location is excellent. Breakfast is good except that staff forgotten  to serve upon taken order of the egg.
review.comment_negative: The lobby passenger way is rather small.

review.rating: Bon séjour mais confort literie à améliorer
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Emplacement idéal 
Personnel très accueillant et disponible 
Petit déjeuner varié
review.comment_negative:
Literie peu confortable 
Chambre sans luminosité av c une fenêtre donnant directement sur l’immeuble d’à côté : il doit y avoir un mètre entre les deux 
Avoir choisi une chambre supérieure ne suffit pas pour avoir une vue dégagée

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Overall i had a fantastic experience staying in the family suite at the Ha noi lotus boutique Hotel. The room was spacious, clean and had a great location in the city. The receptionists at the front desk were extremely friendly and enthusiastic about answering any queries. An added bonus was that the hotel had a free continental breakfast every morning. However, i do recommend hotel guests to explore out of their comfort zone and try the Vietnamese street food in the morning.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wonderful find for us..this hotel combined a high standard of quality, comfort and value with authentic Vietnamese hospitality and service. Breakfast buffet is really excellent with fresh fruit, juices and yogurt. Hot food offerings brought to your table. If you fancy something not on the menu, chef will do their best to prepare it for you. I took advantage of the spa in the hotel and enjoyed a massage.

review.rating: A nice hotel in the heart of Hanoi Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff are wonderful especially James and Scott. James was friendly, helpful and thoughtful. The best! The location is fantastic. It’s near almost everything. I also want to give my appreciation to the other staff: Anne, Jenny, Marcus, Martin and Ms. Sabi. The most wonderful thing about this hotel is the staff and location. Will stay there again.
review.comment_negative: I felt cheated because the hotel was described as “wheelchair accessible” when I made the booking. However, there were two high steps at the entrance before I can get into the lobby where the elevator is. Not accessible so please make that correction. I was carried in my power chair into and out of the hotel the whole time I was there. I suggested to James they put a portable ramp at the entrance. He said he’ll tell it to his boss. I hope a ramp will be there next time I come.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel, hotel quiet although on the main street and many cafes. Clean room and friendly staff. Excellent value of money. That will greatly improve the comfortable stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very clean rooms and bathrooms. Great location in old town. Staff are very attentive and helpful. Rooms are charming and comfortable. Breakfast is really good! The hotel has a great boutique atmosphere. Has a French inspired decor and really looks nice.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The team at L'Heritage Diamond and spa were friendly and helpful, they helped organised water puppet tickets for us with great seats, and gave us some helpful tips on where to go sightseeing. Breakfast was sensational with good mixture of different cuisine. Location was great. We would stay here again. Thanks Martin and team for making it an awesome stay for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff were extremely thorough and helped us out with everything from booking taxis to restaurant reservations. The rooms were also extremely clean and well maintained with modern furnishings

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vị trí cũng bình thường, không quá tiện cho gia đình có con nhỏ. Phòng ốc ở mức cơ bản.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an unique, beautiful hotel at busy old quarter. Love the warm welcome with  freshly prepared drinks. Staffs are friendly and enthusiastic, shared useful tour and dining informations. Room is nice and comfortable. Breakfast on 10th floor is fantastic, sumptuous food in glamorous setting. Love our stay here!

review.rating: Very good location & hotel very clean
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location is good within walking distance to the lake. Room is clean. Staff service is good. The bed and linens were also fantastic and I had my best sleep in Vietnam to date. Not to mention all of this for an incredible value. Can't wait to come back and have a longer stay at this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My girlfriend and I went to Hanoi on vacation in Apr 2024 and decided to stay here based on the reviews and they were absolutely true and correct. The location of the hotel is perfect! The breakfast is great! Amenities are cool,The hotel is very centrally located in the Old Quarter, a minute walk from Hoan Kiem lake.  I highly recommend this hotel for its excellent service and amenities.

review.rating: Great gem in the old quarter
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location in the old quarter within walking distance of the river and great sites. A nice boutique hotel with a great breakfast!
review.comment_negative: Beds were very hard but it wouldn’t stop me from returning here.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location, breakfast was fresh and tasty. Friendly staffs - Martin was so helpful and professional. We had a good experience in Vietnam. Highly recommend for any tourists if you want to travel in Vietnam

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We came here as we cancelled our second time stay with a previous and very disappointing hotel we stayed at (same stars, same rating, similar price), and we were very glad we did! Great location, quiet room, comfy and real 2 bedroom beds (not 2 singles pushed together), very clean, fantastic staff, good breakfast with a nice view over the city. We got a room upgrade, and that was welcomed! They instantly sorted us out with our onwards travel without being pushy. Highly recommend this hotel!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The staff is truly helpful and the accommodation was great. Localization is also very good!
 So near to Cong coffee, Hoan Kiem Lake , Cathedral...  of my favorite restaurants in Hanoi! Loved my staying

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is in strategy location. It is near to night market, Hoan kiem lake and places to find food.Would stay again!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at this very nice hotel for the first and last night. It's definitely worth it, it's in a great location, the rooms are spotless and there's a great roof terrace with a great view. The service is also gigantic especially from Hotel Manager,  He was very accommodating and incredibly nice as was actually all the staff. If we ever go to Hanoi again, we will definitely book this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hospitality at this hotel is wonderful. The staff were extremely helpful and kind. Although the rooms are small, they are comfortable and quiet, This is a good place to stay as the hotel is right in the heart of the old quarter. I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is the highlight of our Hanoi trip.We have stayed at a lot of hotels (Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan, Japan) and this is definitely the BEST hotel experience we’ve had.  From the doorman to the receptionists to the breakfast crew to the housekeeping staff —they are all warm, attentive, thoughtful, and courteous. Breakfast buffet is really good. They allowed us to check out late at 2pm for free. We left our luggage at the front desk.
