We went out for dinner and came back to get our luggage and they offered a complimentary private room so we can shower/freshen up before heading to the airport.  Definitely felt like leaving home and family. We will never forget this experience.

review.rating: The best location in Hanoi Old Quarter Central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Gorgeous hotel which is beautifully decorated, and lovely and helpful staff. Well located. Nice room with good amenities.  Good breakfast options with a lot of choices.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
This Hotel was exceptional. The staff were excellent and very friendly and the facility itself was beautiful and very clean and premium. The restaurant is very good with great views and the location is very central, very easy to get around using taxis.
I would definitely recommend.

review.rating: Spectacular stay Outstanding customer service and location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff here are special. So attentive and helpful. Nothing was too much trouble: from recommending local sites, booking tours, and even help getting to a local doctor and delivering supplies when we needed them. The breakfast is great and included in the price. I wish every hotel I stayed in gave service like this. I will definitely be back.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I love this hotel too much. The staff was very friendly, pro and they tried their best to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The room is very big even though it is located in Old Quarter- very near Hoan Kiem lake. The breakfast is very varied. You can eat a lot of tropical fruit .Especially, this hotel is very very clean. I saw the staff clean everything when they had free time.  I will stay this hotel when I come back Hanoi and definitely recommend for my friend.

review.rating: Great location , Clean hotel and friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is new. The facilities are very clean , and there is a beautiful and delicious restaurant on the 10 Floor. Also, the service and attitude of the hotel staff Phuong made us very happy. If I come to Hanoi again, I will come back to this hotel again.

review.rating: Perfect accommodation in the Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Hanoi Lheritage Diamond & Spa is a beautifully decorated boutique resort that gave us wonderful service and experience from the moment we arrived until leaving the resort. Spa is also a must visit place when you are staying here, Their breakfast was amazing, it’s tasty and made by fresh ingredients. Another thing that is not to be missed is their coffee, highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The greatest feature of this hotel is its hospitality. You will definitely want to visit again. Every staff member is friendly, responsible, and professional. Even when staying alone, they approach you casually, making it feel like you have friends nearby. The breakfast offers a wide variety and is fresh and delicious. The quality of service here is one of the best in my opinion. Thank you very much, Sabi, and all the people in the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive:
The beds are super comfy and the room is very complete. Mini bar, free coffee/tea, great shower.
Just a few blocks off the Hoan Kiem lake. Surrounded by nice coffee places and restaurants.
Great value for the price.
The staff speaks good English and are very kind and helpful

review.rating: The hotel is a little tired but it’s comfortable and the staff are very welcoming.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
We were only here for 24 hours but the staff were very helpful and directed me to the best place to get an egg coffee and it was amazing. 
Our room was very large and the bed very comfortable. The bathroom was very big and it even had a spa bath. We also had a very large balcony which was great to sit out in. The hotel is in the centre of the old town so a perfect location. 
Vickie and John
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately there is no bar or restaurant in the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Located in the heart of Hanoi Old Quarter,  outstanding service for a reasonable price. . Nice staff, clean, really comfortable bed, large room and my partner loved the bath tub.  Would recommend and as for the price it is very nice

review.rating: Great hotel in the old city!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything was really perfect in this hotel! Extremely helpful and kind stuff, nice breakfast, excellent location and finally we had every day a clean room. I really suggest you to choose this hotel!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Sehr gut gelegen in der Altstadt von Hanoi, Kathedrale und Hoan Kiem See fußläufig in wenigen Minuten zu erreichen.
Personal war unglaublich freundlich und hilfsbereit

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Best price for good facilities. New property and managed by an excellent team. The whole team came together to help us have a great time, be it the Halong Bay tours, Ninh Binh visit, shopping.....everything. Will come back again in next trip.

reviewer.name: Throb
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great time at this beautiful boutique hotel and spa, during my stay in Hanoi. The staff is so friendly and attentive, and can always help you with your requests and questions. Room is nice, and the restaurant is a experience in itself- must try! Thank you for a memorable stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked two rooms, both were clean, well maintained, we slept well. Breakfast was plentiful, we enjoyed eating on the balcony. All staff were welcoming, providing excellent care. Location is perfect, in the old quarter, walking distance to many wonderful attractions. Highly recommended this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
This is a lovely hotel superbly placed for city sightseeing. Very close to the Cathedral,Lake.... and centre of old town.
Comfortable rooms in the traditional size, baths, with shower. Excellent all-day dining and friendly staff. Recommended.

review.rating: Central, well appointed rooms and friendly service.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent service given by all staff at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. Rooms were lovely and clean. Breakfast choices lovely and all staff go above and beyond to make your stay as lovely as possible. Ms Sabi was amazing! Enjoyed my stay, it was made very special by everyone at the hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel to all my family and friends

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed here for a night but it was great! Customer service was fantastic. Phuong the receptionist was wonderful. They let us leave our bags even after we checked out. Booked a cheaper rate for taxi to airport. Provided water while waiting for our car. Thanks!

review.rating: Beautifully furnished hotel with fantastic staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Spacious and comfortable room, friendly and pro active staff, i highly recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  for a lovely stay in Hanoi ! The location is great. Thank you very much for your hospitality . Highly recommended

review.rating: Great place to stay in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sabi gave me a warm welcome and introduced the hotel facilities clearly .The hotel also gave me a list of restaurants that opened during Tet festival, which is lovely. Breakfast here was wonderful. worth to get up earlier for that. Or they can extend the breakfast time until 10:00 and that will be perfect.

review.rating: Overall the stay and staff was great, especially the price and location. Great food options steps away from the hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Located in a great part of the old quarter. Breakfast was great. Staff was very responsive and helpful when my daughter became ill and I couldn’t leave the room.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are small, the photos online were a bit deceiving.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: the staff was great, very helpful, the room was super clean and the location was great, right near the cathedral. breakfast was a standard, but very good.
review.comment_negative: everything was great!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay at Lheritage Diamond Hotel in Hanoi. The location was fantastic and in the thick of all the action yet when in the room it was silent and the bed was so comfortable. It’s also situated very close to the Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral so was an easy walk for our next commute with our lovely takeaway breakfast provided by the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: First vacation after the lock-down. I must say that this is one of the best hotels that I stayed since I started traveling. It is located near different shops. The best part however is the hotel personnel. They are the sweetest. Always smiling and ready to assist you. So if you are planning to go to Hanoi, this hotel is a must. You can also book your tours with them and they might also give you a freebie by upgrading your room.Thank you!

review.rating: Had a great time at Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Amazing attentive staff. Very clean. Breakfast was fantastic. Location was good as well, an oasis in the crazy Hanoi streets.
Easy to get to the Cathedral with plenty of cafes around the area. I will definitely stay in Lheritage Diamond Hotel again if I have the chance to visit Hanoi in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The most personalized hotel experience from the friendliest and most helpful staff! Luxurious accomodations, delicious cuisine, and fantastic spa treatments. Shopping, restaurants, historic sites and tons of fun are right outside the front door. I can't wait to return to the Lheritage Diamond Hotel !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It's a bright and clean hotel. Strong shower water not like others that dribble. Excellent service. Different menu on buffet breakfast everyday. Prime location for food and pubs. Walking distance in Old quarter. Near to most places of interests. Excellent!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Lokacija i ljubazno osoblje
review.comment_negative: Ventilacija u restoranu. Bilo je pretoplo i zagusljivo, a prozori zatvoreni

review.rating: Clean bed, clean towels, breakfast, GREAT location in the Old Quarter of Hanoi.  Yes, I would stay there again.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: It was an excellent location, breakfast was included in the price, staff were lovely.
review.comment_negative: Funny lift - seemed to take people on their pressing the button and you waited for your turn.  It worked out fine.

review.rating: Extremely good location, facilities and services
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is spacious and clean. I love the decoration and the layout of the very spacious room. The price is very reasonable. And the location is very central in old district. great buffet breakfast . The hotel is located in a nice quiet corner. Next time I will return to this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is in a great location, so near to everything you need in Old Town. I've also never experienced such excellent service. Martin and his staff were so friendly and helpful. They gave us a room upgrade and even helped us order dinner. I hope to be back soon!

review.rating: Stay was fine but not a place that I will come back for another stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kind and accomodating staff.
review.comment_negative: room is too cramped! Too many unecessary items and without a working desk. Its not good for people who are combining travel and work.

review.rating: Excellent Hotel in centre of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It's a relatively new hotel. In walking distance of all major sights in Hanoi, near the lake and church. Clean rooms, comfortable beds, very tasty breakfast. But what really sets this hotel apart is the amazing service. Everyone of the staff I have met was exceptionally and genuinely friendly. Special thanks to Ms Phuong at reception. She sent me on the right excursions, pointed me in the right direction to discover the city and made sure I reached the airport on time. Not a question was too much for her. 5 exceptional days among friends, Thank you!!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The rooms are amazingly clean, brand new hotel and staff, especially Mr Martin help in providing required info is very helpful in finalizing tour plans. I liked the overall experience. Very professional and yet pleasant. Ambiance and decor is amazing. Food delicious and good spread. Will come back.

review.rating: Simple the best choice for your stay in the old quarter of Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is a fantastic hotel! We really enjoyed the location, near to everything. The staff went above and beyond, helping us during our stay.The rooms are well appointed, comfortable and very clean.The hotel was accommodating to lock up our computers and luggage when we went on an overnight excursion. Overall, we loved our stay and the staff is wonderful!  We will stay again the next time we are in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff is very kind. They recommend for us many activity and sightseeing around. Location is perfect get everything easy, souvenir, food, night market, Hoan kiem lake, Long Bien bridge even Egg coffee...High recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a warm and friendly welcome in Hanoi. We enjoyed our stay very much - Phuong from the reception helped with all questions and orginized a yummy breakfast box for us as on our last day we were picked up at 6.30am. The rooms are fine and good Standard for this hotel category. The offer for breakfast is incredible and we haven‘t missed anything. We‘d happy to stay there the next time in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely, helpful and professional staff. Nothing was an issue and they arranged Halong Bay cruises, cars etc. The Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel is in a great location and rooms very spacious and comfortable. We wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Best hotel staff and Best location!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had passed by the hotel before and this time I had the opportunity to stay for a very short time. But the impression in my heart is the friendliness and very friendly staff, good accommodation and beautifully decorated interior. In the morning I had a coffee shop right near the hotel...Thank you... friendly and thoughtful management and staff...

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, away from most of the hustle and bustle, so quiet and comfortable. Staff were friendly, welcoming and always had a smile on their face. Rooms were very clean and had everything we needed. The laundry service was excellent too, our clothes were almost sparkling! Breakfast had a fantastic variety of local and western foods which made it easier than having to find somewhere for breakfast everyday.

review.rating: A true gem in the heart of Hanoi's old quarter, with very professional and friendly hotel staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was super quiet which was surprising given its location. Staff was superb, helpful and friendly. The welcome drink (juice) was a delicious. The hotel is located in the night market area which is super convenient and fun, but worth considering if you need dropped off or picked up at those times.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: no noise from the street
review.comment_negative: noisy within rooms.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel situated in old quarter & easy walking access to many places in Hanoi. Very friendly staff & nice breakfast. Rooms are ok size, comfortable beds & has everything needed.
review.comment_negative: We were family with 4 people & booked 2 superior rooms. Unfortunately they failed to provide rooms on the same floor.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Vị trí gần Bờ Hồ
review.comment_negative: Không bao gồm ăn sáng

review.rating: Lovely hotel with amazing view - sunset from our room was gorgeous!
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel with amazing view - sunset from our room was gorgeous!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
I wish to express my thanks to Mr.James and Ms Sabi for their help during our stay.
There professionalism and kindness have been precious and mostly appreciated. 
Please relay to them our thanks !!!

review.rating: Perfect location, lovely quiet hotel, excellent staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was amazing. They went above and beyond. Great 10th floor breakfast overlooking the city . Perfect location in the old quarter and near the lake.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Thanks to Mr. Cuong has been very helpful though out our stay here in Hanoi. He even help us arrange the Halong bay trip which is similar to the price on line. I must say I am actually , very touch by the hand written card by their manager. Felt instantly welcome and touched. The experience was extraordinary for a boutique hotel. I will be back. Thanks all for making our Hanoi trip so happy.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent location right at the centre of everything, Good value for money, great staff .

review.rating: Wonderful stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service was good. It was good value for money. Every small problem that I raised was attended to immediately. For example, I wasn’t sure how to use the safe. The receptionist came to my room to show me how to use. Sabi and Jame were very helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A cozy hotel, all are very nice. We has a family side by side family room, Around 45 sqmt, it was plenty big, it was clean, had great shower, good comfortable bed. The staff from front desk to kitchen and doorman are all outstanding & friendly. Free breakfast was very good. Most say the location is excellent, so close to everything! No need for taxi for normal running around things like street shopping and eating. so many good Vietnamise restaurants nearby also. Had a great time at this place!

review.rating: Best affordable price in Old Quarter area
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: New property and managed by an excellent team. The whole team came together to help us have a great time, be it the Halong Bay tours, Nin Binh visit, shopping.....everything.

review.rating: A Fabulous Hotel with Exceptional Service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff were so friendly and could not do enough to make our stay in Hanoi fabulous. We were able to check in early as our room was ready early which was amazing after a long day of travelling. Location is fantastic, short walk to the lake in old town, also night market is less than ten minutes walk.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel. The staff is really kind and attentive, the location in the old quarter is perfect, rooms are beautiful and they serve a delicious breakfast. You can order from a nice selection of breakfast options on top of the regular buffet and you can get water all day complimentary. There is nothing we didn’t like about our stay and we can definitely recommend this hotel to everyone coming to Hanoi.

review.rating: Perfect Hotel for a Stay in Hanoi !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with impeccable service. Hotel location was great - right in the middle of Old Quarter. We were attended to by Ms Sabi who was really attentive to our every need. Hotel also helped coordinate our day tours and airport transfers making all the bookings a breeze!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: One of the best hotel i have been stay , great and helpful staff molly and Andrew was helping us alot for any questions that we wonder. We were enjoyable and will come here again with family next year.

review.rating: Cute boutique hotel in the Old Quarter with great hospitality
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Booked a room for 5 days. The room was way more comfortable than i thought. My room have a big window that have view of small alley along the street with a lot of motorcycle and people passing by but none of the noise disturb my peaceful sleep after a full of activity day. Their staff very friendly and they provided delicious food for breakfast too. Very good service worth it.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: the hotel is located in the old part of Hanoi in a quiet street. Everything is nearby, the staff is friendly and accommodating, the rooms could be cleaner.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location & staff
review.comment_negative: The internet connection

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Our stay at Lheritage Diamond in the Old Quarters in Hanoi was a wonderful experience. An unassuming entrance led into a classy boutique hotel. The room was spacious and I adored the decor. But what made this hotel really special were its people. Sabi at reception was delightful and shared tips on how to get the best out of staying in the Old Quarters.
Thank you, Lheritage Diamond hotel for making our trip to Hanoi so memorable.

review.rating: Best place you can stay at in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. They had a breakfast and arranged a car for the airport very early in the morning, which we really appreciate. The location is in the heart of the ancient town, which is really crowded, but really walkable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at this property. Great facility and staff. Would recommend staying here when traveling to Hanoi. Its location in the Old Quarter makes it easy to access restaurants and shopping. Breakfast was also well done. Everything seems well thought out and the staff were helpful.

review.rating: Best hotel location - Near Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is in a great location close to all. The staff were so helpful and friendly. The room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast really good. Lots of fruit and eggs made to order along with Vietnamese choices, fresh juice. Couldn’t have asked for a more comfortable welcome stay. Hotel will arrange anything. Trips, taxis etc. Highly recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great front desk service and nice location in walking distance to much but in a quieter neighborhood. Hotel is quite close to the city the staff are amazing would highly recommend it to anyone

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely place to stay in Hanoi. The location is great and the rooms are comfortable and peaceful. Sabi is very good member of staff and helped a lot. She was very friendly and helped us with our questions. Good hotel to chill and get some rest whilst still being in a great area! There are some great places to get food nearby.

review.rating: Luxury stay with welcoming staff and a great location!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Couldn’t ask for a better experience - the staff was so friendly and helpful & the location is right where you want to be if you want to be walking distance to everything in old quarter. Hard to ask for more.

review.rating: Stunning hotel with even better customer service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: When I stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond, it felt like my own home away from home. From the attentive and friendly staff to the historic architecture around me - every moment was truly magical! The warm welcome not only made everything more enjoyable but also inspired stories of how this breathtaking hotel came alive; something that's sure to etch into one's memories for a long time. Every facility in the room gave all necessities required for an excellent stay. Highly recommended

review.rating: Kind and helpful staff makes for a wonderful stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed 2 nights and we had a good experience with this hotel. it was very clean and the hotel staff very friendly and helpful! The hotel is located very central in the old quarter. Thanks !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location, good value for money, friendly staff
review.comment_negative:
The common areas are not clean at all - the hallways are dirty and used as storage for fold up beds 
The room was very small - balcony is not really a balcony just a window with a fence

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sabi and James were very approachable and were very helpful in giving directions, recommendations and were very inviting during our stay. The pillows were really fluffy too. In addition the food nearby the hotel was fantastic and would definitely recommended!

review.rating: Comfortable hotel in the old quarter.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel - amazing people - amazing country. Thank you all at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for making our stay so enjoyable. Food was delicious. Room was perfect. Nothing to complain about whatsoever! Keep up the good work!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Gorgeous hotel in the heart of the old quarter. The common area (reception,restaurant, housekeeping) are absolutely beautiful and very well maintained. The rooms are spacious and very pretty as well. The spa is excellent and the breakfast is delicious. Overall, this place is like an oasis of calm in the middle of a busy city! Highly recommend!

review.rating: Thank You and hope to return
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very central, a couple of blocks from the Hoan Kiem lake, shopping streets, night market and Water Puppet show. What makes the hotel stand out is the very friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are nice and spacious . We really enjoyed our stay, and appreciated the hotel providing early check-in and luggage storage when I took a side trip. The service and location would bring me back to this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Brand new hotel in the heart of Hanoi old quarter. Good breakfast, room was not too big but adequate & decent with all major facilities. Bed was very comfortable and bathroom was also bright and clean.the staff were really nice and helpful. Definitely will come back!!! Keep up the good work

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were fantastic so friendly and helpful nothing was too much to ask I could not fault the service. The beds were large and comfortable and the rooms clean and tidy. 100% would recommend for a place to stay in the Old Quarter of Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
It about 10 minutes walk to the famous Ho Hoan Kiem lake. Close to lots restaurants and street food. It a romantic room which we both loved.

The receptionist was very nice and they have good English. They helped used booked a bus transfer.
review.comment_negative: The room I booked was a city view but the window was facing a blocked wall.

review.rating: Best location friendly staff very good amenities specious room.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is super nice and very clean. Perfect location in Old town. The breakfast is all you could wish for but now we’re coming to the most important part. The staff!! Sabi greeted us on arrival and helped us with absolutely EVERYTHING. Even when we left Hanoi she still kept in contact and helped with all sorts of bookings. Also Happy in the afternoon crew is extremely nice and helpful as well. Enjoy!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was a nice hotel. The sheets were clean and the pillows were nice. Friendly staff. The room was large and nicely decorated. We’d moved from a cheaper hotel and this one was a relief from the other. The location was good in central of Old Quarter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and quiet. Staff were all friendly and eager to help. They'll even help you purchase tickets from nearby attractions if need be . Location is in the heart of Old Quarter which makes visiting/walking to places of interest very convenient. Hotel is situated next to Cathedral and lake.  I'd stay here again . Truly wonderful!

review.rating: The best hotel I stayed in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friendly hotel. Staff very helpful. Brilliant location on the edge of the old quarter. Everywhere was very accessible from the hotel. Airport pick up arranged by the hotel went very smoothly. The rooms were well equipped and very comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in an excellent location. Staff were very attentive and helpful, especially Lam who went above expectations to ensure I had a good vacation. Thank you!

review.rating: Excellent hotel with wonderful customer service.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were upgraded to a beautiful Deluxe without extra charge. Phuong at the front desk was incredibly helpful in making sure we were comfortable and she also helped us book a walking tour and a sleeper bus to Ha Giang. The food was excellent at the hotel restaurant and the breakfast buffet was well-supplied! The bed was so comfortable and the staff were so helpful. We loved our stay here

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a beautiful stay with a wide variety of options for breakfast too! We stayed here for three nights and explored the city by foot everywhere due to its proximity to the heart of the city. The staff were super kind and hospitality at its best!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: New and very high class boutique hotel. Good location and very convenient. Once i walk near the hotel main door, the door is always open for me. When it rains, the staff will shelter you with a umbrella to your car. Hotel can arrange airport transfer round trip. Getting around can ask them use apps to call a taxi. Taxi is the cheapest way to get around. will recommend my friends and family to visits this hotel.

review.rating: good location, clean, spacious and friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice clean hotel in a very interesting location in the Old Quarter The staffs are very good and friendly. Speaks English well. . Room is very clean. Bathroom was very clean too. Breakfast was excellent. Bed was comfortable. You have a safe in the room and also umbrella is provided in your room just in case of rain. I have nothing to complain about. Will stay here on my next visit next year too. Excellent friendly and informative staffs. Good job !

reviewer.name: Toni
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: Excellent hotel Location in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From the second I checked in to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  it was an absolute paradise! The 5-star service and amenities were out of this world - amazing staff that truly went above and beyond with their hospitality. Not to mention my room looked like a dream – such tasteful decor made me feel right at home while also experiencing something new. Without question, exquisite from start to finish.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: While the hotel itself was lovely - great rooms and amenities, excellent buffet at a great restaurant, everything you could want - the service is what set this hotel apart. In our short stay, staff got to know us, remembered our room number, our plans, made helpful suggestions, just were amazing from start to finish. Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Gorgeous  hotel, the perfect size. We were impressed from the moment we arrived and were welcomed by the delightful reception team. Our room was beautiful, spacious and comfortable, The hotel restaurant on the top floor and sever buffet breakfast, the hotel is walking distance to the central of old quarter, the Cathedral and Hoan Kiem Lake.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great and convenience location. The room is cleaned. Staffs are helpful and friendly, especially Martin is awesome, very helpful, friendly and professional.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I have stayed at this hotel two times, and have enjoyed the great service and hospitality it offers. The hotel  location is one of the charming neighborhoods in Hanoi, providing access to a variety of services. But, ultimately, it is the staff that make a hotel shine, and in this respect I found the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond staff very attentive, polite, and helpful. They go out of their way to help with your needs.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk is very friendly, breakfast service is best and all service employees is fantastic and they when over my expectations. I gave them 5 star in service over all. We will be back again soon. And definitely to stay here again.

review.rating: Very nice to stay and Location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is at the best location. main street, market and many tourist destinations are very near to the hotel. The hotel is clean, friendly and helpful hotel staff and I just loved the room. A perfect stay for honeymoon. The hotel manager Martin was extremely helpful and very attentive to everything. I highly recommended everyone to book your stay. You won’t regret it.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: beautiful location.

review.rating: Basic Hotel in a very good location. Great value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Very good value for money. Fairly basic hotel in a very good location (close to Hoan Kiem Lake).
review.comment_negative: My wife made a booking for the on site nail salon and they cancelled at the very last minute.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Nice place

review.rating: Right at the enter of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel staffs are friendly and went the extra mile to make us comfortable. ,the room in which we stayed was big and clean. Very friendly and helpful receptionists. Good location, the hotel is located in a quiet street and close to Hoan Kiem Lake.

review.rating: Very nice hotel in old quarter central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This place is great, cozy, friendly staff, very convenient travel. I was able to find a great and varied breakfast with delicious pho.Lovely breakfast staff. The room was warm and convenient with good hot water. I will come back here when I come to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed for a total of three nights and had a great time. The hotel is downtown, but in a relatively quiet location. Everything was amazing. The staff was so nice. The room is clean. Breakfast is delicious .

review.rating: Walking distance to all of the attractions. Highly recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel, with a great location,clean and great staff. Close to all tourist spots and in the main area of the Old Quarter. Especially Mr Martin, he make us like stay at home, I would visit this hotel for the next trip in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The hotel is charming, clean (well maintained), the staff is welcoming and super helpful. They welcomed us with drinks when we arrived late in the evening from Sa Pa. We are a family of 5 (children ages: 10, 12, 14), so we got the family room. It was nice to have a shared private hallway. The pho for breakfast was delicious and their fruit is always fresh!
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staffs at the front desk were fantastic, always be happy and smiling, very helpful. The room was quiet, huge array to choose for breakfast, including a large variety of fruit. Hot shower,good location.would stay at this hotel again. Thank you

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: khách sạn gần hồ, gần các quán ăn
review.comment_negative: phòng bé, không có bữa sáng

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: In the highly competitive old quarter, this hotel stands out! We were there for 4 nights and the staff, location and the hotel were great. Perfect location,The stay was super comfortable with clean rooms, friendly staff and a nice spa.I would definitely recommend anyone including my friends and family to stay here.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an excellent stay at the hotel. It is located close to the old quarter, with quick access to most of Hanoi landmarks. The hotel itself was as described. The room was reasonably spacious, and everything was clean. We could also enjoy a beautiful view at night from the my room. Very impressed with the staff, always smiling and polite. Would go back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Cũng được cho một chuyến đi gia đình. Phòng có ban công nên không bị ngột ngạt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was fantastic to stay in the Lheritage Diamond hotel.Hotel services was kind and friendly.You have everything with in a couple on minutes walking.  Room was so clean and comfortable.We willing to come back to this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Loistava sijainti, runsas aamupala ja erinomaiset vuoteet.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great value. 
Breakfast was excellent

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very good located in the old quarter. You find many restaurants, coffee shops, stores and spas in walking distance. It offers nice and clean rooms with comfortable beds. All the staff is very friendly and helpful. Especially Martin helped out with many things, provided a lot of useful information and was always very reliable. I stayed for almost 4 nights and would go back anytime.

review.rating: Great hotel with perfect location and delicious breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Hotel on our arrival in Vietnam and found the staff to be extremely friendly and helpful. They couldn't do enough to make us comfortable and recommend places to visit. The room was comfortable and the breakfast in their sister hotel opposite was the best we had in Vietnam. We left after a few days to continue our travels south but were so happy with our earlier stay that we chose to return for our last two days in Vietnam before flying home.
Jame and Huong at reception went out of their way to assist us after I made a mistake with the booking, helping to organise a different room, a transfer to the airport and even a breakfast to take with us. Very professional staff and a lovely hotel, in a perfect location.

review.rating: Good... but it could be great.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great and friendly people working, showers and bed are quite nice. Internet works well. The location is fantastic and you can get anywhere, quick. Modern decor.
review.comment_negative: Rooms are very different, which means if you pick a Superior room, you might get a nice one with a table and added space, or a room the size of a closet. Clean up seems to miss replacing simple toiletries. They had great pillows in one room, and 2 "bricks" in the other. When I asked some, they replied there were no other extras, as it was full. A hotel has no extra pillows at all? It's strange. Overall, a decent experience, but it's inconsistent.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The staff were amazing. Nothing too much trouble, especially helpful to the solo traveller. Checking in a breeze, clean rooms and sumptuous breakfast. Highly recommend.
A big thanks to Sabi on desk for help sending mail to UK, who organised cake for my birthday. Also Jame at the travel desk who organised my forward travel. Best service ever

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at three similar hotels in Hanoi during this past trip. All three had really good service and were very helpful. Breakfast was good at all three. Rooms were good at all three. Location was good at all three. The facilities at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond were nicer.Thank you!

review.rating: Centrally located in the Old Quarter, welcoming staff, lovely breakfast buffet, good value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was very good and the location of the hotel was perfect for walking around in the Old Quarter. The staff were very helpful with local information and organising interesting tours.
review.comment_negative: The room was very nice, but the aircon was difficult to control. This meant I found it difficult to get a good night's sleep.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ốc khá đơn giản, sạch sẽ là được. Ban công cũng không có gì đặc biệt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were very satisfied with our stay and the hotel staff were very friendly and informative. Gave us great recommendations for places to visit around the area.

review.rating: Great location and really lovely helpful staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in the perfect location to explore the old city and lake. We arrived on a Sunday evening week before Christmas, which was great as the streets were filled with people out and about enjoying the Christmas lights at the church, and the roads around the lake were closed to traffic for people to walk around. The hotel staff spoke perfect English and went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable. We had issues with a leak in our room and they dealt with it immediately and moved us to another (better) room instantly. We also used the taxi service from the airport that was organised by the hotel which was only a little more expensive that what was quoted on Grab.
review.comment_negative: The hotel is quite tired, and carpets old. We originally had a triple room on the second floor which was tiny and there wasn’t any space between the beds. There was a window but as it opened up to an alley the room did not receive any natural light. To be fair to the hotel, when booking they did advise us to get a Family Room instead, which is two separate with an a private corridor. I still do not feel there should be 3 beds in a room of that size. The cleaning trolley gets stored in the hallway of the second floor, directly outside the Family Room. This wasn’t an issue but was just unexpected. Please also note that from the second floor you can hear people reception early in the morning. After a huge leak in the ceiling of our bathroom we were moved to a suite at the front of the building on a higher floor which received a lot more light and felt a little more spacious. In both rooms we stayed in we experienced hearing water travelling down the pipes from upper floors through boxing in the walls - this couldn’t be heard if the bathroom doors were shut.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
établissement simple à la réception et chambre supérieure très moderne et très confortable 
moyennement un supplément raisonnable nous avons pu avoir la chambre dès 9 h AM appréciable après un long voyage
bon et copieux petit déjeuner
review.comment_negative: rien

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is near the residential area to visit and enjoy the life in Hanoi. The receptionist Sabi is very nice and cute. She helps me to check in and check out very quickly. This is the hotel you should try to stay when you come to Hanoi.

review.rating: Buena ubicacion y el personal majo, pero poco limpio y las fotos engañan un poco
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: El staff muy majo, pero todo muy sucio
review.comment_negative: La suciedad, poca limpieza, olores en la cocina a aceite, basuras por los pasilloS

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We spent only one night here but the staff couldn’t perform any better. Especially Martin, Sabi, they remained professional at all times, always was observing and kind to us. They introduced us to a special kind of Vietnamese coffee though. The hotel rooms are clean and very comfortable. Facilities are great and the hotel is located in the heart of the old quarter. We will return!

review.rating: Beautiful stay in the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located in the heart of old quarter. Walking distance to everything. The staff was one of the best thing about the hotel. Always so friendly, trying to make sure we had everything we needed. Honesty for the staff alone, I would like to book this hotel again

review.rating: Cannot recommend it enough - Great hotel location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This boutique hotel is warm, cozy, and amazing! There are 50 rooms in total, and each room is thoughtful and artful. The restaurant on top floor with good view and serve buffet breakfast . We felt lucky to stay Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel.

review.rating: Overall it was an amazing stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great staff, Martin was so friendly and helpful, as well as dong. We found a comfortable situation and we were also helped in organizing activities around this beautiful country. Perfect stay for European visitors, rooms were very good also

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I recommend this hotel in many ways. Location Right in front of Lake Hoankiem!comfortable place to take a walk and tour. bedding was good, and I was satisfied with breakfast and restaurant. also, the night view at hotel on top floor was good,all the staff members were so kind and bright that they left a lot of good memories.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I have a lovely stay in this hotel, the staff were very kind and professional in particular Phuong and Chi, many thanks to them ! It was perfect to discover Hanoi, and the breakfast is delicious, don't hesitate to come and stay there

review.rating: Awesome service, great bed, super convenient
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is beautiful. Brand new . The location was great and the staff were amazing. They all spoke excellent English and could not do enough for us. They made us feel very special and went above and beyond. We will definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was amazing. The staff is helpful and the room was very good.
review.comment_negative: The quality of breakfast was horrible. The sausages and other meat items were so chewy. No options for vegetarians.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here during our first night in Vietnam and really enjoyed our stay. The location is excellent for exploring Hanoi's old quarter. The rooms are spacious, clean and have everything you need. We loved the breakfast, which was a combination of Eastern and Western with lots of fresh fruit. The staff was extremely friendly and helped us organise bus transportation to Cat Ba island even though we asked very last minute.
review.comment_negative: The room had a window but the building next door is so close that the only view you get is bricks, however I believe most hotels in Hanoi are this way. The staff is a bit pushy on organising a tour for you.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lheritage Diamond Hotel in a busy area of Hanoi's Old Quarter but was in a quiet part of the street. With double glazing to all the windows we were never troubled by outside noise. The Front desk Staff are very helpful and friendly. The Room is a nice size with a local view down the small street, which is always interesting. Good Bed, great shower and lots of hot water. Nice TV on the wall opposite the bed.. The Breakfast on the 10th floor . The Breakfast supervisor is exceptional, and really looks after you.. They have everything you could want, Eggs any way, Bacon, Beans, tomatoes.. Good Bread & Pastries, Best Jam in VN, Lots of Asian delights, Noodles, rice, etc. This Hotel will be our First choice next time we visit.. no need to look anywhere else. The Staff are the Stars of this Hotel, so well trained and caring, can't say enough about them. Thanks!

review.rating: Perfect luxurious stay in the Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We loved our stay here, used it as a base to travel around north of Vietnam. Its conveniently located, clean and staff are super friendly! We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone and will come back ourselves when we are in Hanoi again.
Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good hotel right at the center of things. Walking distance to all main attractions. Martin helped us get a great day tour to Ninh binh. Value for money. Also provided airport drop which is at additional cost.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I feel very lucky to be able to find this hotel because the location is very strategic, within walking distance to Hoan Kiem Lake, Night Market, and Beer Street. There are a lot of food and bars around as well. The room was clean and comfortable, the staffs were really nice and kind.

review.rating: Great location, people at the hotel are really nice and professional.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel in the middle of Hanoi’s old quarter. Great location. Hotel is beautiful, super clean and the staff is great. Special mention to their customer care/ guest services Martin, he is excellent! He makes sure you set with everything you need, offered to get a breakfast packed due to the very early tour pick. Also advise to enjoy breakfast and informed when the tour guide was in lobby ready to pick up. So there was need to wait in lobby for the tour pick up, instead waited in the restaurant with a nice view and a coffee.

review.rating: Great location staff friendly and helpful
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: If you want to explore the old quarters of Hanoi, this is the hotel to stay in. From day activities to night life, it is a short walk away. Big room too! Really value for money. If we come back to Hanoi, this is the hotel we will be staying in again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best location in Old Town. Staff were very nice, helpful and happy to provide a good service to you. Booked a couple of tours through the hotel. Breakfast wasn’t great unless you like pho in the morning or eggs. Room was relatively clean and had all the amenities one could want.

review.rating: Great location, nice rooms, and great service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Really good hotel. Great location.Clean and very comfortable. Restaurant is fantastic with a great view over the city.
Staff were always very friendly. Breakfast was great so much choice. I would recommend and if back in Hanoi Vietnam will stay again.

review.rating: Impeccable hotel and service, and perfect location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What an amazing hotel. Hospitality and customer service was great. The Spa was amazing. The masseuse have such strong hands. Very friendly and Manager Mr Martin was helpful and gave me assistance in my travels.

review.rating: Excellent hotel! Close to everything in Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here in Apr 2023. We had flights cancelled and arrived late and they were so accommodating. The room was extremely clean, excellent central location and the staff were beyond helpful and kind! We were able to book a trip to Ha Long Bay right from their helpful staff at the reception and they arranged drives to and from the airport. After Ha Long Bay they let us keep our bags there for safekeeping even though we were leaving Hanois that night. The restaurant on top floor as was the free buffet breakfast everyday. We are from Germany and the quality and service far exceeds anything from home. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very good location , very helpful staff. Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was really good too on top floor. We had a room at the back so it was very quiet. Staff couldn't be more helpful

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is Great location within walking distance to many sights. Clean, comfortable, quiet room. Really good buffet breakfast .The best thing about the whole hotel is the staff. Everyone was fantastic from Doorman, dining room staff, reception and tour organizers. We felt so welcome and they helped us a lot with recommendations and tours. We will stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is done up very nicely with simple gentrified rooms. Location is superb can go anywhere, very easy access to just walk around, the staff on the front desk are extremely friendly and can't do enough for you, helping me many things , The breakfast is very good ,with lovely flaky croissants and the made to order french toast is superb. Would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: good location for a reasonable price
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: good location, reasonable price
review.comment_negative: pretty small room, breakfast quality and selection. has space to improve

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed in the family room. The space in the room is big enough to open up 2 big and 1 small luggage. Hotel  provides buffet breakfast though variety not a lot. The location is quite convenient with many places for meals just short distance away.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: good customer service
review.comment_negative: breakfast was poor

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
친절한 직원 좋은 위치
그리고 손님에 대한 서비스
밤에 리센션을 담당한 Tuan Anh에게
많은 도움을 받았다 그는 최고이다
review.comment_negative:
우리 방만 그런거 같긴한데
화장실 창문 밖 에어컨 실외기 소리가
조금 크게 느껴진 적이 있다
하지만 리셉션에서 도와주었다

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A great  hotel right in the heart of Hanoi. situated right in front of the cathedral, it is very local and walkable to all places around the lake. So many eating places you just cant list them all here. Great wifi. Bathroom was great with a lovely deep bathtub to relax in after a hectic days walking the streets of Hanoi and seeing the sights. Breakfast is excellent to set you up for the days adventure ahead.

review.rating: A lovely well appointed old quarter hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel, very good service and helpful staff. They are always here for a piece of advice, organise taxi or buses and help you to enjoy the city. The breakfast was delicious. We had a great time!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nice location, good staffs & breakfast, very clean & comfortable room. I was really relaxed & enjoyed every activities in Hanoi. I want to stay here again for the next trip !

review.rating: Excellent hotel location in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I had a pleasant stay at this hotel while i was in Hanoi. The room was top quality and everything worked as expected, the location in centre of old quarter, Near the Hoan Kiem lake and many restaurants....,

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is super good, right in the middle of the old quarter area. The Manager was out here to ask for comments n suggestions from the customers to obtain improvement areas . We got a big room with fancy chandelier view overlooking the city,  which is definitely one of the most unique hotel stays I ever had. Helped with cheap taxi booking for airport transfer.

review.rating: Great Staff - Great Hotel - Sure will be back
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, just in the outskirts of Old Quarter, quieter and peaceful at night! Really happy with the stay, the room was clean and there were adequate supplies of toiletries!Overall, I’m very satisfied with my stay and would recommend this place to anyone who wants to be close to Old Quarter without the hustle and bustle of Old Quarter

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I’m from Portugal traveling with my gf to this city. I we first chose this hotel since its restaurant on top floor has the best view in Hanoi Old Town! Also, the reception staffs are super friendly and willing to share the information from the point of view as the local to me. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Thủ tục nhận phòng không quá lâu. Phòng ốc ở mức cơ bản, sạch sẽ tạm ổn.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Giường ngủ tạm được, phòng cách âm ở mức trung bình. Trải nghiệm ở mức khá.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, walking distance to the lake and many restaurants. Viet Restaurant dishes are of very high quality, complimented with creative cocktails. Most significantly, one of the best hotel staff team. They know us by name, our preferences and always check in to see how they could help each time we pass through the lobby. They have managed to help us check and find places we want to eat a particular food or buy particular items.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Lovely room with large comfortable bed and a small balcony with view of the Cathedral. Very well located. Bonus jacuzzi bathtub with window too, very relaxing, nice hotel.

review.rating: Great service and well appointed rooms
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A fantastic hotel with fantastic staff! The room was lovely and the staff couldn’t be more any more welcoming throughout. Special thanks to Mr Martin who made my stay so brilliant! Would definitely recommend.

review.rating: Amazing staff and super comfy room
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Conveniently located in a quiet side street near the lake.The bedrooms are very good, the beds extremely comfortable and the bathrooms modern, well fitted and with strong water pressure.The service is excellent and the word that comes to mind is pampered.  We also took advantage of a late check out and limo service to airport at a very good price.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This service at this hotel is EXCEPTIONAL! From the welcome drink when you arrive, to walking with us to the pharmacy and helping us find medicine, to remembering our names, to providing recommendations, to packing us a breakfast since we left earlier than their breakfast started, the staff here made you feel like royalty. The hotel is beautiful too. The room is well outfitted and the rooftop bar was a fun spot for drinks. We enjoyed the happy hour. The location is great too. This is the only place we will stay in Hanoi in the future, and I will recommend this hotel to all of our friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức chấp nhận được, không quá rộng rãi. Vị trí khá ổn để di chuyển.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Excellent staff, comfortable bed, great location

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi still holds great charm , what Vietnam once was....and very much still is. The location of this gem of a hotel allows you to be within walking distance of all this city has to offer, if you don't want to walk plenty of folk will cycle you through the mayhem at terrific rates negotiated by the staff. They will suggest their restaurant for evening dining at their restaurant! The food is awesome. They will also offer room upgrades at really reasonable rates, and they are lovely rooms. And Martin the manager is a most attentive host and she captures the essence of these beautiful people - they just want your stay to be perfect and you leave loving their country. Thank you!!!

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The staff were excellent, the facilities a bargain for the price and the location was perfect - right in the middle of the Old Quarter.

review.rating: Amazing base for exploration of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Beautiful property, great location and amazingly friendly and attentive staff! Everyone was so nice, but special thanks to James for helping with directions, recommendations and just being fun to chat with, he made our stay feel so personalized and special!

review.rating: New established hotel and friendly staff. Room are clean and convenient...
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our second stay. This time we got a upgrade. Great new hotel. Great location. Rooms are new and clean. Good amenities. Will come back again!

review.rating: Great Location in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This place is amazing from start to finish. Wonderful staff, superb location and fantastic rooms. Its almost free at this price. An absolute gem in my opinion.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: 當天入住時Martin非常熱心接待，因房間剛好打掃好了，也協助讓我們可以提早於下午13:20check in，並非常貼心提供兩種房型供我們選擇，真的很感謝！4/1我們從Sapa回到河內巴士站時，因為五個人很難叫到7人座的計程車，Martin非常熱心在非上班時間協助我們叫車。服務真的非常好
review.comment_negative: 無

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location, breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is pretty strategy, all visit points are walking distance and good breakfast.
review.comment_negative: The payment in-charge by hotel instead of booking.com. Hotel mentioned can accept credit card payment, but they didn't upfront inform us using credit card need to extra charge 3%. This is not fair to customer, if really with extra charge, should upfront inform it, so we will prepare extra cash for it.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse du personnel, la ponctualité, le petit-déjeuner à emporter qu'il soit nous avaient préparer vu l'heure matinale de notre bus. Le service de navette depuis l'aéroport, les lits 👌 confortables et le calme malgré l'emplacement hyper central de l'hôtel.
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: good location, friendly and helpful staff
review.comment_negative: cheaper rooms are really small

review.rating: Easily the best luxury Hotel in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk service are excellent, friendly and give you suggestions where to go in Hanoi. More importantly they advice you how to be safe when you walk around Hanoi. The location of the hotel is walking distance to few famous drink/food shop.

review.rating: Best hotel in Hanoi Old Town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good customers service! Hotel is new and door steps to many nice local eateries and affordable spas. Nice staff here too. Thanks to Martin and his colleagues for their 5 stars service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Good location, staff couldn’t be more helpful! Comfortable bed, room cleaned each day and easy to ask for help for local attractions
review.comment_negative: The room was really small and for 2 of us there wasn’t much room for our things. Breakfast could also be improved - but you are in the city so plenty of options around you

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is centrally located. The staff are very good and helpful.  Everything is walkable from this hotel to food, tourist spot. Strongly recommend this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great hotel Kindly and warm people It’s pleasure to be there Martin is the best host that I ever seen before. Trust to visit there!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, very nice facilities and wonderful staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel in a very conveniently located part of Hanoi. Room was well maintained, comfortable, clean and fresh. Bed was comfortable. Breakfasts were outstanding. Staff was very courteous, responsive and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is nice located in the Center of the old quarter. It is hard to take car due to traffic. But the staff name Sabi is friendly and good in welcoming of guest.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This must be the best hotel we've stayed in. The room itself was extremely spacious and comfortable. The hotel has a lovely location in Hanoi Old Quarter. Best wishes to all the staff . We hope to return to Vietnam and will definitely be checking back in.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel's location is excellent--a short walk to many great restaurants, coffee shops, and the lake. It is also very clean, and the staff is quite friendly and helpful. We had planned to only stay one night, but ended up arriving a day earlier than expected and needing a room. They were able to accommodate us in a room close by the one for the next night and moved our bags for us, which was very helpful. We would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked to stay here for five nights and ended up staying eight! One of the best hotel customer service experiences I’ve ever had- without exaggeration! they helped us to book Ha Long bay and Sapa tours and even let us store our luggage at the hotel while we went. Breakfast epic and was cooked to order. Rooms are big and clean. Location perfect for exploring Hanoi. Would happily return

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well thought through, modern room - clean and comfortable. Quiet, despite the central location. Amazing breakfast with great views from the top floor. Staff were lovely.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This  gem of a hotel is a wonderful find. Ideally located in old quarter. Staff couldn’t have been more helpful, always ready to help, always with a smile on their faces. Breakfast was a delightful buffet, lots of tropical fruit together with local Asian dishes. Highly recommend and would definitely return for an authentic stay in Hanoi.

review.rating: I would come back to this hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great stay here! The staff went above and beyond to make our stay amazing. It is in a good location and was clean and comfortable. The beds were very comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Well designed boutique hotel. Everything looked cool and thought through. The location next to the cathedral and lake was perfect, great spot to explore from. Highly recommended this hotel !

review.rating: In the heart of the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed here two nights during our time in Hanoi. We can't fault this place, we had the balcony room which was perfect for a relaxing evening watching the street life .The location is perfect, right in the Old quarter and interspersing street foods and the night markets on weekends. Staff were friendly and professional, And the price is more than correct.
I recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: muy buena ubicacion y personal amable

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The staff went out of their way to make our stay the best part of our 2 1/2 weeks  holiday in Vietnam! The manager Martin coupled with front of house staff Jenny & Camille helped us over a few obstacles that we encountered.
A lovely boutique hotel within walking distance of the French quarter, the lake and breweries. Watch out for the scooters!!!
Late check out also helped on our last day, we stayed one night, toured Halong Bay and then came back for another night.

review.rating: Great location, super clean facilities, really kind staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutely fantastic value. Service from the staff, especially Martin was just as good as 4 star hotels in America. They took care of our day trip and travel bookings, making things incredibly easy for us. They even helped us with travel after we left their hotel! The room was big, clean, and pleasant, perhaps a bit dated. But there was nothing lacking!

review.rating: Nice location, clean and great services Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great place to stay and good value. Excellent staff that helped in every way.the service , price and treatment. It was so good and worth the money. Must try when you are there. Breakfast there is good too have lots of choices. Definitely come back stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative: Understaffed, office right in the lobby, not really clean, had to switch rooms after check-in

review.rating: We will definitely be back to Hanoi Lheritage Diamond
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I feel very happy during I stay here. I booked Halong bay tour in the hotel, it 's so fantastic, I recommend this tour to if you have a plan in Vietnam. ms. Phuong is a receptionist, She is very kind and funny. I am really like Hanoi Lhertiage Diamond!

review.rating: Great hotel that was accommodating to our needs!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic hotel with wonderful, friendly staff who couldn’t do enough for me, and great rooms, set right in the beating heart of Hanoi. You’d be hard pressed to find a better value place. The food is good too. All in all, very highly recommended.

review.rating: Awesome and very affordable, helpful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel has the best location in Hanoi Old Quarter. It is within walking distance to all main attractions. We stayed in the room on the third floor which was very comfortable. Also breakfast was very delicious. But the true gem of the hotel is hospitality of the hotel staff! Thanks to Martin and all the team everything was amazing. They helped us with sim card installation, organization of cruising on Halong Bay, transportation to further destionation, etc. We will definitely come back again! Highly recommended for couples and families with children.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức tạm được, phù hợp giá tiền. Ban công không có gì đặc sắc lắm.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vị trí cũng tạm được, không quá xa trung tâm. Ban công phòng cũng bình thường.

review.rating: Great Hotel, Excellent Service, Gourmet Breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed one night at Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The room was so beautiful and clean. I had a great time at buffet breakfast on 10th floor, you could see the different view in Ha Noi. Thanks to Mr Martin he helped me a lot and upgraded my room, because it was my last night at Ha Noi , and my first time got here. It was a wonderful night~ I wish I could stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel one more day.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: from the airport transfer to the check in to the welcome , this hotel has delivered. we had an episode having left something behind in a grab car and the concierge was super helpful in recovering the item swiftly and without fuss. the room was spacious and comfortable, albeit with a slightly quirky layout. still, we very much enjoyed our stay. the location is superb too right next to where all the action is.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Best location in the middle of the old town. Lovely staff who were very helpful and accomodating. The rooms were a good size and very comfy. A wide variety for breakfast every day with omelettes and eggs available to order.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: cómodo y limpio. nos dejamos la cartera y un trabajador del hotel nos encontró por la calle y nos aviso, un detalle increíble ya que tenia tarjetas de crédito, dinero y dni y estaba todo. Muy agradecidos
review.comment_negative: las habitaciones se ven mucho mas grandes en las fotos

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: location

review.rating: Top Value for Service, Location and Friendliness
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really annoyed our stay at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. It is in a great central spot. The bed was comfy and it was SUPER quiet despite the noisey city. The front desk including Phuong & Chi were very accommodating when we needed help with our safe and asked for an extra blanket. They also provided advise for yummy food and booked us transportation to Halong. Food was good at the buffet too. 100% would return

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at this hotel and could not have been happier. The old style charm with modern amenities in the heart of the old quarter. Would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a  new boutique hotel in the best street in Old Town Hanoi. I've visited Hanoi 2 times now and this hotel is the best value for money. The rooms are 5 star quality. Staff are young, English speakers. The hotel arranged our Ha Long Bay overnight tour _ cheaper than agencies on the street!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Very good location, nice and friendly staff, clean and big rooms.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel to stay in, clean and very well maintained. Hotel staff Ms Sabi was very helpful during my stay and really made me feel at home with her attentive care.
