I enjoy the hotel breakfast very much and I love how most of the staff care about their customers very much. I want to thank the hotel and Sabi for making my first trip to Hanoi so wonderful. Hope to see you all again soon!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sabi and Martin are the best host ever ! They know their jobs they took care of us and they helped us ! Very polite, welcoming and professional I would definitely come back again here next time.Thank you !!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We were welcomed and offered ginger tea whilst we sorted out paperwork. The rooms were a good size, clean and had a lovely  bathroom. Breakfasts were good, fresh eggs, omelettes and pancakes cooked for you. The staff were all lovely, friendly and helpful. The hotel is centrally located in the old town so easy to get about. There is a lift. I would stay again.

review.rating: great location perfect for stay in Old Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: clean, quiet and comfortable in central location.
review.comment_negative: bathroom not suitable for anyone with a mobility issue as you need to step over high sided bath to get into shower and there are no grab handles or anti-slip.  I slipped climbing in reached out for window handle and window flew open grazing my arm.  I have no mobility issues and was same set up in the two rooms we stayed in

review.rating: great place in Hanoi very central and comfortable
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: fantastic location, very comfortable bed, quiet room

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Nearly everything is in walking distance. Due to the central location in the old town. The mattress is excellent, not too soft and not the least bit worn. The service was exceptionally good, very friendly and helpful. I can highly recommend the hotel. There is Excellent breakfast offered.

review.rating: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond in Old Quarter Central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Booked 2 nights but added a 3rd. The hotel was busy but they did their best to help & accommodate 6 of us.
Booked sleeper coaches, bought SIM cards through the hotel who were very helpful to us.
We are going back for our last night in Vietnam before flying back to the UK.

review.rating: Great place stay at Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My wife and I spent three nights at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel and it was excellent. The Fo staff lead by Mr. Martin were incredibly sweet, helpful, professional and accommodating. The breakfast buffet offers an amazing array of options. Room was nice and the bed was very comfortable.

review.rating: Delicious breakfasts, incredibly friendly, cheerful and helpful staff, very pleasant rooms
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Hanoi . The hotel is located right in the busy heart of the old quarter. Stepping outside you can immediately experience Hanoi street-life, yet inside the hotel is peaceful, quiet and relaxing. The staff were excellent - always friendly and helpful, taking an interest in our trip, giving great recommendations for restaurants and so on, and going beyond expectations organising transport, booking and checking in, and even contacting our next hotel. The breakfast was delicious, with lots on the menu and very attentive staff. The room was a high standard, well-equipped and very clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing small boutique hotel with wonderful guest service. Thank you Martin and all staff at LHeritage Diamond hotel, you guys made my trip in Hanoi with all your local knowledge and tourist tips. Especially Martin, he helped me from tour booking, local restaurant recommended to amend my reservation. The hotel is central, close to many things - bar, restaurants, great shopping too.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Posizione perfetta per visitare il centro di hanoi
review.comment_negative: Pulizia e colazione

review.rating: Great rooms, and friendly and helpful host
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff is excellent. Friendly, always ready to help. Enjoyed our few days there and would definitely plan on staying there the next time we visit Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a beautiful and luxurious hotel, an oasis of calm amid the hustle and bustle of the old quarter. A perfect location for exploring. We had a lovely, comfortable room, nice to come back to after a busy day. Breakfast was outstanding, the hotel staff helped us with all our requirements. A special mention to Phuong, who helped us so much, including organizing our memorable trip to Halong Bay, she knew exactly what we wanted. Thank you !. Wonderful memories of Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was our first stop in Vietnam. It was in a great, central location close to everything including the night market, lake, and most of the landmarks in the old quarter. We were easily able to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Plenty of shops and restaurants everywhere around the hotel. Our room was a good size and had a very comfortable bed! Window looked internally at an atrium which didn't bother us, but might if you were expecting a view. Room Included breakfast buffet was good with alot of options including pho. Staff were all very friendly and helpful. We had a great stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a pleasant stay in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond . The staff were all very welcoming and professional. The room was fantastic, breakfast was incredible and overall ambiance of the hotel was wonderful. A special thanks to Phuong who took great care of us and when I was feeling unwell, she assisted us to the pharmacy and went out of her way to ensure I felt better. This is my favourite hotel in Vietnam.

reviewer.name: Jasmine
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: The most beautiful place to stay in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great hotel, friendly and super attentive staff, very high quality breakfast. Excellent location. Thanks for the front desk staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Property was excellent and exceeded my expectations. Staff were very friendly especially Martin (manager), Phuong and Lam who work at front desk. I also like it how close it is to the old quarter and kiem lake. Trip was very good and they were also helpful in organizing shuttles. I highly recommend this place!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great and friendly staff, clean room and good location.They helped us a lot during our visit to Vietnam and gave us great tips on where to go and great local restaurants to enjoy. I especially enjoyed this hotel because of the top notch service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent staff, amazing rooms, amazing service. They helped us plan tours within a days notice and whenever we phoned down to reception they quickly answered and covered our needs. Would highly recommend. It is positioned perfectly as well, within walking distance of walking street and the lake with the weekend market.

review.rating: A very nice hotel, a great stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very clean and quiet.The staff are very friendly and informative,The room was very clean and quite and a good shower.The breakfast was excellent with a good choice and again the staff were very friendly and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: die Lage und das  Frühstück

review.rating: Overrated hotel in general. Fit a 3 stars. Breakfast need to get improved. Good location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location, the staff is kind
review.comment_negative: Overrated hotel. Clearly not a 4 stars hotel but 3. The breakfast is one of the worst breakfast i have seen for a 4 stars hotel. Very poor. The main entry of the hotel is very old and modern.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic experience at the Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Location was perfect, right smack in the middle of everything; a bustling market and the night market . The rooms are clean and comfortable, the restaurant is great views.
But the highlight of our visit to Hanoi was really the hospitality, attentiveness and warmth of every single person we came into contact with at the hotel. In particular, Sabi, Martin, James ..really went out of their way to make our stay as memorable and comfortable as possible. We can’t wait to go back!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is an excellent hotel to stay at in Hanoi. The hotel is located in the old quarter centre. The staff are the friendliest and most helpful that I have experienced. They remember your name and make your experience memorable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staying in this hotel is definitely worth the money. It's a haven of peace in busy Hanoi. The beds were comfortable and rooms were spacious. It was the team that really made the stay great. We are looking forward to coming back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Rooms Were nice, location was amazing but the staff are incredibly amazing they go that extra mile to make your stay pleasant and there very comforting while doing it would like to thank Martin for there hospitality but I want to give a special . Great hotel! The rooms were spatious and clean. Highly recommended if you're traveling to Hanoi for holiday or work!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel has good facilities and nice people. They kept us comfortable all the time and were treated the best. The room city view was really beautiful and it is convenient because it is close to Hanoi's attractions. I had the best trip.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn cũng tạm được, không có gì quá đặc biệt. Ban công khá nhỏ.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Thank you for providing me such a great customer service. Super clean and convenient location. Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel is strategically located amongst bustling food and attractions. Certainly helps if you are a  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond for complimentary breakfast and upgrade! Breakfast buffet has a hearty selection. They are fresh and delicious! Thanks to Phuong and her excellent team for all the arrangements and warm hospitality! Will certainly return in the future

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed one night with my family. All of staffs were very helpful and kind. The bedroom was big enough for 4 people(two adults and two kids). I wish we could stay longer!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutely awesome. Loved my stay, will definitely be my go to hotel when in Hanoi. Sabi is by far one of the most genuine, nice receptionists I have encountered, thank you for your local suggestions. I honestly can't recommend this hotel enough

review.rating: Really like this hotel, Outstanding Service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent value for money, very friendly staff who go out of their way to help you, rooms excellent and clean, such a pleasant stay, thank you to all staff at this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great place, rooms are pretty calm comparing to the other places in the city! Staff is top!!! Sabi helped me a lot, she is speaking English perfect and such a nice person! For solo travelers super super safe and you feel at home!
Quality is great - strongly suggest

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_negative: We booked a suite for 4 nights. First day we got a much smaller room. However, after complaining the room was changed the next day. They should categorize the smaller suite as a junior suite or something else..

review.rating: Highly recommended -value for money stay in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is in the center of Ha Noi, the food is delicious. I and my friends traveled to many cities around Vietnam, this is one of the best experience we have ever had. We will be back here one day. What a lovely city and hotel

review.rating: Perfect location in old quarter hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: location is just perfect, staff are very friendly and helpful. able to speak English and tried their best to make stay there an enjoyable one. will surely stay in the same hotel when i return to Hanoi. good job

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kind staff that was very accommodating, great breakfast. All in all, very impressed with the service and accommodation. Especially Ms. Sabi — she was a joy with our young son - Would recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Accoglienza e disponibilità

review.rating: Overall is good, except to improve the room smell
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The location is centralized in Hanoi ,easy accessible to many place.
review.comment_negative: The hotel room has a weird smell upon check in

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Giá cả phù hợp với chất lượng. Phòng ở mức khá, không có gì đặc biệt lắm.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Kleines schön gelegenes Hotel in Hanoi.Mitarbeiter sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.Frühstück war super Daumen hoch.Kann man uneingeschränkt weiter empfehlen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great hotel with memorable interior, very clean and comfortable, perfect location with easy access to the iconic places in Ha Noi, very professional team and ideal communication, excellent hospitality and care for the guests!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was close to the lake and amenities.

review.rating: A Great Pick in Hanoi - No Regrets
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel on a great location in the old city. The staff are amazing. Always helpful and will do anything to make the guest a good staying. Breakfast was good. All clean and nice. I definitely will come back again sometime.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel’s location is superb. It is located a 50  meters from Hoan Kiem lake. It’s a very safe place to stay and visit Hanoi. The room is very clean, and the Wi-Fi is very fast. There are plenty of Vietnamese restaurants and souvenirs shop nearby. We had free breakfast including excellent Vietnamese soup called Pho, fried eggs, various Vietnamese fruits, coffee, tea, mango juice, the staff at the reception and travel desk very helpful. We will certainly stay here next time we visit Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very cozy hotel. Good location, nice and clean room. In addition, the hotel provide very good breakfast. It locates near the lake and Cathedral. You can shop or find some good restaurants in a walking distance. Highly recommend for those who plan to visit Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a great stay here! The staff went above and beyond to make our stay amazing. It is in a good location and was clean and comfortable. The beds were very comfortable.

review.rating: One of the best hotels I have stayed.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Incredible personalised service from Sabi and her colleagues at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. We felt welcomed even before we set foot in the hotel. It made for a perfect place to start and end our trip in Vietnam and this for a reasonable price. Do not hesitate to book here for a worryless stay in the capital. Big thanks to the Diamond hotel team for providing us with such an outstanding experience. Keep up the great work!

review.rating: Sorry but we will not be going back
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location was good along with the staff and it had a lift thats where it stopped
review.comment_negative:
Room size very small, bathroom was very small and we could only move one at a time all the electric sockets were for designed not to take western electric transformers
This would be suitable for a backpacker on there own not two mature adults

review.rating: Perfect location, room and service - highly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotels staff was extremely professional and attentive, since before we arrived we received a message with airport pick-up offers and other tours information . The room was clean, spacious, and well equipped with all necessities. Also, the hotel is within walking distance to Hanoi's attractions (Cathedral and Lake is within one block). Overall, we enjoyed our stay and will definitely return in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: helpful staff. good location.
review.comment_negative: very noisy hotel. you hear every door close along your floor and the cleaning staff were shouting very loudly outside the rooms very early in the morning.

review.rating: Prime location, extremely hygiene, comfort bed
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel ticks most of the items that one needs during an overseas trip. Very well located near to variety of eateries, well kept rooms, limited but tasty in-house food and beverage options and last but not least way least Is the extremely caring staff. I have upgraded our room which was really nice. The front desk personnel were very helpful in arranging day tours to nearby tourist places. Also, they suggested local eateries and must visit places. Overall very good experience and I highly recommend this hotel for Travellers to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We have stayed at the hotel 2 nights. Location was convenient,Near the Cathedral,Hoan Kiem lake and about 2 mins walk to the old town. The hotel was very clean and well organised. Reception staff was very helpful and friendly, and so was breakfast staff. Talking of breakfast- very good! Highly recommend this hotel.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is a must if in Hanoi. It is about 10 minutes away from The Old Quarter but is in a quieter area. This hotel has excellent beds and rooms. But breakfast is the most outstanding part of the experience. Displayed beautifully,fresh juices and fruits await you. There is a huge selection of breakfast ideas and everything is delicious! The staff are wonderful and cannot do enough for you. I cannot recommend this hotel enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel excellent location in Old quarter. The room, lobby, buffet breakfast, its all so nice. i had the  room view and it was great. staying in the hotel is very different experience as the staff is so good. you are linked with one executive for all your needs, for me MR Martin was the one point. overall all the staff was very friendly.

review.rating: An amazing to stay in the old city of Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Clean and tidy. We stayed for two nights during the weekend and you can enter the bustling streets for food and drinks right outside of the hotel. Breakfast was great with wide varieties and made to order egg dishes/pho soup. Staff is lovely!

review.rating: Great stay in the middle of everything
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location was exceptional.Martin and his staff were very friendly and accommodating. As the hotel was off a main street, it wasn't too noisy at night. The buffet breakfast was so delicious. The room was cosy and the beds were comfortable. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely come back!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Prime location 2 minute walk to St. Joseph, not too near the market area so nighttime was peaceful.

The staff were extremely helpful and friendly, we lost our phone and the staffs helped us with international calling.

Booked taxi via the airport through the hotel paid at property helped transitioned the transportation.

We are not picky about our rooms, which we think were decent based on the price - family room was connected with a hallway accommodated 5 adults.

review.rating: great to stay in old quarter of Ha Noi
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: location is good. small but neat and clean. people working there are nice and helpful
review.comment_negative: The person at front desk asked me to pay full when I checked in. we rejected and told him we will pay when we check out. and he accepted.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for 2 nights. The staff was very helpful providing us with suggestions for restaurants as well as sites to investigate. The hotel was steps away from the busy night life, but far enough to avoid any noise issues. The room was very clean and the bed was quite comfortable. Also, the breakfast was delicious, especially the Pho.

review.rating: The hotel is in general overated. This is a 3 stars hotel maximum. The staff is kind. Gd location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is great. The staff is kind
review.comment_negative: The hotel is clearly not a 4 stars. The breakfast is probably one of the worst breakfast i have seen in a 4 stars hotel. The main entry of the hotel is very old and not modern. Overall the hotel is really overated.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
The Hotel was a fantastic experience from start to finish. The rooms were beautiful, the restaurant was first class, but the overriding memory, will be the level of service from the outstanding staff who were brilliant. In particular the care and attention we received from Sabi was above and beyond all expectations, see was fantastic, and a real asset to the hotel.
Well done everyone.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cozy room in the center of Hanoi Old Town. Perfect location and welcoming staff! I would absolutely recommend it! The breakfast was also delicious. The AC was very appreciated and the bathroom was big and elegant.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: good location and important is the cleanliness and the services provided by staff. Nice place to stay. Good breakfast, helpful staff

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: My partner and I stayed at this hotel for just one night, and it turned out to be an great experience. Upon arrival, we were pleasantly surprised to find out that we had been upgraded from a deluxe to an executive room! The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive throughout our stay, making us feel truly valued as guests. What impressed us the most was their flexibility; they accommodated our request to extend our check-out time until 6pm for a small fee, allowing us to make the most of our time in the city. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable stay with top-notch service. We will definitely be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff, location
review.comment_negative: Pillows too thick and firm

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The staff were excellent and hotel great value for the Old City in Hanoi. I would recommend this to a friend and certainly stay at this Hotel if visiting Hanoi again

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very happy with my stay here. Highly recommend for large groups looking for more spacious accommodations. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful.Great buffet breakfast too!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: a localização é ótima
review.comment_negative: Quarto muuuito pequeno, elevador velho, café da manhã fraco. Estava com 3 malas e não cabia no quarto, mudei de hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, clean room and most importantly the staffs were awesome and great!They were super helpful and cheery. Even tried to help me order medicinal tea but unfortunately shop was closed sat and sunday. I should’ve mentioned it earlier.Thank you !!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Os funcionários são muitos atenciosos, localização perfeita.

review.rating: Excellent location , very clean & fantastic staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is great overall (the location, the room, the breakfast) - but what really made this hotel standout was the staff. Sabi, Martin, and  are Jame one of the best people I have met on my travels. It was so much fun spending time with them and I highly recommend you do too!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel and the center of old Quarter area. if you come to Hanoi and you wand good price quality here is the place to be. The staff are very friendly, helpful and professional. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. I would stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I love my stay in this hotel. Everything is so wonderful. I never had it in my life. Room is cozy and warm and so clean. Breakfast is so delicious. The most wonderful thing in here is the staff. All of them are so nice and helpful always ready to help you. Thank you very much!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, right behind the lake and next to the cathedral.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
+ Bett war bequem
+ Es gab einen Fön
+ das Frühstück war klasse
+ es war sauber, wurde jedoch zwischendurch nicht noch einmal gereinigt
+ man hat den straßenlärm nicht so gehört, da die fenster einigermaßen gut geschlossen haben
+ das Personal war sehr freundlich!!! 
+ es gab jeden tag pro person eine kleine Flasche stilles wasser
+ wäschereiservice war zuverlässig
review.comment_negative:
- fensterblick zur häuserwand
- zimmer ziemlich eng, jedoch zum schlafen ok
- zimmertür ist so dünn (obwohl es eine normale tür ist), dass man die anderen gäste hört
- das personal an der Rezeption war nicht informiert, wo es supermärkte gibt, wo man gut essen gehen kann etc
- es wäre nicht nötig gewesen jeden tag frische Handtücher hinzulegen. Was für eine Wasserverschwendung

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Super Kind hotel stuff, spa was nice. The given recommendations have been on point, whether nightlife or food, or sightseeing. Rooms were always clean and nice. Breakfast was very good. If you want a very beautiful location away from the noises around the old quarter that’s where you should go.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: ロケーション、コストパーフォーマンスが良い。中心地に近いが少し外れており静かに過ごせた。
review.comment_negative: 部屋が狭い。ホテルの紹介写真は違う広い部屋であり、予約した部屋とは全く違った。初めにわかっていれば、グレードアップを考えた。

review.rating: The perfect base to enjoy Hanoi Old Quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I love staying at this hotel! The room is spacious and clean. I booked a lake view room and the view is wonderful. The hotel is situated in a great location with easy access to some of the city's best attractions.  Cheers to the young staffs here. All of them are enthusiastic and helpful. Special thanks to Martin, who provide me with the food recommendations and fun conversation. I would definitely recommend it.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great stay at this hotel in Hanoi and it was also a great start to our 3 week trip to Vietnam. We loved the hotel and the staff. Sabi and went above and beyond. She has a lot of experience in trip planning and helped us to plan our Sa Pa and also Ha Long Bay trips. I had so many questions remotely via email and she responded always with a helpful tone.
We enjoyed the massages in the hotel and also the food tour. Breakfast had good variety.
The staff was like family. I would stay there again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Location was great
review.comment_negative: Didn't like the fact that we should have stayed here longer

review.rating: Excellent hotel location in old quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was beautiful but what made it stand out was the excellent service we received the entire time we stayed there. The staff were all so helpful and attentive. Several people went above and beyond!  Ms Sabi personally checked in with me often to see if I needed any thing and sent us off with a fruit basket because we checked out the night before and couldn’t enjoy the breakfast buffet, which by the way, was a very good breakfast buffet that we enjoyed every day for our seven day!

review.rating: 令人失望的住宿體驗, A disappointing accommodation exễprience, Một trải nghiệm lưu trú đáng thất vọng.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: 地點, position, địa điểm
review.comment_negative:
請注意，如果你預定的是行政套房，他們只會給你一間極小間的臥室房，反應後也只是換到一間稍大的房間，跟描述一樣不符合。

Cautions, if you booked an executive suite, they will only provide you with a very small bedroom, and even after raising the issue, they will only switch you to a slightly larger room, which does not align with the description.

Chú ý, nếu bạn đã đặt một phòng hạng executive, họ chỉ cung cấp cho bạn một phòng ngủ rất nhỏ, và ngay cả sau khi phản ánh vấn đề, họ chỉ chuyển bạn đến một phòng lớn hơn một chút, điều này không khớp với mô tả.

review.rating: Holiday not to be forgotten. Hanoi is a city full of life and the people are friendly.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
A fantastic hotel in a very central location.The staff were very friendly and helpful at all times. Our room was spacious and the bed large and comfortable. We had a very good buffet breakfast in the hotel restaurant.
I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi.

review.rating: We will come back next time !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I spent two nights in this hotel. The room I stayed is great. The facilities and the spa are excellent and the service is great as well. The staff are welcoming and helpful. It value for money.I will stay in this hotel again if I return to Hanoi in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is great. The location could not be better right next to the lake. The staff was so helpful and nice. Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: vị trí tốt, phòng nhỏ nhưng vẫn đầy đủ tiện ích

review.rating: Great Location, Good Service, Great Value for Money!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Ms Sabi who ran the place was helpful at every turn. We left luggage here when we arrived early before check in and until late when we left, used the bathroom and we really valued the service. The rooms were lovely with properly good bathrooms. Excellent location; we kept popping back while wandering around the Old Quarter. Also got our laundry done nice and quickly. I would definitely come back if I were back in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a fantastic stay here! The hotel is centrally located, in the heart of the hustle and bustle of beautiful Hanoi! Sabi was an exceptional host, making sure that everything was perfect! The rooms are comfortable and stylish, Restaurant has amazing views of the city and the breakfast delicious! Thank you to all of the staff for a memorable stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location is perfect

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best of this hotel is great service and lovely staff. Clean room, comfortable bed. Delicious breakfast. Would stay there again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel was just perfect. Everything you look for when traveling- great location, impeccable service, clean, quiet well-equipped rooms. If it’s within your budget, do not hesitate. Highlights included reception staff. They anticipate your every need. Their English is great. Breakfast was plentiful and tasted great. Beds were good and our request for a ‘flatter’ pillow was quickly accommodated. Most importantly, the lake and Catheral is half a block away. Please be sure to get up early at least one day to see what happens on the street and around the lake before 7am. Amazing experience!

review.rating: Very friendly and helpful staff at reception/breakfast.  Really enjoyed it as our Hanoi base.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
Good choice at breakfast - quick cooking/serving and good opening hours.

Rooms with proper balconies best - levels six and eight.

Handy location to sites in the old quarter and to eating places.
review.comment_negative: Laundry prices very high - used an online pickup service for 20% of the price.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We booked the superior room which had two queen beds and had more than enough space for our luggage. They had a good breakfast selection (a mix of western and asian food, several fruits, pancakes and breads, and you can ask to have your eggs cooked anyway you like). The staff service was excellent! In fact, I cant praise the hotel staff enough, especially at the front desk (both morning and night shift), who were were very friendly, helpful and went out of their way to make sure that we had everything that we needed. Keep up the great work! Oh and the front desk staff also gave great recommendation for our halong bay tour so would also recommend booking thru them instead of using other apps.

review.rating: Amazing luxurious stay in Hanoi, on a budget.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Thanks so much for helpful and your assistance during our staying , we enjoyed your services from first step into hotel until last step , breakfast is excellent and have special taste. Looking forward to staying with you all again

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel staff is really kind and helpful esp the lady at reception who was extremely understanding and kind to help us modify our booking. We are very grateful to her.Hotel location is not great as it is on a busy street. Overall a good stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Being a guest at this elegant, extremely well-run hotel was an absolute joy. Hotel staff was just incredible- communicative, attentive, helpful, pleasant. The rooms were spotless, and very comfortable. The daily breakfast had lots of wonderful local Vietnamese options as well as European to order. The professional masseuses at the spa were terrific and the shampoo massage was amazing. I can’t say enough in this review about how delightful this place is. The location was walkable to everything in the old city. I have travelled the world, stayed in many a hotel. This small, intimate boutique hotel, in chaotic, charming Hanoi, is a gem.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel was absolutely perfect for our stay in Hanoi. The hotel arranged for our pick up and drop off at the airport , which was seamless for a low additional cost. Our room was extremely spacious, beautiful, clean, with great amenities such as air conditioning and a fridge. We were given free bottles of water every day. The hotel location in the Old Quarter is perfect for exploring the city. The free hotel buffet breakfast was also delicious!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed for two nights plus on overnight cruise at Ha Long Bay. The location is excellent, close to eateries, bars, markets but very quiet.Facility is well decorated and maintained, practically new. Their lobby team is very attentive and accommodating. The Manager, Martin and his staff are very helpful and made us felt like at home.Hotel’s buffet breakfast has a lot of food choices and opens long enough to meet the needs of everyone’s travel itineraries. I highly recommend this hotel and thankful for Mr Martin excellent services. Well done!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had an amazing stay with super friendly staff. The buffet breakfast was delicious and coupled with the tourist tips from Martin (the best coffee and local shopping) it made for a great visit to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed here a total of 4 nights during our trip to Vietnam using it as our base, and found it to be excellent!
The staff from the front desk, through the kitchen, especially Sabi who was lovely, were always willing to help, and you were always greeted with a friendly smile. I happily recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: 整體來說，還不錯，環境乾淨，早餐普通，但是好吃

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay with Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The staffs there are also extremely nice, warm and friendly. Wished we stayed there longer, will definitely come back again if we're visiting Hanoi.

reviewer.name: Christina
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: Cozy stay in a good area
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: View from the restaurant was lovely! Staff were helpful and booked our tour!
review.comment_negative: Triple delux should be renamed to triple room, smaller than we thought.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel sehr zentral. Zimmer sauber, bissl eng, Betten gut. Bad super. Personal sehr freundlich.
review.comment_negative: Fenster quasi nicht vorhanden, führte in einen dunklen Schacht. Auf einer Zwischenebene neben unserem Zimmer war wohl der Aufenthaltsraum für das Personal. Dadurch herrschte immer mal wieder relative Unruhe, nicht dramatisch und auch nur tagsüber, allerdings wollten wir Schlaf nachholen, das war dann etwas schwierig.

review.rating: On the whole a value for money stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Good location with easy access to food and amenities.
Quality of breakfast is average
Room size is clamped with 2 single beds and our room has no window view (facing a wall)
review.comment_negative: We stayed 3 night in this hotel and on the last 3rd day, there was no room make up and we have to ask for a change of bath towels and toiletry

review.rating: Exceptional Location ( Near Cathedral and Lake )
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff was very helpful friendly and accommodating. Great location price reasonable. Will definitely book here again on my next visit

review.rating: Great location, most helpful staff ever
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff/Manager are amazing! We’ve gotten some of the best advice for staying safe and some really great hospitality. The location was super convenient and near really delicious shops, Cathedral and Lake.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: Great service. Clean room and helpful staff. The hotel located in hanoi old quarter and near Hoan Kiem Lake.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: Additional 3% charge if you want to pay by credit card

review.rating: Very good value, excellent customer service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutely fantastic value. Service from the staff, especially Martin Hotel manager. They took care of our day trip and travel bookings, making things incredibly easy for us. They even helped us with travel after we left their hotel! The room was big, clean, and pleasant, perhaps a bit dated. But there was nothing lacking!

review.rating: Comfortable once allowed in our room, uncomfortable whenever we had to leave.
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The property was clean enough and the location was fantastic. Most of the staff were really friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The bath gave off a funny smell if you used the spa facility. Upon arrival we were bombarded with excursion offers when all we wanted to do was go up to our room. The next days they would complain that we booked trips with other companies and each time claim how they could have got us the trip cheaper than they’d originally offered it for (I guess don’t try to rip us off in the first place?). This was only one member of staff who was really pushy but I guess it is his job to try and sell the trips? Finally, upon arrival they asked us to cancel our booking.com booking in exchange for refunding our taxi fee. This is definitely not something I felt comfortable in doing and they asked us 3 times in succession to do it. No means no!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I recently stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for 2 days. If you’re looking to be around Hoan Kiem Lake, I strongly recommend this hotel for its location. My room is clean and great views of the city as well. The front desk receptionist, Ms Phuong, was very welcoming upon my arrival. She was very friendly, helpful, and offered plenty of recommendations for what to see around the hotel. I hope to stay again in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed here for 3 days solo in the main room with balcony. Very friendly staff and room cleaned daily. They also organised my washing at a low price. The place is rather new and modern, meaning its a delight to come home to after walking around town. I recommend!

review.rating: très bien , personnel très gentils et sympathique
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative:
Attention si l'on doit repartir de l'hôtel en direction de l'aéroport. 
Le traffic est très dense autour de l'hôtel et de plus il y a une école donc à la sortie c'est très encombré, notre taxi est arrivé très en retard et dur dur pour être à l'heure à l'aéroport.  Prévoir au moins 1H30 à l'avance

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân làm việc ở mức tròn vai. Hồ bơi nhỏ nhưng cũng đủ dùng cho trẻ.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really couldn't of asked for more from our stay. The staff were so nice especially Martin, going out of there way to help as all opportunities. The breakfast is pretty impressive with everything you can imagine from sushi to pancakes. Rooms were big and clean, and then the location is fantastic  We would love to come back and stay again one day

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. The location is fantastic; right in the heart of everything and if a taxi was ever required, the staff were always more than happy to assist. Our room was exquisite, very clean and we loved the extremely comfortable bed and plush pillows. Wifi works well and is free. We will be recommending this property to all of our friends and family .

review.rating: Fabulous hotel walking distance to all the sites.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Location was excellent. 
Staff were helpful and friendly.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable hotel.All services were extremely perfect and we really enjoyed our holiday wonderfully. The hotel is in a great location, just a few minutes walk from the action. Service was excellent

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Ngay trung tâm thuận tiện đi bộ và đi các nơi

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: location
review.comment_negative: breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Vị trí đẹp gần hồ gươm và nhà thờ

review.rating: This will be our go to Hotel for Hanoi. Will not take a chance with other Hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Mr.Martin and his staff great job and very nice service. Kind and friendly staff. Very Helpful. Room very comfy and clean. Breakfast very nice and good spread. Location very Central and next to the old church. He organized a very good trip to Halong Bay for 2days 1night with reasonable Price. Very nice experience

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Cũng vui khi ở đây cùng bạn bè. Phòng có ban công là điểm cộng, dù hơi nhỏ.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: All good .

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Everything, yay! The facilities and the staffs are really nice and friendly. Will come back here once we have another chance to visit Hanoi again.
review.comment_negative: Nothing specific. Happy trip generally.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent experience! We spent three nights here on leisure and I must say that everything was amazing. The location of the hotel is close to the old quarter as well as the uncountable nice cafes in town. As for the room, even though being small but it was surprisingly comfortable. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others having a leisure trip, but a bigger room will be more suitable for those who comes in a big family. Last but not least, Martin and his team were really attentive at all times. They recommended us things to do in town as this was the first time we chose Vietnam to have a short gateway. Excellent stay overall

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Really nice staff - everyone was really helpful and welcoming. Sabi prepared a First aid Kit for us for our next destination.
 Quiet clean rooms with a soft bed for an amazing nights sleep with a Hot shower and a fantastic breakfast.
Overall, we really enjoyed our stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The hotel is at a good location next to the Cathedral, it's a walking distance to most sites and close to all the shopping street but it's quite around the hotel which is lovely .The staff was really helpful and polite, especially Ms Sabi, who was very helpful with booking our activities.The breakfast had many  options to choose from with a view of the Cathedral.The rooms were well equipped , we stayed in different room as we stayed here 3 different times .We loved the two single sharing as it was more spacious than the rest .

review.rating: I d go back this hotel again
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The room was clean, spacious and had great air con. The location of the hotel is also close to everything and the staff could not do more to help us. If you are looking for a great hotel experience in a prime location with value for your money, we highly recommend this hotel

review.rating: Great location for exploring old town and cafes and restaurants with helpful staff to assist where they can
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great location
Helpful friendly staff
Great breakfast
Comfy bed and room
review.comment_negative: Would have liked some more sitting areas - perhaps more use of the breakfast area once breakfast is over?

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Staff were lovely

review.rating: Pour arriver à l’hôtel nous avons été pris en charge par un taxi qui nous a emmené directement de l’aéroport a l’hôtel.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait. De la préparation du séjour où le personnel était disponible pour l’acheminement et faciliter nos demandes, à l’accueil où la gentillesse et la prévenance des employés étaient irréprochable.
review.comment_negative: Tout était très bien.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This boutique hotel will be our first recommendation for family and friends. The hotel and our room are well designed and chic. The Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was amazing, you could not expect more.. the food variety at breakfast buffet was yummy, we also love the fact that the hotel has two way air conditioning, if you must know Hanoi could be cold in the winter. And the big shower with its big shower head was indeed helpful for showering a little child, the bed was very comfy, my child has an extra bed in the room but most of the time she was sleeping in our bed, it was big enough for three of us... Thank you for everything! We would definitely come back!!!

review.rating: It was a pretty small hotel. For the price I’ve paid the experience was average.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: Aircon in our room started to make awful noises at the middle of the night

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located in the main business street. Impressived with professional and friendly staff. Luxurious room with wood as the main material, delicious Asian-European fusion breakfast. So many beautiful memories were saved and I can’t wait to come back again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: the location
review.comment_negative: Not very modern/refurbished

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I Enjoy my trip with my family and my relatives. The staffs in your hotel are very friendly and helpful. I am so satisfy with everything in your hotel. I hope that when I come back again , I will stay your hotel one more time. See you soon!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed 3 nights at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. The welcoming was great. The hotel is beautiful, the staff is so attentive and helpful. They were always friendly and supportive. Breakfast is very complete and tasty and they also have an amazing iced Vietnamese Coffee with which you should start your day ;) Beds are big and comfy, decoration is smart and cozy. We also booked with them the stay and tour in Sapa and a street food tour and cooking class in Hanoi. The experience in Hanoi was amazing. Both street food tour and cooking class were quite a experience and we enjoyed a very local feeling. We strongly recommend a stay in here on your journey through Vietnam.

review.rating: gran lugar muy bien atendido por Martín
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: muy bueno muy bien ubicado
review.comment_negative: todo ok

reviewer.name: Charmaine
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location- close to all the sights and eats in the Old Quarter plus we kept having to go back to the room to fetch stuff we forgot so added bonus, good breakfast options and helpful staff made our first few nights in Vietnam smooth
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: location is good.
review.comment_negative: The pillow have bad smell, I think Hotel didn't wash it carefully.   and the front desk person charge me much more money higher than my booking reservation, and I argue with him the reason and insist my stance, finally the amount is same as my expectation, but I feel uncomfortable.  and the photo on booking website is beautiful, but actually the level is just only average.

review.rating: Beautiful clean hotel in a gorgeous location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a wonderful stay. The hotel is new so the room is modern. The only downside of the room is that there is no blackout curtains & no body lotion provided in the tolietries. Location is good near Cathedral and Lake, with local food stalls & a supermarket around the corner. 5 min walk to Dong Xuan market. Good cafe downstairs. Breakfast is good, you can order from the al la carte menu & also have the buffet. Great service from the reception team especially Lily who is friendly, helped with a spa booking & reminded me on my deposit. Will stay here again if I return to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Martin and Phuong were both fantastic! They made sure our honeymoon stay was one of a kind with spa treatments, amazing buffet breakfast and first class hospitality. We recommend anyone staying in the Old Quarter to stay here!

review.rating: 저렴한 가격대비 좋은 룸 컨디션과 서비스!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 숙소 직원분들 너무 친절하시고, 저렴한 숙박비 대비 호텔 시설이 좋았습니다! 관광지와 맛집, 마사지 가게 등 주변에 갈 곳이 다양합니다. 숙소에서 제공하는 공항 핔업 유료 서비스도 만족스러웠습니다:)
review.comment_negative: 호텔 자체 시설(수영장이나 편의시설 등)이 없고 방음(객실 간 소음)이 조금 부실한것 같아요.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room excellent. All the staff were attentive and went above and beyond to help us in any way possible. The location is also one of the best in Old Quarter. Totally recommend Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel .

review.rating: Stylish hotel in a decent location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Being near food and attractions, the rooms were lovely and clean and we appreciated the free buffet breakfast! The location was great, within walking distance to the old quarter and close to many sights.Highly recommended for travellers looking to experience Vietnamese hospitality; Looking forward to a return stay soon.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Just fabulous. Amazingly attentive staff who simply cannot do enough for you throughout your stay. Breakfast is incredible. The rooms are very very clean, big comfortable bed and huge heavy pressured shower - just what you need after a day exploring hectic Hanoi.

review.rating: Great hotel in a fantastic location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is located one block from the lake. On weekends, the streets are closed for street vendors and pedestrians only. Martin our customer relations supervisor was excellent and she made sure our stay was comfortable and any complaints (we needed a stand up shower) and he arranged to have our room changed. The hotel staff are very friendly and accommodating to endure we had a great experience at the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Lheritage Diamond is a new  hotel in the heart of Hanoi, Old Quarter. Initially, we were choosing between La Passion and another hotel with more reviews in similar location. The service was homely, and all the staff are super friendly, accommodating and helpful. The hotel is clean and very value for money. Would definitely recommend my family and friends.

review.rating: Nice and good hotel - perfect located.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay in Hanoi. Hotel staff were all very friendly and helpful. Special mention to Hotel Manager Mr Martin who recommended places for us to go and took care of us when we were sick. Rooms are clean and facilities are nice. Breakfast spread is the best during our stay in Vietnam. Location is quite central to all the attractions and easy to get to. Will stay here again if we are back in Hanoi.

review.rating: Great location and Staff made us feel like special guests.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I have no words to express on how amazing the staff have been throughout our stay. The hotel room is big and very clean. . Good breakfast. Very efficient and genuinely helpful staff. A special shout out to Mr Martin at the front desk who helped us everything. He helped us with the tour to Ha Long Bay and that was extremely comfortable and excellent. This hotel has everything a traveler needs. The hotel is situated in the best possible location and I cannot stop complimenting on how gentle and friendly all the staff are. I cannot wait to return back and stay with this property.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really enjoyed this stay. Very reasonable price. The bed was huge and very comfy. We slept really well. Air conditioning was good and very helpful staff.  We’d happily come again!

review.rating: Excellent hotel in Old Quarter Central!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Me and my friend stayed there for 3 nights. We got 2 rooms and they were both big, nice and very clean with big bathroom, hot shower. The staffs were very happy and helpful with any travel interest. We are happy to recommend this hotel to everyone

review.rating: Service and comfort with wonderful staff and the warmest smiles around.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Although there are many lovely hotels in Hanoi Old Quarter, this GEM really hits it out of the park. Nicely decorated rooms, very quiet for sleeping, great breakfast, great restaurant staff & managers and everyone was extremely attentive. Not sure of my next trip to Hanoi, but I would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: Perfect location with fantastic service in a safe/clean environment
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great service in the breakfast time and room service. Always give us a big smile and give helping hands to us. The staffs of here are really patience to us when we asked a lot of questions. The room and the toilet also very clean. I'm really appreciate to it! Thanks to all the staffs of Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!

review.rating: A stone's throw away from St Joseph's Cathedral
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Unbeatable location, just a stone's throw away from St Joseph's Cathedral. It's in the rather glamorous 'French Quarter' area of town - and easy walking distance from most other sights/famous streets in the Old Quarter.

The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Ms Sabi's personalised recommendations for my visit to Sapa were very much appreciated!

It was also a more upmarket hotel than other (cheaper) Hanoi hotels we had stayed at - we decided to treat ourselves to a bit of luxury. 

Amazing views from the restaurant where breakfast is served!
review.comment_negative:
The air-conditioning units in the rooms are very noisy. I don't blame the staff, who promptly offered us a different room when we raised the issue (they agreed that the first room had very loud vibrations/buzzing noises which seemed to be coming in through the vents.) 

It must be said though that even in the second room we moved to, the air-conditioning unit was still a bit on the noisy side - I'd never experienced air-conditioning that noisy in other hotels. Something for the hotel to look into - it wasn't a disaster but did spoil the atmosphere a bit (and bothered my partner a little at night).

Other than this, both rooms were a little smaller than we expected - but to be fair we got a great price deal on booking.com for what is otherwise a fairly upscale hotel, so it still felt like decent value.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: A beautiful, comfortable hotel with amazing staff members who only want you to have the best time. The buffet breakfast in the restaurants was great and the spa was pure pleasure! Thank you for making my stay so enjoyable!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Reception ouverte 24/24 .
Petit déjeuner au top!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located in the very convenient area. The bed in the Presidential Suite was very comfortable. The room was spacious and clean. Food was great. Staff were very helpful and attentive. They often volunteered to help us. We are glad we picked the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel for our first trip to Hanoi. Highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We especially appreciated Martin who greeted us on arrival and gave us some excellent suggestions on places to visit and all the hotel amenities. The friendliness of all the staff and the comfort of the hotel made our last night in Vietnam very enjoyable. We were also able to book a airport transfer for a reasonable price.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Location. Next to the Cathedral church and Old Quarter.
review.comment_negative:
We booked two executive suites which are shown in booking.com 32m.sq. Instead we have got pf the room just simple double within 15 m.sq max. It was so uncomfortable and small. 
To recompense the hotel offered free airport transfer.
However we didn’t like the hotel at all, the rooms look much older than on the pictures, most of the furniture should be replaced, as well as repair is required in the common areas.
At another room with found bleed marks on the bed linen.
Thankfully we stayed only one night.

review.rating: Amazing service & location in Old town!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, walkable distance from most places in Old Quarter. The staff including Sabi and James were very helpful, they gave us local food recommendations and would help you with day tours if needed.The room was also comfortable, breakfast was really good. We would recommend a short stay here, given how wonderful the staff were, the location, the breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Thank you for Martin with his valuable customer service. Before arrival, when I informed him on the changes of flight, he was already aware the timing changes. I let the hotel managed the transport transfer fully. Their collaborating driver, Mr Huy is very nice too. Upon arrival, we were welcomed and he shared where and what we can do. We felt safe in their hands.
review.comment_negative: When we checked into our room, there was a big folded bed right outside, and we were next to the staircase. With young children, I feel the path should be unblocked. If missed a step, might fall off the stair and this is part of escaped route from rooms towards staircase too.

review.rating: Comfortable and convenient stay in the heart of old Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really friendly and helpful staff, provided help with local travel options and guides as well as organising our tour to the Halong Bay!
review.comment_negative: Rooms a bit small but they are good given how centrally located the hotel was.

review.rating: Fun stay in good rooms in great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location and good price.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast fruit, fruit juice and coffee all finished by 9am  and not replenished. 
Staff not  interested if you’re not buying excursions.

review.rating: Có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời cho gia đình tại Hà Nội
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Vị trí rất thuận tiện cho đi lại, ăn uống và đi tham quan các điểm du lịch đặc trưng tại Hà Nội.

review.rating: We felt extremely well treated here, truly recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfect stay… ideal location, very good value for money. Staff really helpful, maps and information available from reception. couldn’t have asked for more! Would recommend this hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff are extremely prompt and provide you prompt help when they spot you need one. Even at 12 am in the night one of the staff members rushed in to help us with the luggage. Hotel is at a perfect location and extremely clean. Breakfast is yummy especially their homemade jams.

review.rating: Excellent location in Old Quarter central!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location is glorious with lots of places to visit close buy, eat, shop and explore. Hotel is so gorgeous with plenty arts to enjoy and learn the artists. Shout out to their reception! Top services! Top Class Front Desk that takes care of every single details. I would go back to Hanoi just to stay in this hotel again!! Well done.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is ideal, facilities are clean, the beds comfortable, Buffet breakfast tasty and filling. But what really stands out is the staff - they go above and beyond to make your stay great. They always offered to carry my bag to my room when I arrived , always asked what my plans are and where I'm traveling, and were happy to help whenever I needed it. They also gave me breakfast early because my bus left before they opened the breakfast buffet! Thank you Lheritage Diamond Hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It’s easy to be good when things are going well. The staff were fantastic: everyone was polite, knew who we were, and worked efficiently together. Each member communicated with other members so you didn’t have to keep reexplaining yourself. If you are going to Hanoi, stay here. And if you aren’t happy with something, let them know, they will fix it.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It’s very convenient n everything is within walking distance. The staff service is excellent n very pleasant. Would recommend to friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Excellent!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful time at Hanoi L'heritage Diamond Hotel. I had booked a superior room with window, but we were upgraded to a Deluxe room with city view, The room was perfectly quiet despite the street. The large bed was super comfortable. The staff  was very helpful. The central location of such a good and affordable hotel makes it an ideal choice.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
מלון מאוד מרכזי,חדר מקסים גדול עם מרפסת גדולה לרחוב,ארוחת בוקר נהדרת.
מרטין מנהל המלון עזר המון בהזמנת שייט ונהגים, ובכלל כל הצוות מאוד שירותי ואמין.
ממליץ בחום,לא תתאכזבו.
review.comment_negative: שום דבר,הכל נפלא

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed 2 nighs at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond  and we all had an amazing experience. The hotel is located in a quiet side street, right in the middle of the Old Quarter, with everything within walking distance. All our rooms had aircon, comfortable beds and pillows, and large modern bathrooms with great water pressure. All the staff on the Imperial team were professional and friendly and gave great advice on restaurants, cafes and tourist sights to ensure we experienced Hanoi in its fullest. Will come back if ever in Hanoi!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Friendly staff looking after a well priced, comfortable hotel. Shout out to the entire team at the hotel.
Well located hotel with staff well connected to what’s going on around town.
The hotel had all you could wish for with clean comfortable rooms. Great foot massage to round off a tough day of walking.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel's staff are very friendly and kindness, The room is very clean. Good service and staffs are so nice. Vote 5*.  Appreciated for their kindness, very impress and getting back to stay with them if having a chance to go to Hanoi next time for sure!

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
Sự phục vụ tận tình của nhân viên 
Nhiều thứ vượt qua mong đợi
review.comment_negative: Nhân viên quá đẹp trai

review.rating: The best hotel location in middle of old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location. Comfy bed. Great breakfast. Welcoming and friendly staff. Everything you need ! Special thanks to all staff for taking care with smile.

review.rating: Good convenient location, more peaceful than most
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great boutique hotel! Great location! and the staff was very friendly!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
نظيف وقريب من السنتر والبحيره والاماكن والخدمات السياحيه
الموظفين ودودين للغايه ويسعون لخدمه النزلاء .
review.comment_negative: الغرفه ليست واسعه وانما متوسطه او اقل .. السعر مرتفع نوعاً ما ..

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at Lheritage Diamond hotel & Spa. The staff were ever so nice, attentive and welcoming. We also loved the breakfast every morning, great selection of food and all very delicious. Location is perfect. Walking distance to all main attractions and we therefore didn’t spend any money on getting around, as we just walked around the city.
The hotel can also organise day trips which we booked and it all went very smoothly. We definitely felt looked after and safe. Thank you very much to all the staff and a special thank you to the Hotel manager that welcomed us and also brought me birthday cake! Thank you!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel, room, great hospitality. Will come back again. Central and great hotel, lovely location. All staffs friendly and cheerful . To name Martin, Sabi, James. Yummy fresh fruits and breakfast.

review.rating: Suprisingly excellent stay for a very fair price
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What a wonderful hotel! The location is excellent, the rooms are great, food is fresh but most importantly, the staff are incredible. Nothing is too much, they were incredibly helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. This would be our go-to anytime we are in Hanoi. Highly recommended!

review.rating: Perfect location, nice food, competitive price
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: New bathroom and large shower area, nice breakfast, very competitive price, friendly staff, accommodate a double bed and a single bed, excellent location. We will stay here again should we return to Hanoi next trip
review.comment_negative: Bedroom size a bit small, but perfectly normal in the Pho Co old town Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Thought we had a bathtub but turns out only grand suite has it. Had a balcony view instead and room was clean and well maintained. Breakfast was pretty standard but nicely made. Many thanks to Martin for recommending street food and our other requests promptly.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: decorated the room for amour anniversary. nice big room. comfortable bed. great staff. great location.

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in the old quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a lovely stay in the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. Mr Martin was very helpful and friendly. The hotel was in a great location. There was a great selection for breakfast. Rooms were very clean. Would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location, comfy bed, hot shower with good water pressure. Special shout out to Hung Anh, Phuong and Martin…thanks for your help and friendly, welcoming smiles!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel staff are very helpful and friendly. location is close to the night market and lake where most people gather there .Everything was perfect .

review.rating: Nice place to stay in center
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Almost new hotel, very clean, everything works. Staffs are very polite and helpful. Will come back next time

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Perfecto, todo muy bien y cómodo

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.rating: Great location in centre old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very nice  rooms and the hotel serves up a fantastic breakfast that changes up the hot food selection in the buffet line. Excellent service by the very friendly staff. 10/10 will stay again.

review.rating: Great hotel in Hanoi Old Town!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond was superb. The team looked after us through our three days with them, they even arranged a cake for my sons birthday during the Halong bay cruise and upon our return they had decorated our room and left cakes for my wife’s birthday a really nice touch. The staff were very knowledgable on restaurants and things to do in and around Hanoi. The hotel is well located on the edge if the old quarter and close to the attractions. The rooms were very clean everything worked so we’re well worth the money we paid. I would definitely recommend the royal to anyone coming to Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: vị trí trung tâm, gần càng hàng quán ăn uống, bờ hồ, nhân viên nhiêt tình, lịch sự. khách sạn sạch sẽ.
review.comment_negative: phòng bé xíu, so với giá tiền thì không có gì đặc biệt. Cách âm hơi kém.

review.rating: An absolute treasure of a centrally located.bout boutique style hotel. Amazing views from restaurant
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent from check in to check out. I used their airport transportation pick up service which was great. No issues. The room was comfortable, and very nice touches like a note and rose pedals. Bed was very comfortable. Buffet breakfast was excellent! Also the hotel is right next to Cathedral and Lake which was very convenient .  Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: das frühstück ist für ein 4 ster hotel zu dürftig. keine Brotauswahl, kein Käse.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff (M/s Martin, Sabi, James etc) were super friendly and helpful. Apart from assisting to secure bus tickets to Sapa, they even communicated and welcome before we departed for Hanoi… how amazing !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is a real treat - super stylish, comfortable,  lovely staff and in a great location, delicious breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình

review.rating: A wonderful place to stay in Hanoi!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location! We went to Halong bay in between our stay! We were able to leave our luggage with hotel! The breakfast was sensation best we had in Vietnam! Staff were friendly. Would definitely stay again!
