review.rating: Great hotel at a great price
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I appreciated what they've done to my room. They kept their house cleaning constantly. And also , as a guest, you are well-valued and treated not just a guest but also assumed to be part of their hotel like a closed friend. It's highly recommended..

review.rating: Very impressive hotel, with staff delivering a seemless experince.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for a few nights and was our first hotel in Vietnam, it really set the standards high as it was great! Location is fantastic (right next to lake and cathedral) and only a few mins walk to the lake and central Old Town. The breakfast is amazing with lots of vietnamese options available.

review.rating: Excellent Service, Great Staff, Overall great stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Went with family and had a great time staying here! Breakfast was really nice and rotates daily with a variety of local favourites! The staff were so friendly and assisted us over our entire stay! They were patient and helpful and my parents really liked them!! Thank you so much for this amazing trip

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This beautiful hotel in  Hanoi. Very nice room . Reception and the rest of the staff were amazingly helpful.! The location was outstanding. It's close to the lake and red bridge. There are many excellent restaurants within a few minutes walk from the hotel. We highly recommend this hotel.

review.rating: Wonderful stay, made easy with helpful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The property was in an extremely convenient location, right in the middle of Old Quarter which means it was an easy walk to main attractions and eateries. Further, staff was extremely knowledgeable and friendly, helping in all aspects from booking tours to suggesting local foods.

review.rating: Great location in the old quarter
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and spacious, the staff where considerate and helpful. I am a fussy traveler and I would rate them. Thank you guys for making our trip comfortable.

review.rating: Centrally located & reasonably priced for a quality hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location in the center of Hanoi, walking distance to all the attractions. There was of plenty of food options close by and the hotel restaurant and rooftop bar also high quality. Rooms were clean and well equipped. Would stay again

review.rating: The best hotel location in Old Quarter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen

The hotel is also very well maintained, absolutely clean. I will definitely come back and recommend the hotel to other travelers. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Perfect location in the heart of Old Quarter. Easy walk to everything we wanted to see but on a side street so much quieter than other hotels nearby. The room were perfect . The staff welcomed us the moment we entered and oriented us with the city making recommendations without being pushy. Rooms were pristine and bathrooms are spacious!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Martin and all the team at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond welcomed us with open arms! They were very helpful and always helped us with recommendations! The room and hotel facilities were clean and comfortable. Most importantly the location is excellent and is within a few minutes walking distance to all main attractions in the Old City.

review.rating: we had a great stay getting around was good
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: location was perfect, staff brilliant,
review.comment_negative: breakfast could have been a lot hotter

review.rating: Luxury Boutique Hotel , Personal & Welcoming Staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It was my first visit to Ha Noi and stayed at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond. The facilities and cleanliness were at the best. The whole staff  were very friendly and helpful. Every time, if i needed any help or guidance, they would give me the best recommendations.  Above all, the location of the hotel is such that all the best restaurants, shops and bars, are at walking distance. Next time, I visit Ha Noi, I will definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, beautiful rooms,  with the best views from restaurant with delicious food and the staff and manager were the best.Always there to help and gave the best advice.Highly recommend this for all traveller's.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel is conveniently located and the staff is very welcoming.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great hotel, best location. Receptionist was very helpful and accommodating. They can speak good English. Hotel staff were perfection. I highly recommend staying in this hotel if you want to experience good quality hotel service. The room very clean with comfortable bed. Thank you!

review.rating: Great hotel location in old quarter central!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stay here for 1 day only but we got the upgraded room by Martin ( Hotel Manager ) .We ordered Special Halal food for Muslim and the food is very good for us. we will definitely come back again and recommend to my friends .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We experienced this hotel in the middle of the old quarter . Great location, close to food street and walking to the lovely lake. The front desk again were charming, very helpful with which way to walk, how to get across the road and really useful travel information. If you’re looking for a hotel it’s here, you won’t regret this gem.

review.rating: Just a wonderful place to stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located right next to the local street, the rooms are clean and the staff is just amazingly welcoming and helpful. Had a wonderful stay for 2 days. Got my entire trip planned by Sabi who’s more than sweet and accommodating to ensure I had a great experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We made the perfect choice in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. It was truly a home away from home. They made us feel so comfortable, safe and special. We love the hotel staffs . This is really a star hotel for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had a fantastic stay here! The hotel is centrally located, in the heart of the hustle and bustle of beautiful Hanoi! Sabi was an exceptional host, making sure that everything was perfect! The rooms are comfortable and stylish, the restaurant has amazing views of the city and the breakfast delicious! Thank you to all of the staff for a memorable stay!

review.rating: A wonderful hotel, great location and amazing staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We liked everything about this hotel. It had a lovely feel to it mixing traditional Vietnamese styling with more contemporary ideas. Its location is perfect for walking around the Old Quarter of Hanoi,  and Hoan Kiem lake. To go further afield choose cyclotrot transport which are readily available or use the Hop on hop off Tour buses which are located nearby. Our welcome was most friendly with the receptionists offering to help with arrangements. ALL staff were charming, helpful and attentive, including the Manager who took time to acknowledge our visit. We strongly recommend this hotel to anyone wishing to stay in Hanoi.

review.rating: Good location and great place to stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wonderful stay as this new hotel. Amazing location, lots of great places to eat in very local area. Great neighborhood, felt very comfortable walking around at all times. Hotel clean, super comfortable beds and great breakfast, Spa a lovely bonus on site. However what made this trip was the amazing staff, delightful, chatty, knowledgeable and went out of their way to make our stay very special. Appreciated upgrade to bigger room after our trip to Halong bay - couldn't recommend this hotel more!

review.rating: I highly recommend this hotel. Great location in the middle of old town close to lake.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Amazing services, good English provided by all the staff at this hotel. The front desk officers are being very helpful and professional in providing advises and suggestions in the local delicacies and some hidden gems that only local knows. I would like to express my appreciation to the hotel staffs, especially Mr. Martin and Sabi for giving is good services during my stay in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Stayed at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond as it was convenient and offered good value. But having stayed here for the week I was really able to enjoy the warm and friendly welcome from reception as I left for work and welcomed back in the evening like I was coming back home. The staff in the restaurant at breakfast were great too! Warm and friendly welcome and cooked breakfast quickly. My whole stay was great and will return the next time I am in Hanoi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends and colleagues. The staff are so hospitable and kind to foreigners. The value for money is excellent as well.This hotel was located in the market, hence very near to all the shopping, touristic destination. I would definitely come back.

review.rating: Hands down best hotel in Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent Hotel if you like easy access to Food and Bar. In the heart of Old Quarter. The staffs  are friendly and helpful.a location close to everything, and a cheap price compared to the facilities. Recommendation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Centrally located, very good value for money and with absolutely incredible staff. so attentive and accommodating. we also booked all of our tours through the hotel and got a great deal on all of them. they also organised our airport transfers. the Ha Long bay cruise was particularly good, from talking to other people on the cruise we paid considerably less and got better transfers (limousine bus instead of big coach) breakfast is made to order with a great view. would recommend.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Staff was so friendly. The breakfast was amazing, the best Pho I had in Vietnam. The rooms were clean and very comfortable.

review.rating: Excellent unique hotel in great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We liked everything at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. The room was clean and the food in the restaurant was good. All the staff was really helpful and Phuong was always friendly and available to help us if we had questions. The location was very good to visit the highlights of the city.

review.rating: A solid option for the old quarter Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel room was very nice and the bed comfortable, the breakfast very various and tasty, the staff very kind and helpful. The location is also very good, 2 min on foot to the centre, I recommend to go to this hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Déjeuner correct. Pas de chocolat pr les enfants. Emplacement central apprécié.
review.comment_negative: Etre au 9è étage, soit disant pour avoir une vue alors que puisque la salle des petits déj est au 10è et que pour y aller l'ascenseur doit s'arrêter au 9 et que tt le monde fini les marches à pied, très bruyant à partir de 6.30 ce qui est parfait pr les lève-tôt. Fort désagréable quand on cherche à aller jusqu'à 7h30 un dimanche matin. Durant la journée on entend les personnes en charge du room service s'envoyer leurs instructions par la colonne d'escalier...

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Simpatia dos funcionários, muitos atenciosos e prestativos, excelente localização

review.rating: credit card pay will be charged 3% !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: no view

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: die Lage
review.comment_negative:
direkt nach unserer Ankunft, bevor wir überhaupt das Zimmer gesehen haben,sollten wir mit einer Stornierung bei booking mit einem kostenlosen Transfer zum Flughafen geködert werden
Zimmer entsprach nicht der Buchung 
nach Beanstandung bekamen wir von unterschiedlichen Mitarbeitern Zimmer angeboten, für die wir wesentlich mehr bezahlen sollten 
reinigungspersonal entsorgte meine Thermos Trinkflasche
bei jedem passieren der Rezeption wurde ich darauf angesprochen, doch bitte den Spa Bereich zu buchen

insgesamt hinterlässt dieses Hotel einen sehr üblen Nachgeschmack bei mir
eine Meldung an booking erfolgte

review.rating: Our best hotel/customer care service ever
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Of the hotels we stayed at in Vietnam, this was by far our favorite! The staff, rooms, drinks, everything was exceptional. And you really can't beat the location! Couldn't recommend this place more. Our only regret is that we didn't stay here longer.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is wonderful. It is in a fantastic location, the hotel is Beautiful and the rooms are clean and spacious and very comfortable. The best thing however is the amazing service- it is beyond expectations. They are so attentive and helpful and go the extra mile to ensure you have a wonderful stay. We had checked out but left our bags there whilst we went to Halong Bay. On returning even though we were no longer staying at the hotel they gave us drinks and towels and kept our bags until the evening when our transport arrived. The manager was very helpful in giving us ideas of places to go. I would absolutely recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Newly opened hotel with luxury interior design. Great location near to food street, beer street, Hoan Keim Lake, etc. Friendly staffs and really explained to details on nearby attractions and food recommendations.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything is comfortable for me such as location to find and call gab taxi to pickup. I can walking a minute to St. church and lake. Also, Cong coffee shop and restaurant. However, Staffs are very good & nice. Thank you!

review.rating: I am very much glad to stay here .
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The accommodation was clean & comfortable and the location was great. Staff were really friendly & spoke English which definitely helps makes things a bit easier when you’re in another country!! The breakfast was excellent, with different selections provided each morning including beautiful fresh fruit. Thank you!!!

review.rating: Cared for customer appreciates hotel staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel, excellent service, special thanks to Sabi for all she arranged for us! Great location, great rooms. You must check this place out when you are visiting Hanoi. In the middle of the old city and all the staff so, so kind!! Real hospitality

review.rating: The staff were excellent, all so helpful.  Great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great location, comfortable bed and quiet room.
Also the breakfast was good and there was a good view.

review.rating: Excellent location in Hanoi Old Quarter centre
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: "I have plan come Vietnam after virus Corona end. I have plan come Hanoi and stay with Lheritage Diamond this nice hotel and friendly staff , bed very comfortable, Martin is best friend he help me booking trip to Ha Long bay and Ninh Binh,bus to Ha Giang. I would like recommend this one to anyone. I will come back again."

review.rating: Wonderful hotel in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: From out side on arrival I had my doubts but once inside my mind was changed. Nice staff, clean, really comfortable bed, large room and my partner loved the bath tub. Only down side was the breakfast could have been better. Would recommend and as for the price it is very nice

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Comfortable beds Best for those who do not value aesthetic as much but would want a good, clean bed.
review.comment_negative: Smell of the bathroom was off. You can hear the water running from the other bathrooms. You can also smell cigarette smoke either in the hallway or bathroom. But the shower and water pressure are fine. Breakfast was a bit sloppy.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The family room very spacious.
review.comment_negative: Nil

review.rating: Nice Boutique Hotel with a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable hotel in a great location with an absolutely lovely crew of people working there. We were in and out of Hanoi in Jan 2024 and spent a total of 2 nights at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond,Hotel is nice. Would definitely go back. Thanks and love to Martin and Sabi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
From being the best position in the city, to the warm welcome from the doormen and receptionist on the desk. Left at 5:30 yesterday and they insisted on giving us a picnic breakfast. Breakfast on the roof terrace is lovely. The front desk booked us into the best restaurant in town at the Metropole and tried to get us into the Opera. Not their fault it was booked out.
Manager very proactive telling us about the luxury sleeper train to Da Nang when he heard we planned to visit Ninh Binh by train for the the day. Great room with city view and excellent service when there was a problem with the TV. Many thanks.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Our stay at this hotel was fantastic. It is very comfortable and beautifully located. The breakfast is delicious. The staff are exceptional. Thanks to Martin and his three colleagues on the team who were fantastic. Well done to them!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Die Lage vom Hotel, Einrichtung vom Zimmer
review.comment_negative:
anderes Zimmer bekommen als gebucht, Personal hat das fehlerhafte Zimmer als Hochwertig Delux Zimmer beworben.
Papierwände, sehr laute Zimmer, Wasserleitungen ab/zuläufe laufen hinter Kopfteil Bett lang.

review.rating: best location. best staff. they are helpful
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: For what you pay this hotel is great value. Staff and service were excellent, rooms clean and comfortable beds.The location is central of old quarter. I would definitely recommend staying here.

review.rating: This was best choice for budget and terrific staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a great boutique hotel in the heart of the old quarter. The deals you can get are terrific BUT what makes this place special is the heart and soul that you get from a staff whose sole mission is to make you happy.  I tell you they will help you with anything you need and then some.  A shout out to Ms Sabi who was my guardian angel when my visa didnt come through and I had to cancel some bookings she made for me. Plus all the good advice she gave. Me in the area. And to mgr mr Martin Do who also worked his magic. But the rest of staff will make you feel like your family.  When I come back to hanoi. I will stay here again
review.comment_negative: Nothing. Location was great, room and hotel very clean

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This hotel is excellent. The service and staff were great, the hotel is beautiful. Our room was very nice and when informed about an issue that was not their fault the staff did everything to make it right. the staff at the front desk are so warm and friendly and made the trip worthwhile. Would highly recommend staying here in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Staff were very helpful and kind. Breakfast was plenty and pleasant.
review.comment_negative: Lighting in room was difficult for leaving low light on all night to navigate to bathroom

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: All the staff are incredibly kind and friendly. They are rightly proud of both their hotel and community. This is a great place to stay. I would recommend without hesitation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel location in Hanoi Centre of old quarter .Clean, attractive decor, food great? Very efficient, staff always ready to greet you at the door. no matter how busy it is at reception. Special mention about Nora at buffet breakfast very friendly and helpful.

review.rating: Excellent hotel location- Cathedral and Hoan Kiem Lake
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff and excellent hotel. Located in the Old Quarter with good breakfast and highly recommended.Nice rooms and a safe box for safety with options for complimentary breakfast.Overall a nice hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Tout est bien organisé,  lit confortable,  salle de bains grande, petit déjeuner variés.
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.rating: Great boutique hotel in the centre of the action
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Comfortable hotel with excellent service. We only ate breakfast here as so many great places within walking distance, but it was great. Perfect location for sight seeing including nearby night market, and many restaurant , great street food. Staff all very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Loved hotel. We only got to stay here for two night as we were catching a train to SaPa the next day but we really wished we could stay longer! Lovely air conditioned room with super comfy beds, and an incredible included breakfast with fresh baked goods, omlettes, assortments of cheeses and yogurts - anything you could want. All the staff were very friendly and helpful as well. Thank you for the wonderful stay

review.rating: Clean place. Lovely staff.. but could not sleep due to noise from aircon unit outside window.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Clean and super friendly staff. Breakfast was ok too.
review.comment_negative: I stayed in room 702 which had 2 aircon condenser units outside my window from upstairs. I couldn’t sleep as the condenser units were extremely noisy throughout the night.

review.rating: Cảm thấy không thoải mái khi nghỉ tại khách sạn này.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân nhiệt tình, thái độ tốt. Vị trí của khách sạn rất thuận tiện đi lại.
review.comment_negative: Nhân viên dọn phòng không chuyên nghiệp. Khăn tắm và chăn gối rất cũ. Sắp xếp thiếu cả gối ngủ trong phòng.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely staff, they have the warmest smile and are very supportive. The hotel is at perfect location near to the Hoan Kiem lake, inside the Old Quarter. The breakfast buffet has a variety of selections to choose from. Would come back here again

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Elegant boutique hotel. Conveniently located in the old quarter. Fantastic, attentive and helpful staff from the doormen, front desk staff. Use them to get an unbiased understanding on the hidden gems of the old quarter, The room was comfortable and clean. Excellent value for money. Thank you!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for 2 x nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The hotel is in a great location near lots of restaurants and the old town centre. Service was outstanding, particularly  Sabi on the front desk who was very helpful and accommodating. Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: So good that you would have thought you've entered a 4 star hotel! Mr Martin and Phuong ,They are very attentive and they do everything possible to make your stay / activities go according to your plan. Bought tickets to the water puppet show on our behalf, make last min (1 hour before showtime) changes, pack breakfast for us to have it while on the airport, clean room, good location, assist to send our items to HCM... and the list just goes on..It was a perfect stay for us!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff, perfect location to explore Hanois old town and tasty breakfast. Also offer laundry service, which was needed after sweaty days. We have nothing to complain about. Would stay there again next time I visit beautiful Hanoi.

review.rating: Great Hotel in the Old Quarter of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Room: good size, comfy bed, clean, nice decor
Location: really good. near the Hoankiem lake and Cathedral- also about 5 mins walk to the night market and other nice restaurants
Staff: so friendly and helpful! Really made our stay lovely Breakfast: this was the stand out for us - great choices, freshly made eggs, nice coffee, fruit, yogurt 10/10
If come back again in Hanoi, I must stay in Hanoi Lheritage Diamond hotel.

review.rating: Worth traveling the world just for this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location and place. What I praised about is « service ». Really enjoyed stay there. The staff, especially Martin was super kind , helpful and supportive. Really recommend these place.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every staff in the hotel is being nice to the travelers. Especially the reception crew. The breakfast is delicious. And they also provide free manicure services. The location is good, near to all the nice restaurants and the famous attractions. Highly recommend it to anyone who wants to stay in Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great stay overall. Staff was very friendly and helpful. The airport pick up and tours they arranged were also great. Location is great and sites, shops, restaurants, etc are very walkable. Hotel is secure. Internet connection was very good at times and average at other times. Room was clean and comfortable. I would recommend staying here

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Hanoi Lheritage diamond hotel with great location is a little tricky to find is inside Old quarter centre .
Restaurant and Breakfast staff are very caring and nothing is a problem.. The facilities are great. Condition is good. Staff service is excellent. I love the cozy and warm vibe at the lobby. It's chill in the early morning and late night. Would definitely come back.

review.rating: One of the best experience I’ve encountered!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent location, great front of house staff, very helpful tracking down a bag left in a taxi, loved the breakfast omelettes and fresh fruit.I forgot that I had mentioned we were celebrating our honeymoon during our stay and to our surprise, our suite was decorated with balloons and flowers! Very thoughtful and friendly staff, we will be coming back because of the service we received from our stay.

review.rating: The best hotel location in Hanoi Centre
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Incredible hotel. We absolutely loved it here, it is very beautiful. The staff are very attentive and polite, they even went the extra mile to wish my partner a happy birthday and bring a big cake to our room! The decor and art are fantastic and also I’ve never had a breakfast that is preceded by a cheese and bread course! We loved it though, all the food we ate there was great. Definitely visiting again next time we’re in Hanoi!

review.rating: I would recommend the hotel - great location gives you all the best from Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: As we had tiny rooms without a view it's hard to praise it. But the location was great, staff as well. It was really value for money. And the staff turned out to be great with help after I left some items... I am very greatful for that!
review.comment_negative: no view and the size of the apartment were challenging.

review.rating: New hotel and best location in Hanoi Old Quarter central.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I stayed there in May 2023,  and  I  having a great time. The room interior was very pretty with flower assortment. The furniture was antique. The welcome  Lotus tea were so good. The breakfast Vietnamese - Inter buffet was very delicious. The lady at the front door was amazingly attentive. She helped me find a taxi company no to be overcharged. I definitely want to go back when visiting Vietnam. Thank you so much.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: I highly recommend this hotel when staying in Hanoi. The staff is very lovely, friendly, and helpful. The rooms and decor are very beautiful and spacious. They were kind enough to upgrade our room without even asking. I want to mention special thanks to all the staff at hotel, especially Martin, Jame and Sabi... They are very welcoming and make you feel special from the moment you arrive. This hotel and service exceeded my expectations. Will definitely come back again!

review.rating: Great location and lovely decor. Very comfortable.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It is in an excellent location. Walking distance from a lot of main places. The hotel itself is very modern and clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The location was perfect close to the lost sword lake.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom design had the bath- Shower up on a stand which made it hard to climb up and down to take a shower.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng ngon, địa điểm đi lại thuận tiện, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, lịch sự.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Hotel staff help me arrange transportation which all happened flawlessly. They gave me great recommendations for food and entertainment. convenient location for seeing the old Quarter. Good WiFi and AC with a comfy bed.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The front desk people and managers were all nice and very helpful. The breakfast was great and the airport transportation service was good and the price is reasonable. As it is a new hotel, everything was just so tidy and clean. The location is the best. You can easily walk to the lake or the night market within 1-2 mins. It was a wonderful experience to stay with this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was our first stop in Vietnam when we landed in Hanoi for 3 nights. Very comfortable stay. For a 4-star hotel, we found it very adequate. We had a 06h30 pick up for Ha Long Bay and the staff kindly arranged a pre-packed breakfast for the trip. We were able to make do with vegetarian options. I found that the Hotel was well located and within walking distance to restaurants and the famous night market, Hoan Kiem Lake and Cathedral.

review.rating: Feel the french vibe in the heart of hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent Hotel Manager and Staff. The rooms are clean and best of all the bed rooms and bathrooms are clean.  I recommend this place for couple of family and friends.

review.rating: Comfy & elegant stay in the heart of Hanoi
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location, service and friendliness of the staff was excellent. However the location also means a lot of noise on the weekends as Hanoi parties around the same location and lots of noise when the platforms are dismantled Sunday night into early Monday mornings. Would recommend ear plugs be kept in all front facing rooms and guests be told about it so they can switch rooms to a back facing one especially if you have early morning Monday flights. Overall an excellent hotel.

review.rating: Calm oasis in the centre of Hanoi old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location of the hotel is very good and ready accessible to the Lake District. Easy for a morning run before work with a wonderful view of the Cathedral and community exercising along the lake. The food in the restaurant is good and I personally like the Pho even at breakfast. The hotel staff are friendly and pay attention to detail. Special thanks to Martin who is superb in her recommendations of the food and areas to explore.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay at Lheritage Diamond . The hotel is as beautiful as on the pictures and the rooms are really nice and spacious. The breakfast and the top floor are also a big plus. Also the staff was amazing, they are really friendly and can help you out with anything.

review.rating: Great Location, Good Service, Great Value for Money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff was amazing. They went above and beyond. Great 10th floor breakfast overlooking the city . Perfect location in the old quarter and near the lake and Cathedral.

review.rating: Nice, friendly staff, worth every penny
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The service is excellent and the breakfast is delicious. It's reasonable. Information is kind. The bed is comfortable. I think I'll come back. The location of the accommodation is also very convenient.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What stood out for us is that the front desk staff are knowledgeable about where to go and what to do and they recommended after listening to our requirements. Not pushy to make the sales and always at hand to answer our questions. We booked the Ninh Binh day tour & absolutely loved it! Really value for money!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: Checking out process
review.comment_negative: Room cleanliness, especially the bathroom/bathtub. The lobby area was a mess when checking in. Breakfast options were sub-par. The room didn't meet my expectations.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We really appreciate our stay in this hotel. The hotel is very well located in the old city. The staff is so nice and adorable.
We also especially loved the breakfast here. You stayed 3 days in Hanoi and I think we enjoyed the best traditional Vietnamese meal in Hanoi in this hotel!! We strongly recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff, great location

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Ok
review.comment_negative: Ok

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is my 1st night at Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel. I loved their service. We faced some issues and Martin and his team took speedy steps to resolve it. I appreciate their sincerity and willingness to help me. Thank you Martin. I look forward to the next 2 days here! Very happy with this hotel.

review.rating: Quiet place with super friendly and helpful staff members
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Wonderful hotel and Martin couldn’t do enough for us so that we made the most of the city. Beautiful decorated and clean. All the staff were amazing and so friendly. Great location and fabulous restaurant . Nothing negative to say about the staff or hotel

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Fabulous location in the old quarter, surrounded by cafes and restaurants. Very friendly staff at the Hotel, the room was clean and the bed was super comfy.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The hotel has a very good location in the centre of Ha Noi city. The staff is incredible and very kind all time. The decoration is very nice and the ambient around the hotel very comfortable. You will have all facilities that you need during your stay. The attention the staff give to you is awesome more than you can imagine.

review.rating: Great hotel location in Old Town central
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This is a very good hotel, all staff are very friendly and serve us water and help us book restaurant and guiding us the route to our destination , plus helping us to cross the road without signaling them. Hotel is clean and big , breakfast is marvelous.

review.rating: A place of serenity in an amazing bustling city
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Spent a week here in Jan 2024. Not only is the hotel in a great location with easy walkable access to the old quarter, night market, puppet theatre, etc, but the staff are just so welcoming and friendly. They can book tours, tickets for you and made us really feel at home. Room was a great size and very clean, and breakfast had a nice selection as well as a to order menu. Would definitely revisit!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe cho 3 Người
review.comment_positive: location
review.comment_negative: cigarets smell in room

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great location, friendly and helpful staff, clean and comfy environment. I would recommend everyone to stay when you visit Hanoi Old Quarter. Many tourist spots are around with in walking distance! Wonderful!

review.rating: Lovely staying at Hanoi Lheriage Diamond
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The Lheritage Diamond Hotel has only reopened a year ago. Everything is new and clean and tidy. Very quiet rooms in a busy part of town. Staff are friendly and helpful. Get the free breakfast. Vietnamese or western breakfasts available with different pho’ Monday to Wednesday.

review.rating: Very nice hotel close in old quarter and very near the lake
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Super helpful staff who speak English really well and are able to accommodate any needs such as transportation or restaurant recomandation. great location right in the heart of the touristic area. Great value for the price

review.rating: A lovely experience and stay, definitely recommend!!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We only stayed for one night, but the whole staff was really nice and welcoming. The hotel is well located ( in the old town close to shops, restaurant and attractions). Beside that, we had a pleasant stay here!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This boutique hotel is delightful from the minute we walked in. The rooms are lovely, bathrooms luxurious and the staff delightful and attentive. Location is so convenient. Would happily come back. The buffet breakfast restaurant is lovely to spend time relaxing.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Một lựa chọn khá ổn cho cặp đôi muốn tiết kiệm chi phí. Phòng có ban công, khá sạch.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Bien placé, propre, personnel agréable et dévoué.
review.comment_negative: L’isolation phonique, du bruit est très perceptible depuis les chambres voisines.

review.rating: Great stay at the Hanoi Lheritage Diamond!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Had a great time Hotel is in a perfect location Staff very tentative and extremely helpful Would definitely stay again. The rooms and neat and extremely comfortable with really tasty breakfasts ready for you downstairs in the morning.
Overall we were super impressed with this hotel and the lovely staff. This place is great value for money and would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Chất lượng phòng tương xứng giá tiền. Nhìn chung ở mức khá, chấp nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is very great to staying around old quater area and Hoan kiem Lake . Restaurant on top floor is lovely, friendly staff and very reasonable prices.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The main thing to say was the wonderful service, from the Manager, Martin, to every single cleaner, cook and receptionist! The location of the hotel is great to get everywhere you may need. The room was big and nice, and the sheets and towels were getting changed everyday. The breakfast has different options and you can ask the cook to prepare something in the moment, which is good. Every person in the service is nice and willing to help you out with any request you may have. A big thanks to all Hanoi Lheritage Hotel team!

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Great staff, good spa, excellent location
review.comment_negative: Location location location

review.rating: This is a good place to stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Had a really enjoyable stay here, everything was so comfortable. Stayed 2 nights here at the end of my Vietnam trip, pretty tired from all the walking and sight visits, and I’m really glad to have booked this place it was perfect for a relaxing end to a trip. Clean room, warm showers, comfortable bed, good location. Totally would recommend this to friends, absolute value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức chấp nhận được, khá sạch sẽ. Ban công có view cũng tạm.
